```javascript
// .env.local
NEXT_PUBLIC_STRAPI_URL=http://localhost:1337
STRAPI_API_TOKEN=your_api_token_here
```

## GLOBAL COMPONENTS (Appear on All Pages)

These components appear on every page of the website and should be fetched once and cached globally.

### G1. Header / Navigation
**Endpoint**: `GET /api/site-settings`
**Query Parameters**:
```javascript
{
  populate: {
    logo: {
      fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
    },
    navigation: {
      populate: '*'
    }
  }
}
```

**Response Structure**:
```javascript
{
  data: {
    id: 1,
    attributes: {
      siteName: "CUA Ghana",
      logo: {
        data: {
          attributes: {
            url: "/uploads/cua_logo_main.png",
            alternativeText: "CUA Ghana Logo",
            width: 400,
            height: 133
          }
        }
      },
      // Navigation structure is managed in code due to complexity
      // Logo is the only CMS-managed part of the header
    }
  }
}
```

**Usage**:
```javascript
// app/components/Header.js
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import Image from 'next/image';

export default async function Header() {
  const siteSettings = await fetchAPI('/site-settings', {
    query: {
      populate: {
        logo: { fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height'] }
      }
    }
  });

  const logo = siteSettings.data.attributes.logo.data.attributes;

  return (
    <header>
      <Link href="/">
        <Image
          src={getStrapiMedia(logo.url)}
          alt={logo.alternativeText}
          width={120}
          height={40}
          className="h-10 w-auto"
        />
      </Link>
      {/* Rest of navigation remains hardcoded */}
    </header>
  );
}
```

**Note**: Navigation menu structure remains hardcoded in the component due to complexity. Only the logo is CMS-managed for easy brand updates.

### G2. News Ticker (Top Bar)
**Endpoint**: `GET /api/news-articles`
**Query Parameters**:
```javascript
{
  filters: {
    isTickerItem: {
      $eq: true
    }
  },
  sort: ['publishedDate:desc'],
  pagination: {
    limit: 10
  },
  fields: ['title', 'slug', 'publishedDate']
}
```

**Response Structure**:
```javascript
{
  data: [
    {
      id: 1,
      attributes: {
        title: "CUA Announces New Research Center for Sustainable Technology",
        slug: "research-center-sustainable-technology",
        publishedDate: "2024-12-15T00:00:00.000Z"
      }
    },
    // ... up to 10 items
  ],
  meta: {
    pagination: { total: 10 }
  }
}
```

**Usage**:
```javascript
// app/components/Ticker.js
'use client';
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { fetchAPI } from '@/lib/strapi';
import Ticker from 'react-ticker';
import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';

export default function TickerComponent() {
  const [newsItems, setNewsItems] = useState([]);
  const [isPaused, setIsPaused] = useState(false);
  const router = useRouter();

  useEffect(() => {
    async function loadTicker() {
      try {
        const response = await fetchAPI('/news-articles', {
          query: {
            filters: { isTickerItem: { $eq: true } },
            sort: ['publishedDate:desc'],
            pagination: { limit: 10 },
            fields: ['title', 'slug', 'publishedDate']
          }
        });

        setNewsItems(response.data.map(item => ({
          id: item.id,
          date: new Date(item.attributes.publishedDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', {
            month: 'short',
            day: 'numeric',
            year: 'numeric'
          }),
          title: item.attributes.title,
          slug: item.attributes.slug
        })));
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Failed to load ticker:', error);
      }
    }

    loadTicker();
  }, []);

  const handleNewsClick = (newsItem) => {
    router.push(`/news/${newsItem.slug}`);
  };

  return (
    <div
      className="bg-gray-100 py-[12px] overflow-hidden"
      onMouseEnter={() => setIsPaused(true)}
      onMouseLeave={() => setIsPaused(false)}
    >
      {newsItems.length > 0 && (
        <Ticker speed={5} mode="smooth" move={!isPaused}>
          {() => (
            <div className="flex items-center text-gray-700">
              {newsItems.map((item) => (
                <button
                  key={item.id}
                  onClick={() => handleNewsClick(item)}
                  className="whitespace-nowrap hover:text-[#446494] transition-colors duration-200"
                  style={{ marginRight: "80px" }}
                >
                  <span className="font-bold text-[15px]">{item.date}</span>
                  <span style={{ margin: "0 8px" }}>-</span>
                  <span className="font-semibold text-[14px]">{item.title}</span>
                </button>
              ))}
            </div>
          )}
        </Ticker>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

**Caching Strategy**: Client-side fetch on mount, could be optimized with SWR or React Query for automatic revalidation.

```javascript
    { icon: FiYoutube, name: "YouTube", url: settings.socialMedia.youtube },

            <div className="lg:col-span-2 space-y-6">

              {contactInfo.map((contact, index) => (

                  <div className="space-y-1">
                    <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-400">{contact.label}</p>
                    <p className="text-sm text-white">{contact.value}</p>
                    {contact.secondary && (
                      <p className="text-xs text-gray-400">{contact.secondary}</p>
                    )}
                  </div>
                </div>
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Bottom Bar */}
        <div className="py-6 border-t border-gray-700">
          <div className="flex flex-col lg:flex-row justify-between items-center space-y-6 lg:space-y-0">
            <p className="text-sm text-gray-400 text-center lg:text-left">
              © Copyright 2025 - {settings.siteName}
            </p>

            {/* Social Media Links */}
            <div className="flex space-x-3">

            <p className="text-sm text-gray-400">
              Powered by <span className="text-[#01366b] font-medium">CUA IT</span>
            </p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </footer>
  );

```

**Caching Strategy**: ISR with 24-hour revalidation (86400 seconds) since contact info rarely changes.

### Site Settings Content Type Structure

**Single Type**: `site-settings`

**Fields**:
- siteName (Text, Required) - "Ghana Co-operative Credit Unions Association (CUA) Limited"
- contactEmail (Email, Required)
- contactPhone (Text, Required)
- address (Text, Required)
- gpsAddress (Text) - GPS coordinates/code
- openingHours (Text)
- logo (Media, Single, Required) - Main color logo
- logoWhite (Media, Single) - White version for footer
- favicon (Media, Single) - Browser favicon

**Social Media Component**:
- facebook (Text, URL format)
- twitter (Text, URL format)
- youtube (Text, URL format)
- instagram (Text, URL format)
- linkedin (Text, URL format)

### Global Components Summary

**Total API Calls for Global Components**: 2
1. **Header** - `GET /api/site-settings` (logo only)
2. **Ticker** - `GET /api/news-articles?filters[isTickerItem][$eq]=true` (up to 10 items)
3. **Footer** - `GET /api/site-settings` (contact info, social links, logo)

**Note**: Header and Footer use the same endpoint (`site-settings`), so they can be combined into 1 call.

**Optimized**: Actually 2 API calls total
- 1 call for site-settings (Header + Footer)
- 1 call for ticker news items

**Caching Strategy**:
- Site Settings: ISR with 24-hour revalidation (rarely changes)
- Ticker: Client-side fetch, can implement SWR for real-time updates

### API Helper Function
```javascript
// lib/strapi.js
const STRAPI_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_STRAPI_URL || 'http://localhost:1337';
const API_TOKEN = process.env.STRAPI_API_TOKEN;

export async function fetchAPI(path, options = {}) {
  const defaultOptions = {
    headers: {
      'Content-Type': 'application/json',
      ...(API_TOKEN && { Authorization: `Bearer ${API_TOKEN}` }),
    },
  };

  const mergedOptions = {
    ...defaultOptions,
    ...options,
  };

  const requestUrl = `${STRAPI_URL}/api${path}`;

  try {
    const response = await fetch(requestUrl, mergedOptions);

    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error(`API Error: ${response.status}`);
    }

    const data = await response.json();
    return data;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Fetch API Error:', error);
    throw error;
  }
}

// Helper to get image URL
export function getStrapiMedia(url) {
  if (!url) return null;

  // Return full URL if it's already absolute
  if (url.startsWith('http') || url.startsWith('//')) {
    return url;
  }

  // Otherwise prepend Strapi URL
  return `${STRAPI_URL}${url}`;
}
```

## 1. HOMEPAGE (/)

**Route**: `/`
**File**: `app/page.js`
**Render Strategy**: Static Site Generation (SSG) with Revalidation

### Components on Homepage:
1. **Hero Carousel** - Rotating hero slides with CTAs
2. **Events Section** - Featured upcoming events grid (1 large + 2 small)
3. **Impact Section** - About CUA with statistics (gradient background + content card + 4 stats)
4. **Join Us Section** - Membership CTA with benefits (image + content + 3 benefits)
5. **Partners Carousel** - Partner organization logos (auto-scrolling carousel)

**Note**: Ticker, Header, and Footer are global components documented in the "GLOBAL COMPONENTS" section above.

### API Endpoints Required:

#### 1.1 Hero Carousel Slides
**Endpoint**: `GET /api/hero-slides`
**Query Parameters**:
```javascript
{
  filters: {
    isActive: {
      $eq: true
    }
  },
  sort: ['order:asc'],
  populate: {
    backgroundImage: {
      fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
    }
  },
  fields: ['title', 'subtext', 'ctaText', 'ctaLink', 'order']
}
```

**Response Structure**:
```javascript
{
  data: [
    {
      id: 1,
      attributes: {
        title: "Empowering Communities Through Credit Unions",
        subtext: "Building stronger financial futures for Ghanaians...",
        ctaText: "Join a Credit Union",
        ctaLink: "/find-credit-union",
        order: 0,
        backgroundImage: {
          data: {
            id: 1,
            attributes: {
              url: "/uploads/hero1_abc123.jpg",
              alternativeText: "Community members at credit union",
              width: 1920,
              height: 800
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    // ... 2 more slides
  ],
  meta: {
    pagination: { total: 3 }
  }
}
```

**Usage in Component**:
```javascript
// app/components/Hero.js
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import Image from 'next/image';

export default async function Hero() {
  const slides = await fetchAPI('/hero-slides', {
    query: {
      filters: { isActive: { $eq: true } },
      sort: ['order:asc'],
      populate: { backgroundImage: { fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height'] } },
      fields: ['title', 'subtext', 'ctaText', 'ctaLink', 'order']
    }
  });

  const heroItems = slides.data.map(slide => ({
    id: slide.id,
    title: slide.attributes.title,
    subtext: slide.attributes.subtext,
    ctaText: slide.attributes.ctaText,
    ctaLink: slide.attributes.ctaLink,
    backgroundImage: getStrapiMedia(slide.attributes.backgroundImage.data.attributes.url)
  }));

  return (
    // Hero carousel with heroItems
  );
}
```

#### 1.3 Featured Events
**Endpoint**: `GET /api/events`

**Response Structure**:

**Usage in Component**:
```javascript
// app/components/Events.js
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';

export default async function Events() {
  const response = await fetchAPI('/events', {
    query: {
      filters: {
        isFeatured: { $eq: true },
        status: { $eq: 'Upcoming' }
      },
      sort: ['eventDate:asc'],
      pagination: { limit: 3 },
      populate: { featuredImage: { fields: ['url', 'alternativeText'] } },
      fields: ['title', 'shortDescription', 'eventDate', 'slug']
    }
  });

  const events = response.data.map(event => ({
    id: event.id,
    title: event.attributes.title,
    description: event.attributes.shortDescription,
    date: new Date(event.attributes.eventDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', {
      year: 'numeric',
      month: 'long',
      day: 'numeric'
    }),
    image: getStrapiMedia(event.attributes.featuredImage.data.attributes.url),
    slug: event.attributes.slug
  }));

  return (
    // Events grid with events array
  );
}
```

```javascript
            <div className="space-y-6">
              <div className="flex items-center space-x-3">
                <div className="w-8 h-8 bg-blue-50 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center">
                  <div className="w-3 h-3 bg-[#01366b] rounded-full"></div>
                </div>
                <span className="text-[#01366b] font-semibold text-sm tracking-wide">
                  {impactSection.badge}
                </span>
              </div>

              <h3 className="text-2xl lg:text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 leading-tight">
                {impactSection.title}
              </h3>

              <div
                className="space-y-4 text-gray-700 leading-relaxed prose prose-p:mb-4"
                dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: impactSection.description }}
              />
            </div>

            <div className="pt-4">
              <Button size="lg" variant="primary" href={impactSection.ctaLink}>
                {impactSection.ctaText}
              </Button>
            </div>
          </div>

          {/* Right: Image */}
          <div className="relative h-full min-h-[400px] lg:min-h-[600px]">
            <Image
              src={getStrapiMedia(impactSection.image.data.attributes.url)}
              alt={impactSection.image.data.attributes.alternativeText}
              fill
              className="object-cover"
              priority
            />
            <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-t from-black/20 to-transparent" />
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Statistics Grid */}
        <div className="grid grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8 mt-16">
          {sortedStats.map((stat) => (
            <div key={stat.id} className="text-center space-y-2">
              <p className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-[#01366b]">
                {stat.value}
              </p>
              <p className="text-gray-600 text-sm font-medium">
                {stat.label}
              </p>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>
  );
}
```

**Strapi Content Type Structure for Homepage Settings**:

**Single Type**: `homepage-setting`

**Impact Section Component** (inside Homepage Settings):
- badge (Text) - e.g., "ABOUT US"
- sectionTitle (Text) - Main heading
- sectionSubtitle (Text) - Subtitle under heading
- title (Text) - Card title
- description (Rich Text) - Full HTML content
- ctaText (Text) - Button text
- ctaLink (Text) - Button URL
- image (Media, Single) - Background image

**Statistics Component** (Repeatable):
- value (Text) - e.g., "2.5M+"
- label (Text) - e.g., "Members Served"
- icon (Enumeration) - Icon name (FiUsers, FiHome, FiClock, FiTrendingUp)
- order (Number) - Display order

```javascript
// app/components/JoinUs.js
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';

  // Add more icons as needed

                <div className="w-8 h-1 bg-[#01366b]" />

                  {joinUsSection.badge}
                </span>
              </div>

              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl xl:text-5xl font-bold text-gray-900 leading-tight">
                {joinUsSection.title}

              <p className="text-lg text-gray-700 leading-relaxed">
                {joinUsSection.description}
              </p>
            </div>

            {/* Benefits */}

              {sortedBenefits.map((benefit) => {

              })}

            {/* CTA Buttons */}

                href={joinUsSection.primaryCtaLink}

                icon={FiArrowRight}

      </div>
    </section>
  );
}
```

```javascript
// app/components/Partners.js
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';

export default async function Partners() {
  const response = await fetchAPI('/partners', {
    query: {
      filters: { isActive: { $eq: true } },
      sort: ['displayOrder:asc'],
      populate: { logo: { fields: ['url', 'alternativeText'] } },
      fields: ['name', 'slug', 'website', 'displayOrder']
    }
  });

  const partners = response.data.map(partner => ({
    id: partner.id,
    name: partner.attributes.name,
    logo: getStrapiMedia(partner.attributes.logo.data.attributes.url),
    website: partner.attributes.website
  }));

  return (
    // Partners carousel with partners array
  );
}
```

### Homepage Data Fetching Strategy

**Recommended Approach**: Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR)

```javascript
// app/page.js
import Hero from './components/Hero';
import Ticker from './components/Ticker';
import Events from './components/Events';
import About from './components/About';
import JoinUs from './components/JoinUs';
import Partners from './components/Partners';

export const revalidate = 3600; // Revalidate every hour

export default async function HomePage() {
  return (
    <main>
      <Ticker />
      <Hero />
      <Events />
      <About />
      <JoinUs />
      <Partners />
    </main>
  );
}
```

---

### Summary for Homepage

**Homepage-Specific API Calls**: 4 endpoints
1. **Hero Carousel** - `GET /api/hero-slides` (3 active slides)
2. **Featured Events** - `GET /api/events` (3 featured events)
3. **Impact Section** - `GET /api/homepage-setting` (4 statistics + impact content with image)
4. **Join Us Section** - `GET /api/homepage-setting` (3 benefits + CTA content with image)
5. **Partners Carousel** - `GET /api/partners` (8 partner organizations)

**Note**: Impact Section (#3) and Join Us Section (#4) can be fetched in a single API call to `/api/homepage-setting` with appropriate populate parameters.

**Optimized API Strategy**: 4 actual API calls
- 1 call for homepage-setting (includes both Impact and Join Us sections)
- 3 separate calls for hero, events, partners

**Global Components** (documented separately):
- News Ticker - `GET /api/news-articles` with ticker filter
- Header Logo - `GET /api/site-settings`
- Footer - `GET /api/site-settings` (same call as header)

**Total API Calls for Complete Homepage**: 6 calls
- 4 homepage-specific calls
- 2 global component calls (site-settings + ticker)

**Caching Strategy**: ISR with 1-hour revalidation (3600 seconds)
**Loading Strategy**: Server-side fetch on build, cached and revalidated every hour
**Error Handling**:
  - Fallback to empty arrays if API fails
  - Show error boundary component for critical sections
  - Log errors to monitoring service

**Component Implementation**:
```javascript
// app/about-us/who-we-are/page.js
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import AboutHero from '@/app/components/AboutHero';
import Image from 'next/image';
import { FiTarget, FiEye, FiUsers, FiTrendingUp, FiHeart, FiAward } from 'react-icons/fi';

// Icon mapping
const iconMap = {
  FiTarget,
  FiEye,
  FiUsers,
  FiTrendingUp,
  FiHeart,
  FiAward,
};

export const revalidate = 3600; // Revalidate every hour

export default async function WhoWeArePage() {
  const response = await fetchAPI('/about-page-content', {
    query: {
      populate: {
        heroSection: {
          populate: { backgroundImage: { fields: ['url', 'alternativeText'] } }
        },
        statistics: true,
        presidentialQuote: {
          populate: { image: { fields: ['url', 'alternativeText'] } }
        },
        timeline: true,
        missionVision: true,
        coreValues: true,
        internationalAffiliations: true
      }
    }
  });

  const pageData = response.data.attributes;

  // Sort arrays by order
  const sortedStats = pageData.statistics.sort((a, b) => a.order - b.order);
  const sortedTimeline = pageData.timeline.sort((a, b) => a.order - b.order);
  const sortedCoreValues = pageData.coreValues.sort((a, b) => a.order - b.order);
  const sortedAffiliations = pageData.internationalAffiliations.sort((a, b) => a.order - b.order);

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <AboutHero
        badge={pageData.heroSection.badge}
        title={pageData.heroSection.title}
        description={pageData.heroSection.description}
        backgroundImage={getStrapiMedia(pageData.heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.url)}
      />

      {/* Stats Overview */}
      <section className="py-12 bg-white">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="grid sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8">
            {sortedStats.map((stat) => (
              <div key={stat.id} className="text-center">
                <div className={`text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold mb-2 ${
                  stat.highlight ? 'text-[#01366b]' : 'text-gray-900'
                }`}>
                  {stat.number}
                </div>
                <div className="text-gray-600 font-medium">{stat.label}</div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Presidential Quote Section */}
      <section className="py-16 lg:py-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-50 to-white">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="grid lg:grid-cols-12 gap-12 items-center">
            {/* Quote Content */}
            <div className="lg:col-span-8">
              <div className="relative">
                <div className="absolute -top-6 -left-6 text-8xl text-[#01366b]/10 font-serif">"</div>

                <blockquote className="text-2xl lg:text-3xl font-light text-gray-900 leading-relaxed mb-8 relative z-10">
                  {pageData.presidentialQuote.quote}
                </blockquote>

                <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
                  <div className="w-12 h-1 bg-[#01366b]"></div>
                  <div>
                    <cite className="text-lg font-bold text-[#01366b] not-italic block">
                      {pageData.presidentialQuote.author}
                    </cite>
                    <p className="text-gray-600 text-sm">{pageData.presidentialQuote.context}</p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Historical Image */}
            <div className="lg:col-span-4">
              <div className="relative aspect-square rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-xl">
                <Image
                  src={getStrapiMedia(pageData.presidentialQuote.image.data.attributes.url)}
                  alt={pageData.presidentialQuote.image.data.attributes.alternativeText}
                  fill
                  className="object-cover"
                />
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Timeline Section */}
      <section className="py-16 lg:py-20 bg-white">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl xl:text-5xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              A Legacy of Service
            </h2>
          </div>

          {/* Vertical Timeline */}
          <div className="relative">
            <div className="absolute left-8 lg:left-1/2 top-0 bottom-0 w-0.5 bg-gradient-to-b from-[#01366b] via-[#01366b]/50 to-[#01366b]"></div>

            <div className="space-y-12">
              {sortedTimeline.map((event, index) => (
                <div
                  key={event.id}
                  className={`relative flex items-center ${
                    index % 2 === 0 ? 'lg:flex-row' : 'lg:flex-row-reverse'
                  }`}
                >
                  {/* Timeline Node */}
                  <div className={`absolute left-8 lg:left-1/2 w-4 h-4 rounded-full border-4 border-white shadow-lg ${
                    event.isFoundation ? 'bg-[#01366b]' :
                    event.isPresidential ? 'bg-green-500' :
                    event.isMilestone ? 'bg-orange-500' : 'bg-gray-400'
                  }`}></div>

                  {/* Content */}
                  <div className={`w-full lg:w-1/2 ml-20 lg:ml-0 ${
                    index % 2 === 0 ? 'lg:pr-12 lg:text-right' : 'lg:pl-12 lg:text-left'
                  }`}>
                    <div className={`bg-white rounded-2xl p-6 lg:p-8 shadow-lg ${
                      event.isFoundation ? 'border-l-4 border-[#01366b]' :
                      event.isPresidential ? 'border-l-4 border-green-500' :
                      event.isMilestone ? 'border-l-4 border-orange-500' : ''
                    }`}>
                      <div className={`inline-block px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm font-bold mb-4 ${
                        event.isFoundation ? 'bg-[#01366b] text-white' :
                        event.isPresidential ? 'bg-green-500 text-white' :
                        event.isMilestone ? 'bg-orange-500 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
                      }`}>
                        {event.year}
                      </div>
                      <h3 className="text-xl lg:text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">
                        {event.title}
                      </h3>
                      <p className="text-gray-600 leading-relaxed">
                        {event.description}
                      </p>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Mission & Vision */}
      <section className="py-16 lg:py-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-50 to-white">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl xl:text-5xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Mission & Vision
            </h2>
          </div>

          <div className="grid lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
            {/* Mission */}
            <div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] to-[#024d8a] rounded-3xl p-8 lg:p-10 text-white">
              <div className="flex items-center mb-6">
                <div className="w-12 h-12 bg-white/20 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center mr-4">
                  {iconMap[pageData.missionVision.mission.icon] &&
                    React.createElement(iconMap[pageData.missionVision.mission.icon], { className: "w-6 h-6" })
                  }
                </div>
                <h3 className="text-2xl lg:text-3xl font-bold">
                  {pageData.missionVision.mission.title}
                </h3>
              </div>
              <p className="text-white/90 text-lg leading-relaxed">
                {pageData.missionVision.mission.content}
              </p>
            </div>

            {/* Vision */}
            <div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-800 to-gray-900 rounded-3xl p-8 lg:p-10 text-white">
              <div className="flex items-center mb-6">
                <div className="w-12 h-12 bg-white/20 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center mr-4">
                  {iconMap[pageData.missionVision.vision.icon] &&
                    React.createElement(iconMap[pageData.missionVision.vision.icon], { className: "w-6 h-6" })
                  }
                </div>
                <h3 className="text-2xl lg:text-3xl font-bold">
                  {pageData.missionVision.vision.title}
                </h3>
              </div>
              <p className="text-white/90 text-lg leading-relaxed">
                {pageData.missionVision.vision.content}
              </p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Core Values */}
      <section className="py-16 lg:py-20 bg-gray-50">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl xl:text-5xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Core Values
            </h2>
          </div>

          <div className="grid sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
            {sortedCoreValues.map((value) => {
              const IconComponent = iconMap[value.icon];
              return (
                <div key={value.id} className="bg-white rounded-2xl p-6 lg:p-8 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all text-center">
                  <div className={`w-16 h-16 ${value.color} rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4`}>
                    {IconComponent && <IconComponent className="w-8 h-8 text-white" />}
                  </div>
                  <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">{value.title}</h3>
                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* International Affiliations */}
      <section className="py-16 lg:py-20 bg-white">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center">
          <div className="mb-12">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl xl:text-5xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              International Affiliations
            </h2>
          </div>

          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 max-w-4xl mx-auto">
            {sortedAffiliations.map((affiliation) => (
              <div
                key={affiliation.id}
                className={`${affiliation.backgroundColor} rounded-2xl p-8 border ${affiliation.borderColor}`}
              >
                <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">{affiliation.name}</h3>
                <p className="text-gray-600">{affiliation.fullName}</p>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
    </div>
  );
}
```

**Strapi Content Type Structure**:

**Single Type**: `about-page-content`

**Components**:

1. **Hero Section Component**:
   - badge (Text)
   - title (Text)
   - description (Long Text)
   - backgroundImage (Media, Single)

2. **Statistics Component** (Repeatable):
   - number (Text) - e.g., "1955", "68+"
   - label (Text) - e.g., "Founded", "Years of Service"
   - highlight (Boolean) - Highlight with primary color
   - order (Number)

3. **Presidential Quote Component**:
   - quote (Long Text)
   - author (Text)
   - context (Text) - Additional context
   - year (Number)
   - image (Media, Single)

4. **Timeline Event Component** (Repeatable):
   - year (Text) - e.g., "1955"
   - title (Text)
   - description (Long Text)
   - isFoundation (Boolean) - Special styling
   - isPresidential (Boolean) - Special styling
   - isMilestone (Boolean) - Special styling
   - order (Number)

5. **Mission Vision Component**:
   - mission (Component):
     - title (Text)
     - content (Long Text)
     - icon (Enumeration)
   - vision (Component):
     - title (Text)
     - content (Long Text)
     - icon (Enumeration)

6. **Core Values Component** (Repeatable):
   - title (Text)
   - icon (Enumeration) - FiUsers, FiTrendingUp, FiHeart, FiAward, FiTarget, FiEye
   - color (Enumeration) - bg-blue-500, bg-green-500, bg-red-500, bg-purple-500, bg-orange-500, bg-indigo-500
   - order (Number)

7. **International Affiliations Component** (Repeatable):
   - name (Text) - Short name (e.g., "ACCOSCA")
   - fullName (Text) - Full name
   - backgroundColor (Text) - Tailwind class
   - borderColor (Text) - Tailwind class
   - order (Number)

**Component Implementation**:
```javascript
// app/about-us/board-of-directors/page.js
'use client';
import { useState } from 'react';
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import AboutHero from '@/app/components/AboutHero';
import Image from 'next/image';
import { FiLinkedin, FiMail, FiPhone } from 'react-icons/fi';

export const revalidate = 3600;

export default async function BoardPage() {
  const response = await fetchAPI('/board-members', {
    query: {
      filters: { isActive: { $eq: true } },
      sort: ['displayOrder:asc'],
      populate: { photo: { fields: ['url', 'alternativeText'] } },
      fields: ['fullName', 'position', 'bio', 'qualifications', 'responsibilities', 'email', 'phone', 'linkedIn']
    }
  });

  return (
    <div>
      <AboutHero
        badge="Leadership"
        title="Board of Directors"
        description="Meet the experienced leaders guiding CUA Ghana's vision."
        backgroundImage="/images/hero/hero2.jpg"
      />

      <section className="py-16 bg-white">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6">
          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
            {response.data.map((member) => (
              <BoardCard key={member.id} member={member} />
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
    </div>
  );
}

function BoardCard({ member }) {
  const [expanded, setExpanded] = useState(false);
  const { attributes: m } = member;

  return (
    <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden">
      <div className="relative aspect-square">
        <Image
          src={getStrapiMedia(m.photo.data.attributes.url)}
          alt={m.photo.data.attributes.alternativeText}
          fill
          className="object-cover"
        />
        <div className="absolute bottom-4 left-4 right-4 bg-white/95 rounded-lg px-4 py-2">
          <p className="text-sm font-bold text-[#01366b]">{m.position}</p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div className="p-6 space-y-4">
        <h3 className="text-xl font-bold">{m.fullName}</h3>

        <div
          className={`text-sm text-gray-600 prose prose-sm ${!expanded ? 'line-clamp-3' : ''}`}
          dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: m.bio }}
        />

        <button
          onClick={() => setExpanded(!expanded)}
          className="text-[#01366b] text-sm font-semibold"
        >
          {expanded ? 'Show Less' : 'Read More'}
        </button>

        {expanded && (
          <div className="space-y-3 pt-3 border-t">
            {m.qualifications && (
              <div>
                <h4 className="font-bold text-sm mb-1">Qualifications</h4>
                <div className="text-sm text-gray-600 prose prose-sm" dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: m.qualifications }} />
              </div>
            )}
            {m.responsibilities && (
              <div>
                <h4 className="font-bold text-sm mb-1">Responsibilities</h4>
                <div className="text-sm text-gray-600 prose prose-sm" dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: m.responsibilities }} />
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        )}

        {(m.email || m.phone || m.linkedIn) && (
          <div className="flex space-x-3 pt-3 border-t">
            {m.email && <a href={`mailto:${m.email}`} className="text-gray-400 hover:text-[#01366b]"><FiMail size={18} /></a>}
            {m.phone && <a href={`tel:${m.phone}`} className="text-gray-400 hover:text-[#01366b]"><FiPhone size={18} /></a>}
            {m.linkedIn && <a href={m.linkedIn} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" className="text-gray-400 hover:text-[#01366b]"><FiLinkedin size={18} /></a>}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

**Content Type**: `board-member` (Collection)

**Fields**:
- fullName (Text, Required)
- position (Text, Required) - "Chairperson", "Vice Chairperson", "Secretary", "Treasurer", "Member"
- bio (Rich Text, Required)
- photo (Media, Single, Required) - Square 800x800px minimum
- qualifications (Rich Text)
- responsibilities (Rich Text)
- email (Email)
- phone (Text)
- linkedIn (Text, URL)
- displayOrder (Number, Required) - 0=Chairperson, 1=Vice, 2=Secretary, 3=Treasurer, 4+=Members
- isActive (Boolean, Default: true)
- termStart (Date)
- termEnd (Date)

**API Calls**: 1 (`/api/board-members`)
**Content**: 7 board members typically
**Display**: 3-column grid, expandable cards
**Caching**: ISR 1-hour

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import { FiMail, FiPhone, FiLinkedin } from 'react-icons/fi';
import ManagementCard from '@/app/components/ManagementCard';

// ISR with 1 hour revalidation
export const revalidate = 3600;

export const metadata = {
  title: 'Management Team - CUA Ghana',
  description: 'Meet the experienced management team leading CUA Ghana towards excellence in cooperative banking and financial services.',
};

export default async function ManagementPage() {
  let managementTeam;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/management-team', {
      query: {
        filters: {
          isActive: { $eq: true }
        },
        sort: ['department:asc', 'displayOrder:asc'],
        populate: {
          photo: {
            fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
          }
        },
        fields: [
          'fullName',
          'position',
          'department',
          'bio',
          'qualifications',
          'responsibilities',
          'achievements',
          'email',
          'phone',
          'linkedIn',
          'displayOrder'
        ]
      }
    });

    managementTeam = response.data;

    if (!managementTeam || managementTeam.length === 0) {
      notFound();
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching management team:', error);
    notFound();
  }

  // Group by department
  const departments = {
    Executive: [],
    Finance: [],
    Training: [],
    Operations: [],
    Marketing: [],
    Compliance: [],
    'Human Resources': []
  };

  managementTeam.forEach(member => {
    const dept = member.attributes.department;
    if (departments[dept]) {
      departments[dept].push(member);
    }
  });

  return (
    <main className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] via-[#024d8a] to-[#01366b] py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-[url('/images/patterns/grid.svg')] opacity-10"></div>

        <div className="relative max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center">
          <div className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 bg-white/10 rounded-full px-4 py-2 mb-6">
            <div className="w-2 h-2 bg-white rounded-full"></div>
            <span className="text-white text-sm font-semibold tracking-wide uppercase">
              Our Leadership
            </span>
          </div>

          <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold text-white mb-6 leading-tight">
            Management Team
          </h1>

          <p className="text-lg lg:text-xl text-blue-100 max-w-3xl mx-auto leading-relaxed">
            Meet the experienced professionals driving CUA Ghana's mission to strengthen cooperative banking across the nation
          </p>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Management Team by Department */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 space-y-20">
          {Object.entries(departments).map(([dept, members]) => {
            if (members.length === 0) return null;

            return (
              <div key={dept} className="space-y-8">
                {/* Department Header */}
                <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
                  <div className="w-1 h-12 bg-[#01366b] rounded-full"></div>
                  <div>
                    <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900">
                      {dept}
                    </h2>
                    <p className="text-gray-600 mt-1">
                      {members.length} {members.length === 1 ? 'Member' : 'Members'}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>

                {/* Team Members Grid */}
                <div className={`grid gap-8 ${
                  members.length === 1 ? 'lg:grid-cols-1 max-w-md' :
                  members.length === 2 ? 'lg:grid-cols-2' :
                  'lg:grid-cols-3'
                }`}>
                  {members.map((member) => (
                    <ManagementCard key={member.id} member={member} />
                  ))}
                </div>
              </div>
            );
          })}
        </div>
      </section>
    </main>
  );
}
```

```javascript
'use client';

import { useState } from 'react';
import Image from 'next/image';
import { getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { FiMail, FiPhone, FiLinkedin, FiChevronDown, FiChevronUp } from 'react-icons/fi';

export default function ManagementCard({ member }) {
  const [expanded, setExpanded] = useState(false);
  const { attributes: m } = member;

  return (
    <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300">
      {/* Photo */}
      <div className="relative aspect-square">
        <Image
          src={getStrapiMedia(m.photo.data.attributes.url)}
          alt={m.photo.data.attributes.alternativeText}
          fill
          className="object-cover"
        />

        {/* Position Badge */}
        <div className="absolute bottom-4 left-4 right-4 bg-white/95 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-lg px-4 py-2">
          <p className="text-sm font-bold text-[#01366b] line-clamp-1">{m.position}</p>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Content */}
      <div className="p-6 space-y-4">
        {/* Name */}
        <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">{m.fullName}</h3>

        {/* Bio */}
        <div
          className={`text-sm text-gray-600 prose prose-sm max-w-none ${!expanded ? 'line-clamp-3' : ''}`}
          dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: m.bio }}
        />

        {/* Expand/Collapse Button */}
        <button
          onClick={() => setExpanded(!expanded)}
          className="flex items-center space-x-2 text-[#01366b] text-sm font-semibold hover:underline"
        >
          <span>{expanded ? 'Show Less' : 'Read More'}</span>
          {expanded ? <FiChevronUp size={16} /> : <FiChevronDown size={16} />}
        </button>

        {/* Expanded Content */}
        {expanded && (
          <div className="space-y-4 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200">
            {/* Qualifications */}
            {m.qualifications && (
              <div>
                <h4 className="font-bold text-sm text-gray-900 mb-2">Qualifications</h4>
                <div
                  className="text-sm text-gray-600 prose prose-sm max-w-none"
                  dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: m.qualifications }}
                />
              </div>
            )}

            {/* Responsibilities */}
            {m.responsibilities && (
              <div>
                <h4 className="font-bold text-sm text-gray-900 mb-2">Key Responsibilities</h4>
                <div
                  className="text-sm text-gray-600 prose prose-sm max-w-none"
                  dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: m.responsibilities }}
                />
              </div>
            )}

            {/* Achievements */}
            {m.achievements && (
              <div>
                <h4 className="font-bold text-sm text-gray-900 mb-2">Notable Achievements</h4>
                <div
                  className="text-sm text-gray-600 prose prose-sm max-w-none"
                  dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: m.achievements }}
                />
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        )}

        {/* Contact Icons */}
        {(m.email || m.phone || m.linkedIn) && (
          <div className="flex space-x-3 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200">
            {m.email && (
              <a
                href={`mailto:${m.email}`}
                className="flex items-center justify-center w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 hover:bg-[#01366b] hover:text-white transition-colors duration-200"
                title={`Email ${m.fullName}`}
              >
                <FiMail size={18} />
              </a>
            )}
            {m.phone && (
              <a
                href={`tel:${m.phone}`}
                className="flex items-center justify-center w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 hover:bg-[#01366b] hover:text-white transition-colors duration-200"
                title={`Call ${m.fullName}`}
              >
                <FiPhone size={18} />
              </a>
            )}
            {m.linkedIn && (
              <a
                href={m.linkedIn}
                target="_blank"
                rel="noopener noreferrer"
                className="flex items-center justify-center w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 hover:bg-[#01366b] hover:text-white transition-colors duration-200"
                title={`${m.fullName} on LinkedIn`}
              >
                <FiLinkedin size={18} />
              </a>
            )}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

### Strapi Content Type Structure

**Collection Type**: `management-team`

**Fields**:

1. **fullName** (Text, Required)
   - Display name of the management member

2. **position** (Text, Required)
   - Job title/position

3. **department** (Enumeration, Required)
   - Options: Executive, Finance, Training, Operations, Marketing, Compliance, Human Resources
   - Used for grouping on the page

4. **bio** (Rich Text, Required)
   - Professional biography (2-3 paragraphs)

5. **qualifications** (Rich Text)
   - Educational background and certifications

6. **responsibilities** (Rich Text)
   - Key areas of responsibility

7. **achievements** (Rich Text)
   - Notable achievements and accomplishments

8. **email** (Email)
   - Professional email address

9. **phone** (Text)
   - Contact phone number

10. **linkedIn** (Text)
    - LinkedIn profile URL

11. **photo** (Media, Required)
    - Professional headshot (800x1000px recommended)

12. **displayOrder** (Integer, Required, Default: 1)
    - Sort order within department (1 = first, 2 = second, etc.)

13. **isActive** (Boolean, Required, Default: true)
    - Whether to display this member on the website

- Expandable cards showing bio initially, then full details on click
- Optional contact methods (email, phone, LinkedIn)
- Professional headshots with position badges
- Rich text support for qualifications, responsibilities, and achievements
- Active/inactive toggle for temporary removals

**Department Display Order**:
1. Executive
2. Finance
3. Training
4. Operations
5. Marketing
6. Compliance
7. Human Resources

### Page Implementation

**File**: `app/about-us/partners/page.js`

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import { FiExternalLink, FiCalendar, FiAward } from 'react-icons/fi';

// ISR with 1 hour revalidation
export const revalidate = 3600;

export const metadata = {
  title: 'Our Partners - CUA Ghana',
  description: 'Discover CUA Ghana\'s strategic partners and collaborators supporting the growth and development of credit unions across Ghana.',
};

export default async function PartnersPage() {
  let partners;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/partners', {
      query: {
        filters: {
          isActive: { $eq: true }
        },
        sort: ['category:asc', 'displayOrder:asc'],
        populate: {
          logo: {
            fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
          }
        },
        fields: [
          'name',
          'category',
          'description',
          'partnershipType',
          'since',
          'website',
          'displayOrder'
        ]
      }
    });

    partners = response.data;

    if (!partners || partners.length === 0) {
      notFound();
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching partners:', error);
    notFound();
  }

  // Group by category
  const categories = {
    'International Organizations': [],
    'Government Agencies': [],
    'Financial Institutions': [],
    'Development Partners': []
  };

  partners.forEach(partner => {
    const cat = partner.attributes.category;
    if (categories[cat]) {
      categories[cat].push(partner);
    }
  });

  return (
    <main className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] via-[#024d8a] to-[#01366b] py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-[url('/images/patterns/grid.svg')] opacity-10"></div>

        <div className="relative max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center">
          <div className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 bg-white/10 rounded-full px-4 py-2 mb-6">
            <div className="w-2 h-2 bg-white rounded-full"></div>
            <span className="text-white text-sm font-semibold tracking-wide uppercase">
              Collaboration
            </span>
          </div>

          <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold text-white mb-6 leading-tight">
            Our Partners
          </h1>

          <p className="text-lg lg:text-xl text-blue-100 max-w-3xl mx-auto leading-relaxed">
            Building strategic partnerships to strengthen credit unions and promote financial inclusion across Ghana
          </p>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Partners by Category */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 space-y-20">
          {Object.entries(categories).map(([category, partnersList]) => {
            if (partnersList.length === 0) return null;

            return (
              <div key={category} className="space-y-8">
                {/* Category Header */}
                <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
                  <div className="w-1 h-12 bg-[#01366b] rounded-full"></div>
                  <div>
                    <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900">
                      {category}
                    </h2>
                    <p className="text-gray-600 mt-1">
                      {partnersList.length} {partnersList.length === 1 ? 'Partner' : 'Partners'}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>

                {/* Partners Grid */}
                <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
                  {partnersList.map((partner) => {
                    const p = partner.attributes;
                    return (
                      <div
                        key={partner.id}
                        className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300"
                      >
                        {/* Logo Section */}
                        <div className="bg-gray-50 p-8 flex items-center justify-center h-48 border-b border-gray-200">
                          <div className="relative w-full h-full">
                            <Image
                              src={getStrapiMedia(p.logo.data.attributes.url)}
                              alt={p.logo.data.attributes.alternativeText}
                              fill
                              className="object-contain"
                            />
                          </div>
                        </div>

                        {/* Content Section */}
                        <div className="p-6 space-y-4">
                          <div>
                            <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                              {p.name}
                            </h3>

                            {/* Partnership Details */}
                            <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-3 mb-4">
                              <div className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 bg-blue-50 text-[#01366b] px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm">
                                <FiAward size={14} />
                                <span className="font-semibold">{p.partnershipType}</span>
                              </div>
                              <div className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm">
                                <FiCalendar size={14} />
                                <span>Since {p.since}</span>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>

                          {/* Description */}
                          <div
                            className="text-sm text-gray-600 prose prose-sm max-w-none"
                            dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: p.description }}
                          />

                          {/* Website Link */}
                          {p.website && (
                            <a
                              href={p.website}
                              target="_blank"
                              rel="noopener noreferrer"
                              className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 text-[#01366b] font-semibold text-sm hover:underline mt-4"
                            >
                              <span>Visit Website</span>
                              <FiExternalLink size={16} />
                            </a>
                          )}
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    );
                  })}
                </div>
              </div>
            );
          })}
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* CTA Section */}
      <section className="py-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] to-[#024d8a]">
        <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center">
          <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-white mb-6">
            Interested in Partnering with Us?
          </h2>
          <p className="text-lg text-blue-100 mb-8 leading-relaxed">
            We welcome partnerships that align with our mission to strengthen credit unions and promote financial inclusion across Ghana.
          </p>
          <a
            href="/contact"
            className="inline-block bg-white text-[#01366b] px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-bold hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors duration-200"
          >
            Get in Touch
          </a>
        </div>
      </section>
    </main>
  );
}
```

### Strapi Content Type Structure

**Collection Type**: `partners`

**Fields**:

1. **name** (Text, Required)
   - Full name of the partner organization

2. **category** (Enumeration, Required)
   - Options: International Organizations, Government Agencies, Financial Institutions, Development Partners
   - Used for grouping on the page

3. **description** (Rich Text, Required)
   - Description of the partnership and collaboration (2-3 paragraphs)

4. **partnershipType** (Text, Required)
   - Type of partnership (e.g., "Strategic Partner", "Member Organization", "Regulatory Partner")

5. **since** (Text, Required)
   - Year partnership began (e.g., "1968", "2010")

6. **website** (Text)
   - Partner organization's website URL

7. **logo** (Media, Required)
   - Partner organization logo (400x200px recommended, transparent PNG)

8. **displayOrder** (Integer, Required, Default: 1)
   - Sort order within category (1 = first, 2 = second, etc.)

9. **isActive** (Boolean, Required, Default: true)
   - Whether to display this partner on the website

- Logo display area with consistent sizing
- Partnership type and start year badges
- Rich text descriptions explaining the partnership
- External website links with target="_blank"
- CTA section encouraging new partnerships
- 2-column responsive grid layout

**Category Display Order**:
1. International Organizations
2. Government Agencies
3. Financial Institutions
4. Development Partners

### Page Implementation

**File**: `app/about-us/role-in-ghana/page.js`

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import {
  FiUsers, FiTrendingUp, FiShield, FiBriefcase,
  FiHome, FiDollarSign, FiCreditCard
} from 'react-icons/fi';
import { PiGraduationCap } from 'react-icons/pi';

// ISR with 1 hour revalidation
export const revalidate = 3600;

export const metadata = {
  title: 'Our Role in Ghana - CUA Ghana',
  description: 'Discover how CUA Ghana drives financial inclusion, economic growth, and social development across Ghana through cooperative banking.',
};

// Icon mapping
const iconMap = {
  FiUsers,
  FiTrendingUp,
  FiShield,
  FiBriefcase,
  FiHome,
  GraduationCap: PiGraduationCap,
  FiDollarSign,
  FiCreditCard
};

export default async function RoleInGhanaPage() {
  let pageData;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/role-in-ghana-page', {
      query: {
        populate: {
          heroSection: {
            populate: {
              backgroundImage: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          keyRoles: {
            populate: {
              icon: true
            }
          },
          impactAreas: {
            populate: {
              image: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          economicContributions: true,
          testimonial: {
            populate: {
              photo: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    });

    pageData = response.data.attributes;

    if (!pageData) {
      notFound();
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching role in ghana page:', error);
    notFound();
  }

  return (
    <main className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative h-[600px] lg:h-[700px]">
        <div className="absolute inset-0">
          <Image
            src={getStrapiMedia(pageData.heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.url)}
            alt={pageData.heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.alternativeText}
            fill
            className="object-cover"
            priority
          />
          <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-[#01366b]/95 to-[#01366b]/70"></div>
        </div>

        <div className="relative h-full max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 flex items-center">
          <div className="max-w-3xl">
            <div className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 bg-white/10 rounded-full px-4 py-2 mb-6">
              <div className="w-2 h-2 bg-white rounded-full"></div>
              <span className="text-white text-sm font-semibold tracking-wide uppercase">
                {pageData.heroSection.badge}
              </span>
            </div>

            <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold text-white mb-6 leading-tight">
              {pageData.heroSection.title}
            </h1>

            <p className="text-lg lg:text-xl text-blue-100 leading-relaxed">
              {pageData.heroSection.subtitle}
            </p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Key Roles Grid */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Our Key Roles
            </h2>
            <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
              How credit unions contribute to Ghana's development and prosperity
            </p>
          </div>

          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
            {pageData.keyRoles.map((role) => {
              const IconComponent = iconMap[role.icon];
              return (
                <div
                  key={role.id}
                  className="bg-white rounded-2xl p-8 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300"
                >
                  <div
                    className="w-16 h-16 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mb-6"
                    style={{ backgroundColor: `${role.iconColor}15` }}
                  >
                    {IconComponent && (
                      <IconComponent size={32} style={{ color: role.iconColor }} />
                    )}
                  </div>

                  <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">
                    {role.title}
                  </h3>

                  <p className="text-gray-600 leading-relaxed">
                    {role.description}
                  </p>
                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Impact Areas */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28 bg-white">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Areas of Impact
            </h2>
            <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
              Transforming lives and communities across Ghana
            </p>
          </div>

          <div className="space-y-24">
            {pageData.impactAreas.map((area, index) => {
              const isEven = index % 2 === 0;
              return (
                <div
                  key={area.id}
                  className={`flex flex-col ${isEven ? 'lg:flex-row' : 'lg:flex-row-reverse'} gap-12 items-center`}
                >
                  {/* Image */}
                  <div className="w-full lg:w-1/2">
                    <div className="relative aspect-[4/3] rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-xl">
                      <Image
                        src={getStrapiMedia(area.image.data.attributes.url)}
                        alt={area.image.data.attributes.alternativeText}
                        fill
                        className="object-cover"
                      />
                    </div>
                  </div>

                  {/* Content */}
                  <div className="w-full lg:w-1/2">
                    <h3 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                      {area.title}
                    </h3>

                    <div
                      className="text-gray-600 leading-relaxed prose prose-lg max-w-none mb-8"
                      dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: area.description }}
                    />

                    {/* Statistics */}
                    <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-6">
                      {area.statistics.map((stat) => (
                        <div key={stat.order}>
                          <div className="text-2xl lg:text-3xl font-bold text-[#01366b] mb-1">
                            {stat.value}
                          </div>
                          <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">
                            {stat.label}
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      ))}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Economic Contributions */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28 bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] to-[#024d8a]">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-white mb-4">
              Economic Contributions
            </h2>
            <p className="text-lg text-blue-100 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
              Credit unions' measurable impact on Ghana's economy
            </p>
          </div>

          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8">
            {pageData.economicContributions.map((contribution) => {
              const IconComponent = iconMap[contribution.icon];
              return (
                <div
                  key={contribution.id}
                  className="bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-2xl p-6 text-center"
                >
                  <div className="flex justify-center mb-4">
                    {IconComponent && (
                      <IconComponent size={40} className="text-white" />
                    )}
                  </div>

                  <div className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-white mb-2">
                    {contribution.value}
                  </div>

                  <div className="text-sm font-semibold text-blue-100 mb-2">
                    {contribution.metric}
                  </div>

                  <p className="text-sm text-blue-200">
                    {contribution.description}
                  </p>
                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Testimonial */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="bg-white rounded-3xl shadow-2xl p-8 lg:p-12">
            <div className="flex flex-col lg:flex-row gap-8 items-center">
              {/* Photo */}
              <div className="flex-shrink-0">
                <div className="relative w-32 h-32 lg:w-40 lg:h-40 rounded-full overflow-hidden">
                  <Image
                    src={getStrapiMedia(pageData.testimonial.photo.data.attributes.url)}
                    alt={pageData.testimonial.photo.data.attributes.alternativeText}
                    fill
                    className="object-cover"
                  />
                </div>
              </div>

              {/* Quote */}
              <div className="flex-1 text-center lg:text-left">
                <div className="text-5xl text-[#01366b] mb-4">"</div>
                <p className="text-lg lg:text-xl text-gray-700 leading-relaxed mb-6 italic">
                  {pageData.testimonial.quote}
                </p>
                <div>
                  <p className="font-bold text-gray-900 text-lg">
                    {pageData.testimonial.name}
                  </p>
                  <p className="text-gray-600">
                    {pageData.testimonial.position}
                  </p>
                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                    {pageData.testimonial.organization}
                  </p>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
    </main>
  );
}
```

### Strapi Content Type Structure

**Single Type**: `role-in-ghana-page`

**Fields**:

1. **heroSection** (Component, Required)
   - badge (Text) - "Our Impact"
   - title (Text) - Hero title
   - subtitle (Text) - Hero subtitle
   - backgroundImage (Media) - Hero background image (1920x1080px)

2. **keyRoles** (Repeatable Component)
   - icon (Text) - Icon name from React Icons (FiUsers, FiTrendingUp, etc.)
   - iconColor (Text) - Hex color code for icon
   - title (Text) - Role title
   - description (Text) - Role description
   - order (Integer) - Display order

3. **impactAreas** (Repeatable Component)
   - title (Text) - Area title
   - description (Rich Text) - Detailed description
   - image (Media) - Supporting image (800x600px)
   - statistics (Repeatable Component)
     - label (Text)
     - value (Text)
     - order (Integer)
   - order (Integer) - Display order

4. **economicContributions** (Repeatable Component)
   - metric (Text) - Contribution metric name
   - value (Text) - Metric value
   - description (Text) - Brief explanation
   - icon (Text) - Icon name from React Icons
   - order (Integer) - Display order

5. **testimonial** (Component)
   - quote (Text, Long) - Testimonial quote
   - name (Text) - Person's name
   - position (Text) - Job title
   - organization (Text) - Organization name
   - photo (Media) - Headshot photo (400x400px)

### API Summary

**Total API Calls**: 1 (Role in Ghana Page Content)

**Caching Strategy**:
- ISR with 1-hour revalidation (3600s)
- Content updates reflect within 1 hour

**Key Features**:
- Full-width hero section with background image overlay
- 6 key roles in 3-column grid with colored icons
- 4 impact areas with alternating image/content layout
- Statistics for each impact area (3 stats per area)
- Economic contributions section with 4 major metrics
- Featured testimonial from Bank of Ghana Governor
- Responsive layouts throughout

**Content Sections**:
1. Hero with background image
2. Key Roles (6 cards)
3. Impact Areas (4 detailed sections with images and statistics)
4. Economic Contributions (4 metrics)
5. Testimonial (1 featured quote)

### Page Implementation

**File**: `app/about-us/potential-and-size/page.js`

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import {
  FiUsers, FiHome, FiDollarSign, FiTrendingUp,
  FiCreditCard, FiMapPin, FiCheckCircle, FiAlertCircle
} from 'react-icons/fi';

// ISR with 1 hour revalidation
export const revalidate = 3600;

export const metadata = {
  title: 'Potential & Size - CUA Ghana',
  description: 'Explore the scale, growth trends, and market potential of Ghana\'s credit union movement with comprehensive statistics and analysis.',
};

// Icon mapping
const iconMap = {
  FiUsers,
  FiHome,
  FiDollarSign,
  FiTrendingUp,
  FiCreditCard,
  FiMapPin
};

export default async function PotentialSizePage() {
  let pageData;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/potential-size-page', {
      query: {
        populate: {
          heroSection: {
            populate: {
              backgroundImage: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          overviewStatistics: true,
          growthTrends: {
            populate: {
              chartData: true
            }
          },
          regionalDistribution: {
            populate: {
              mapImage: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              },
              regions: true
            }
          },
          marketPotential: true,
          comparativeAnalysis: true
        }
      }
    });

    pageData = response.data.attributes;

    if (!pageData) {
      notFound();
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching potential & size page:', error);
    notFound();
  }

  return (
    <main className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative h-[600px] lg:h-[700px]">
        <div className="absolute inset-0">
          <Image
            src={getStrapiMedia(pageData.heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.url)}
            alt={pageData.heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.alternativeText}
            fill
            className="object-cover"
            priority
          />
          <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-[#01366b]/95 to-[#01366b]/70"></div>
        </div>

        <div className="relative h-full max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 flex items-center">
          <div className="max-w-3xl">
            <div className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 bg-white/10 rounded-full px-4 py-2 mb-6">
              <div className="w-2 h-2 bg-white rounded-full"></div>
              <span className="text-white text-sm font-semibold tracking-wide uppercase">
                {pageData.heroSection.badge}
              </span>
            </div>

            <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold text-white mb-6 leading-tight">
              {pageData.heroSection.title}
            </h1>

            <p className="text-lg lg:text-xl text-blue-100 leading-relaxed">
              {pageData.heroSection.subtitle}
            </p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Overview Statistics */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Sector at a Glance
            </h2>
            <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
              Key statistics defining Ghana's credit union movement
            </p>
          </div>

          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
            {pageData.overviewStatistics.map((stat) => {
              const IconComponent = iconMap[stat.icon];
              return (
                <div
                  key={stat.id}
                  className="bg-white rounded-2xl p-8 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300"
                >
                  <div className="flex items-start justify-between mb-4">
                    <div className="w-14 h-14 bg-blue-50 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center">
                      {IconComponent && (
                        <IconComponent size={28} className="text-[#01366b]" />
                      )}
                    </div>
                    {stat.growthRate && (
                      <span className="text-sm font-semibold text-green-600 bg-green-50 px-3 py-1 rounded-full">
                        {stat.growthRate}
                      </span>
                    )}
                  </div>

                  <div className="text-4xl font-bold text-[#01366b] mb-2">
                    {stat.value}
                  </div>

                  <div className="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                    {stat.category}
                  </div>

                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-3">
                    {stat.description}
                  </p>

                  {stat.percentageOfPopulation && (
                    <p className="text-xs text-gray-500">
                      {stat.percentageOfPopulation} of adult population
                    </p>
                  )}
                  {stat.percentageOfGDP && (
                    <p className="text-xs text-gray-500">
                      {stat.percentageOfGDP} of Ghana's GDP
                    </p>
                  )}
                  {stat.averageLoanSize && (
                    <p className="text-xs text-gray-500">
                      Avg loan: {stat.averageLoanSize}
                    </p>
                  )}
                  {stat.coverage && (
                    <p className="text-xs text-gray-500">
                      Coverage: {stat.coverage}
                    </p>
                  )}
                </div>
              );
            })}

          {/* Chart Data Table */}

                <tr>
                  <th className="text-left py-4 px-6 font-bold text-gray-900">Country</th>
                  <th className="text-right py-4 px-6 font-bold text-gray-900">Penetration</th>
                  <th className="text-right py-4 px-6 font-bold text-gray-900">Members/CU</th>
                  <th className="text-right py-4 px-6 font-bold text-gray-900">Assets/Member</th>
                </tr>
              </thead>
              <tbody>
                {pageData.comparativeAnalysis.regionalComparison.map((country, index) => (
                  <tr
                    key={country.order}
                    className={`border-b border-gray-200 ${
                      country.country === 'Ghana' ? 'bg-blue-50 font-semibold' : ''
                    }`}
                  >
                    <td className="py-4 px-6 text-gray-900">
                      {country.country}
                      {country.country === 'Ghana' && (
                        <span className="ml-2 text-xs bg-[#01366b] text-white px-2 py-1 rounded">
                          Our Market
                        </span>
                      )}
                    </td>
                    <td className="text-right py-4 px-6 text-gray-700">
                      {country.penetration}
                    </td>
                    <td className="text-right py-4 px-6 text-gray-700">
                      {country.membersPerCU}
                    </td>
                    <td className="text-right py-4 px-6 text-gray-700">
                      {country.assetsPerMember}
                    </td>
                  </tr>
                ))}
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>

          {/* Insights */}
          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
            {pageData.comparativeAnalysis.insights.map((item) => (
              <div
                key={item.order}
                className="bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-xl p-6"
              >
                <FiCheckCircle className="text-white mb-3" size={24} />
                <p className="text-white leading-relaxed">{item.insight}</p>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
    </main>
  );
}
```

### Strapi Content Type Structure

**Single Type**: `potential-size-page`

**Fields**:

1. **heroSection** (Component, Required)
   - badge, title, subtitle, backgroundImage

2. **overviewStatistics** (Repeatable Component)
   - category, value, description, icon
   - percentageOfPopulation, percentageOfGDP, growthRate, averageLoanSize, coverage (optional)
   - order

3. **growthTrends** (Component)
   - title, description
   - chartData (Repeatable Component): year, members, assets, savings, loans
   - keyInsights (Repeatable Component): metric, value, period, description

4. **regionalDistribution** (Component)
   - title, description, mapImage
   - regions (Repeatable Component): name, creditUnions, members, totalAssets, penetrationRate, order

5. **marketPotential** (Component)
   - title, description
   - projections (Repeatable Component): scenario, targetPenetration, potentialMembers, potentialAssets, timeframe, assumptions, order
   - barriers (Repeatable Component): barrier, impact, description, order
   - opportunities (Repeatable Component): opportunity, potential, description, order

6. **comparativeAnalysis** (Component)
   - title, description
   - regionalComparison (Repeatable Component): country, penetration, membersPerCU, assetsPerMember, order
   - insights (Repeatable Component): insight, order

### API Summary

**Total API Calls**: 1

**Key Features**:
- 6 overview statistics cards
- Growth trends with 6-year data table
- Regional distribution with Ghana map + data table for 16 regions
- 3 growth projection scenarios
- Barriers & opportunities analysis
- Regional comparison with 5 African countries
