### Page Implementation

**File**: `app/our-work/what-we-do/page.js`

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import {
  FiMic, FiBook, FiShield, FiSearch, FiUsers, FiTrendingUp,
  FiMapPin, FiSmartphone, FiSun, FiTool, FiDatabase,
  FiFileText, FiMegaphone, FiShoppingCart, FiMap, FiGlobe, FiAlertTriangle
} from 'react-icons/fi';

// ISR with 1 hour revalidation
export const revalidate = 3600;

export const metadata = {
  title: 'What We Do - CUA Ghana',
  description: 'Discover how CUA Ghana strengthens credit unions through advocacy, training, regulatory support, and development programs.',
};

// Icon mapping
const iconMap = {
  FiMic, FiBook, FiShield, FiSearch, FiUsers, FiTrendingUp,
  FiMapPin, FiSmartphone, FiSun, FiTool, FiDatabase,
  FiFileText, FiMegaphone, FiShoppingCart, FiMap, FiGlobe, FiAlertTriangle
};

export default async function WhatWeDoPage() {
  let pageData;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/what-we-do-page', {
      query: {
        populate: {
          heroSection: {
            populate: {
              backgroundImage: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          coreFunctions: {
            populate: {
              icon: true,
              image: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          programs: {
            populate: {
              icon: true,
              beneficiaries: true
            }
          },
          services: {
            populate: {
              icon: true
            }
          }
        }
      }
    });

    pageData = response.data.attributes;

    if (!pageData) {
      notFound();
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching what we do page:', error);
    notFound();
  }

  return (
    <main className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative h-[600px] lg:h-[700px]">
        <div className="absolute inset-0">
          <Image
            src={getStrapiMedia(pageData.heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.url)}
            alt={pageData.heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.alternativeText}
            fill
            className="object-cover"
            priority
          />
          <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-[#01366b]/95 to-[#01366b]/70"></div>
        </div>

        <div className="relative h-full max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 flex items-center">
          <div className="max-w-3xl">
            <div className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 bg-white/10 rounded-full px-4 py-2 mb-6">
              <div className="w-2 h-2 bg-white rounded-full"></div>
              <span className="text-white text-sm font-semibold tracking-wide uppercase">
                {pageData.heroSection.badge}
              </span>
            </div>

            <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold text-white mb-6 leading-tight">
              {pageData.heroSection.title}
            </h1>

            <p className="text-lg lg:text-xl text-blue-100 leading-relaxed">
              {pageData.heroSection.subtitle}
            </p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Core Functions */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Our Core Functions
            </h2>
            <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
              Six key areas where we support and strengthen Ghana's credit union movement
            </p>
          </div>

          <div className="space-y-24">
            {pageData.coreFunctions.map((func, index) => {
              const isEven = index % 2 === 0;
              const IconComponent = iconMap[func.icon];

              return (
                <div
                  key={func.id}
                  className={`flex flex-col ${isEven ? 'lg:flex-row' : 'lg:flex-row-reverse'} gap-12 items-center`}
                >
                  {/* Image */}
                  <div className="w-full lg:w-1/2">
                    <div className="relative aspect-[4/3] rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-xl">
                      <Image
                        src={getStrapiMedia(func.image.data.attributes.url)}
                        alt={func.image.data.attributes.alternativeText}
                        fill
                        className="object-cover"
                      />
                    </div>
                  </div>

                  {/* Content */}
                  <div className="w-full lg:w-1/2">
                    <div className="flex items-center space-x-4 mb-4">
                      <div
                        className="w-16 h-16 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center"
                        style={{ backgroundColor: `${func.iconColor}15` }}
                      >
                        {IconComponent && (
                          <IconComponent size={32} style={{ color: func.iconColor }} />
                        )}
                      </div>
                      <h3 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900">
                        {func.title}
                      </h3>
                    </div>

                    <div
                      className="text-gray-600 leading-relaxed prose prose-lg max-w-none mb-6"
                      dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: func.description }}
                    />

                    {/* Key Activities */}
                    <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-xl p-6">
                      <h4 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">Key Activities:</h4>
                      <ul className="space-y-2">
                        {func.keyActivities.map((activity, idx) => (
                          <li key={idx} className="flex items-start">
                            <span className="text-[#01366b] mr-2">•</span>
                            <span className="text-gray-700">{activity}</span>
                          </li>
                        ))}
                      </ul>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Programs */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28 bg-white">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Our Programs
            </h2>
            <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
              Targeted initiatives addressing specific needs and opportunities in the credit union sector
            </p>
          </div>

          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
            {pageData.programs.map((program) => {
              const IconComponent = iconMap[program.icon];

              return (
                <div
                  key={program.id}
                  className="bg-gray-50 rounded-2xl p-8 hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300"
                >
                  <div
                    className="w-16 h-16 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mb-6"
                    style={{ backgroundColor: `${program.iconColor}15` }}
                  >
                    {IconComponent && (
                      <IconComponent size={32} style={{ color: program.iconColor }} />
                    )}
                  </div>

                  <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">
                    {program.title}
                  </h3>

                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-4">
                    {program.description}
                  </p>

                  <div className="flex items-center justify-between text-xs text-gray-500 mb-6 pb-4 border-b">
                    <span>Target: {program.targetGroup}</span>
                    <span>Since {program.launchYear}</span>
                  </div>

                  {/* Beneficiaries */}
                  <div className="space-y-3">
                    {program.beneficiaries.map((ben) => (
                      <div key={ben.order} className="flex justify-between items-center">
                        <span className="text-sm text-gray-600">{ben.metric}</span>
                        <span className="text-lg font-bold text-[#01366b]">{ben.value}</span>
                      </div>
                    ))}
                  </div>
                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Services */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Support Services
            </h2>
            <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
              Comprehensive services available to all member credit unions
            </p>
          </div>

          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6">
            {pageData.services.map((service) => {
              const IconComponent = iconMap[service.icon];

              return (
                <div
                  key={service.id}
                  className="bg-white rounded-xl p-6 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300 text-center"
                >
                  <div className="flex justify-center mb-4">
                    {IconComponent && (
                      <IconComponent size={40} className="text-[#01366b]" />
                    )}
                  </div>

                  <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                    {service.title}
                  </h3>

                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
                    {service.description}
                  </p>
                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* CTA Section */}
      <section className="py-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] to-[#024d8a]">
        <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center">
          <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-white mb-6">
            Partner with CUA Ghana
          </h2>
          <p className="text-lg text-blue-100 mb-8 leading-relaxed">
            Whether you're starting a credit union, seeking training, or looking for support services, we're here to help.
          </p>
          <a
            href="/contact"
            className="inline-block bg-white text-[#01366b] px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-bold hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors duration-200"
          >
            Get in Touch
          </a>
        </div>
      </section>
    </main>
  );
}
```

### Strapi Content Type Structure

**Single Type**: `what-we-do-page`

**Fields**:

1. **heroSection** (Component, Required)
   - badge, title, subtitle, backgroundImage

2. **coreFunctions** (Repeatable Component)
   - title (Text)
   - icon (Text) - Icon name
   - iconColor (Text) - Hex color
   - description (Rich Text)
   - keyActivities (JSON) - Array of activity strings
   - image (Media)
   - order (Integer)

3. **programs** (Repeatable Component)
   - title (Text)
   - icon (Text) - Icon name
   - iconColor (Text) - Hex color
   - description (Text)
   - targetGroup (Text)
   - launchYear (Text)
   - beneficiaries (Repeatable Component): metric, value, order
   - order (Integer)

4. **services** (Repeatable Component)
   - title (Text)
   - icon (Text) - Icon name
   - description (Text)
   - order (Integer)

### API Summary

**Total API Calls**: 1

**Key Features**:
- 6 core functions with alternating image/content layout
- Each function includes key activities list
- 6 targeted programs with beneficiary metrics
- 8 support services in grid layout
- CTA section linking to contact page

**Content Sections**:
1. Hero
2. Core Functions (6 detailed sections)
3. Programs (6 cards with metrics)
4. Services (8 service cards)
5. CTA

### Page Implementation

**File**: `app/our-work/our-chapters/page.js`

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { FiMapPin, FiMail, FiPhone, FiUsers, FiHome, FiCalendar } from 'react-icons/fi';

// ISR with 1 hour revalidation
export const revalidate = 3600;

export const metadata = {
  title: 'Our Chapters - CUA Ghana',
  description: 'Explore CUA Ghana\'s regional chapters across the country, coordinating credit union activities and supporting local communities.',
};

export default async function ChaptersPage() {
  let chapters;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/chapters', {
      query: {
        filters: {
          isActive: { $eq: true }
        },
        sort: ['region:asc'],
        populate: {
          coverImage: {
            fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
          },
          chairperson: {
            populate: {
              photo: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          }
        },
        fields: [
          'name',
          'region',
          'description',
          'email',
          'phone',
          'address',
          'memberCreditUnions',
          'totalMembers',
          'establishedYear',
          'slug'
        ]
      }
    });

    chapters = response.data;

    if (!chapters || chapters.length === 0) {
      notFound();
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching chapters:', error);
    notFound();
  }

  return (
    <main className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] via-[#024d8a] to-[#01366b] py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-[url('/images/patterns/grid.svg')] opacity-10"></div>

        <div className="relative max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center">
          <div className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 bg-white/10 rounded-full px-4 py-2 mb-6">
            <div className="w-2 h-2 bg-white rounded-full"></div>
            <span className="text-white text-sm font-semibold tracking-wide uppercase">
              Our Network
            </span>
          </div>

          <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold text-white mb-6 leading-tight">
            Our Chapters
          </h1>

          <p className="text-lg lg:text-xl text-blue-100 max-w-3xl mx-auto leading-relaxed">
            CUA Ghana operates through regional chapters that coordinate activities, provide support, and advocate for credit unions across the country
          </p>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Chapters Grid */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
            {chapters.map((chapter) => {
              const c = chapter.attributes;
              return (
                <div
                  key={chapter.id}
                  className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300"
                >
                  {/* Cover Image */}
                  <div className="relative h-48">
                    <Image
                      src={getStrapiMedia(c.coverImage.data.attributes.url)}
                      alt={c.coverImage.data.attributes.alternativeText}
                      fill
                      className="object-cover"
                    />
                    <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-t from-black/60 to-transparent"></div>
                    <div className="absolute bottom-4 left-6">
                      <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-white">{c.name}</h2>
                    </div>
                  </div>

                  {/* Content */}
                  <div className="p-6 space-y-6">
                    {/* Statistics */}
                    <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-4">
                      <div className="text-center">
                        <div className="flex justify-center mb-2">
                          <FiHome size={24} className="text-[#01366b]" />
                        </div>
                        <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-[#01366b]">
                          {c.memberCreditUnions}
                        </div>
                        <div className="text-xs text-gray-600">Credit Unions</div>
                      </div>
                      <div className="text-center">
                        <div className="flex justify-center mb-2">
                          <FiUsers size={24} className="text-green-600" />
                        </div>
                        <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-green-600">
                          {(c.totalMembers / 1000).toFixed(0)}K
                        </div>
                        <div className="text-xs text-gray-600">Members</div>
                      </div>
                      <div className="text-center">
                        <div className="flex justify-center mb-2">
                          <FiCalendar size={24} className="text-orange-600" />
                        </div>
                        <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-orange-600">
                          {c.establishedYear}
                        </div>
                        <div className="text-xs text-gray-600">Established</div>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Description */}
                    <div
                      className="text-gray-600 text-sm leading-relaxed prose prose-sm max-w-none line-clamp-3"
                      dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: c.description }}
                    />

                    {/* Chairperson */}
                    {c.chairperson && (
                      <div className="flex items-center space-x-4 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200">
                        <div className="relative w-16 h-16 rounded-full overflow-hidden flex-shrink-0">
                          <Image
                            src={getStrapiMedia(c.chairperson.photo.data.attributes.url)}
                            alt={c.chairperson.photo.data.attributes.alternativeText}
                            fill
                            className="object-cover"
                          />
                        </div>
                        <div className="flex-1">
                          <p className="font-bold text-gray-900">{c.chairperson.name}</p>
                          <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">{c.chairperson.position}</p>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    )}

                    {/* Contact Info */}
                    <div className="space-y-2 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200">
                      <div className="flex items-start space-x-3 text-sm">
                        <FiMapPin className="text-gray-400 mt-1 flex-shrink-0" size={16} />
                        <span className="text-gray-700">{c.address}</span>
                      </div>
                      <div className="flex items-center space-x-3 text-sm">
                        <FiPhone className="text-gray-400 flex-shrink-0" size={16} />
                        <a href={`tel:${c.phone}`} className="text-[#01366b] hover:underline">
                          {c.phone}
                        </a>
                      </div>
                      <div className="flex items-center space-x-3 text-sm">
                        <FiMail className="text-gray-400 flex-shrink-0" size={16} />
                        <a href={`mailto:${c.email}`} className="text-[#01366b] hover:underline">
                          {c.email}
                        </a>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    {/* View Details Button */}
                    <Link
                      href={`/our-work/chapters/${c.slug}`}
                      className="block w-full text-center bg-[#01366b] text-white py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold hover:bg-[#024d8a] transition-colors duration-200"
                    >
                      View Chapter Details
                    </Link>
                  </div>
                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
    </main>
  );
}
```

### Strapi Content Type Structure

**Collection Type**: `chapters`

**Fields**:

1. **name** (Text, Required)
   - Chapter name (e.g., "Greater Accra Chapter")

2. **region** (Text, Required)
   - Region name for sorting and grouping

3. **slug** (UID, Required)
   - URL-friendly identifier (auto-generated from name)

4. **description** (Rich Text, Required)
   - Chapter overview and mission (2-3 paragraphs)

5. **email** (Email, Required)
   - Chapter contact email

6. **phone** (Text, Required)
   - Chapter contact phone

7. **address** (Text, Required)
   - Physical address

8. **memberCreditUnions** (Integer, Required)
   - Number of member credit unions

9. **totalMembers** (Integer, Required)
   - Total members across all credit unions

10. **establishedYear** (Text, Required)
    - Year chapter was established

11. **coverImage** (Media, Required)
    - Chapter cover photo (1200x600px)

12. **chairperson** (Component)
    - name (Text)
    - position (Text)
    - phone (Text)
    - email (Email)
    - photo (Media) - Headshot (400x400px)

13. **isActive** (Boolean, Required, Default: true)
    - Whether to display this chapter

### API Summary

**Total API Calls**: 1 (Chapters List)

**Caching Strategy**:
- ISR with 1-hour revalidation (3600s)
- Content updates reflect within 1 hour

**Key Features**:
- 2-column grid layout for chapters
- Cover image with overlay and chapter name
- Statistics display (CUs, members, established year)
- Chairperson information with photo
- Contact details (address, phone, email)
- Link to detailed chapter page
- Sorted alphabetically by region

**Content Display**:
- Cover image with gradient overlay
- 3 key statistics in grid
- Brief description (line-clamped)
- Chairperson card with photo
- Full contact information
- Call-to-action button

### Page Implementation

**File**: `app/our-work/chapters/[slug]/page.js`

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import {
  FiMapPin, FiMail, FiPhone, FiUsers, FiHome,
  FiCalendar, FiDollarSign, FiArrowLeft
} from 'react-icons/fi';

// ISR with 1 hour revalidation
export const revalidate = 3600;

// Generate static params for all chapters
export async function generateStaticParams() {
  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/chapters', {
      query: {
        fields: ['slug']
      }
    });

    return response.data.map((chapter) => ({
      slug: chapter.attributes.slug,
    }));
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error generating static params:', error);
    return [];
  }
}

// Generate metadata
export async function generateMetadata({ params }) {
  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/chapters', {
      query: {
        filters: {
          slug: { $eq: params.slug }
        },
        fields: ['name', 'description']
      }
    });

    if (!response.data || response.data.length === 0) {
      return {
        title: 'Chapter Not Found - CUA Ghana',
      };
    }

    const chapter = response.data[0].attributes;
    return {
      title: `${chapter.name} - CUA Ghana`,
      description: chapter.description.replace(/<[^>]*>/g, '').substring(0, 160),
    };
  } catch (error) {
    return {
      title: 'Chapter - CUA Ghana',
    };
  }
}

export default async function ChapterDetailPage({ params }) {
  let chapter;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/chapters', {
      query: {
        filters: {
          slug: { $eq: params.slug }
        },
        populate: {
          coverImage: {
            fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
          },
          chairperson: {
            populate: {
              photo: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          leadership: {
            populate: {
              photo: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          activities: true,
          recentEvents: {
            populate: {
              image: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          gallery: {
            fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
          }
        }
      }
    });

    if (!response.data || response.data.length === 0) {
      notFound();
    }

    chapter = response.data[0].attributes;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching chapter:', error);
    notFound();
  }

  return (
    <main className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative h-[400px] lg:h-[500px]">
        <Image
          src={getStrapiMedia(chapter.coverImage.data.attributes.url)}
          alt={chapter.coverImage.data.attributes.alternativeText}
          fill
          className="object-cover"
          priority
        />
        <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-black/80 to-black/40"></div>

        <div className="relative h-full max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 flex flex-col justify-between py-12">
          {/* Back Button */}
          <Link
            href="/our-work/our-chapters"
            className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 text-white hover:text-blue-200 transition-colors w-fit"
          >
            <FiArrowLeft size={20} />
            <span>Back to Chapters</span>
          </Link>

          {/* Chapter Name */}
          <div>
            <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold text-white mb-4">
              {chapter.name}
            </h1>
            <p className="text-lg text-blue-100">Established {chapter.establishedYear}</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Statistics Bar */}
      <section className="bg-white border-b">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 py-8">
          <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6">
            <div className="text-center">
              <FiHome size={32} className="mx-auto text-[#01366b] mb-2" />
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-[#01366b]">{chapter.memberCreditUnions}</div>
              <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">Member Credit Unions</div>
            </div>
            <div className="text-center">
              <FiUsers size={32} className="mx-auto text-green-600 mb-2" />
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-green-600">
                {(chapter.totalMembers / 1000).toFixed(0)}K
              </div>
              <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">Total Members</div>
            </div>
            <div className="text-center">
              <FiDollarSign size={32} className="mx-auto text-orange-600 mb-2" />
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-orange-600">{chapter.totalAssets}</div>
              <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">Total Assets</div>
            </div>
            <div className="text-center">
              <FiCalendar size={32} className="mx-auto text-purple-600 mb-2" />
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-purple-600">
                {new Date().getFullYear() - parseInt(chapter.establishedYear)}+
              </div>
              <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">Years of Service</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Main Content */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="grid lg:grid-cols-3 gap-12">
            {/* Main Column */}
            <div className="lg:col-span-2 space-y-12">
              {/* About */}
              <div>
                <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">About the Chapter</h2>
                <div
                  className="prose prose-lg max-w-none text-gray-600"
                  dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: chapter.description }}
                />
              </div>

              {/* Leadership */}
              <div>
                <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Leadership Team</h2>

                {/* Chairperson */}
                <div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] to-[#024d8a] rounded-2xl p-8 text-white mb-6">
                  <div className="flex items-center space-x-6">
                    <div className="relative w-24 h-24 rounded-full overflow-hidden flex-shrink-0">
                      <Image
                        src={getStrapiMedia(chapter.chairperson.photo.data.attributes.url)}
                        alt={chapter.chairperson.photo.data.attributes.alternativeText}
                        fill
                        className="object-cover"
                      />
                    </div>
                    <div className="flex-1">
                      <p className="text-sm text-blue-200 mb-1">{chapter.chairperson.position}</p>
                      <h3 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-2">{chapter.chairperson.name}</h3>
                      {chapter.chairperson.bio && (
                        <div
                          className="text-sm text-blue-100"
                          dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: chapter.chairperson.bio }}
                        />
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                {/* Other Leadership */}
                <div className="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
                  {chapter.leadership.map((leader) => (
                    <div key={leader.id} className="bg-white rounded-xl p-6 shadow-lg text-center">
                      <div className="relative w-20 h-20 rounded-full overflow-hidden mx-auto mb-4">
                        <Image
                          src={getStrapiMedia(leader.photo.data.attributes.url)}
                          alt={leader.photo.data.attributes.alternativeText}
                          fill
                          className="object-cover"
                        />
                      </div>
                      <h4 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-1">{leader.name}</h4>
                      <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">{leader.position}</p>
                    </div>
                  ))}
                </div>
              </div>

              {/* Activities */}
              <div>
                <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Chapter Activities</h2>
                <div className="space-y-4">
                  {chapter.activities.map((activity) => (
                    <div key={activity.id} className="bg-white rounded-xl p-6 shadow-lg">
                      <div className="flex items-start justify-between mb-3">
                        <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">{activity.title}</h3>
                        <span className="text-sm font-semibold text-[#01366b] bg-blue-50 px-3 py-1 rounded-full">
                          {activity.frequency}
                        </span>
                      </div>
                      <p className="text-gray-600">{activity.description}</p>
                    </div>
                  ))}
                </div>
              </div>

              {/* Recent Events */}
              <div>
                <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Recent Events</h2>
                <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
                  {chapter.recentEvents.map((event) => (
                    <div key={event.id} className="bg-white rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-lg">
                      <div className="relative h-48">
                        <Image
                          src={getStrapiMedia(event.image.data.attributes.url)}
                          alt={event.image.data.attributes.alternativeText}
                          fill
                          className="object-cover"
                        />
                      </div>
                      <div className="p-6">
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-500 mb-2">
                          {new Date(event.date).toLocaleDateString('en-GB', {
                            day: 'numeric',
                            month: 'long',
                            year: 'numeric'
                          })}
                        </p>
                        <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">{event.title}</h3>
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">{event.description}</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  ))}
                </div>
              </div>

              {/* Gallery */}
              {chapter.gallery.data && chapter.gallery.data.length > 0 && (
                <div>
                  <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Photo Gallery</h2>
                  <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
                    {chapter.gallery.data.map((image) => (
                      <div key={image.id} className="relative aspect-square rounded-lg overflow-hidden">
                        <Image
                          src={getStrapiMedia(image.attributes.url)}
                          alt={image.attributes.alternativeText}
                          fill
                          className="object-cover hover:scale-110 transition-transform duration-300"
                        />
                      </div>
                    ))}
                  </div>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>

            {/* Sidebar */}
            <div className="space-y-8">
              {/* Contact Card */}
              <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl p-8 shadow-lg sticky top-8">
                <h3 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Contact Information</h3>

                <div className="space-y-4">
                  <div className="flex items-start space-x-3">
                    <FiMapPin className="text-[#01366b] mt-1 flex-shrink-0" size={20} />
                    <div>
                      <p className="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-1">Address</p>
                      <p className="text-gray-600">{chapter.address}</p>
                      {chapter.gpsAddress && (
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-500 mt-1">GPS: {chapter.gpsAddress}</p>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </div>

                  <div className="flex items-start space-x-3">
                    <FiPhone className="text-[#01366b] mt-1 flex-shrink-0" size={20} />
                    <div>
                      <p className="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-1">Phone</p>
                      <a href={`tel:${chapter.phone}`} className="text-[#01366b] hover:underline">
                        {chapter.phone}
                      </a>
                    </div>
                  </div>

                  <div className="flex items-start space-x-3">
                    <FiMail className="text-[#01366b] mt-1 flex-shrink-0" size={20} />
                    <div>
                      <p className="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-1">Email</p>
                      <a href={`mailto:${chapter.email}`} className="text-[#01366b] hover:underline">
                        {chapter.email}
                      </a>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <a
                  href={`mailto:${chapter.email}`}
                  className="block w-full text-center bg-[#01366b] text-white py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold hover:bg-[#024d8a] transition-colors duration-200 mt-6"
                >
                  Get in Touch
                </a>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
    </main>
  );
}
```

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import {
  FiDollarSign, FiUsers, FiShield, FiHeart, FiPercent,
  FiUserCheck, FiHome, FiCalendar, FiCheckCircle, FiArrowRight
} from 'react-icons/fi';

// ISR with 1 hour revalidation
export const revalidate = 3600;

export const metadata = {
  title: 'Credit Unions Overview - CUA Ghana',
  description: 'Learn about credit unions in Ghana - member-owned, not-for-profit financial cooperatives offering better rates and personalized service.',
};

// Icon mapping
const iconMap = {
  FiDollarSign, FiUsers, FiShield, FiHeart, FiPercent,
  FiUserCheck, FiHome, FiCalendar
};

export default async function CreditUnionsOverviewPage() {
  let pageData;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/credit-unions-overview-page', {
      query: {
        populate: {
          heroSection: {
            populate: {
              backgroundImage: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          whatIsACreditUnion: {
            populate: {
              image: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          principles: true,
          benefits: {
            populate: {
              icon: true
            }
          },
          howItWorks: true,
          comparisonWithBanks: true,
          statistics: true
        }
      }
    });

    pageData = response.data.attributes;

    if (!pageData) {
      notFound();
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching credit unions overview:', error);
    notFound();
  }

  return (
    <main className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative h-[600px] lg:h-[700px]">
        <Image
          src={getStrapiMedia(pageData.heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.url)}
          alt={pageData.heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.alternativeText}
          fill
          className="object-cover"
          priority
        />
        <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-[#01366b]/95 to-[#01366b]/70"></div>

        <div className="relative h-full max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 flex items-center">
          <div className="max-w-3xl">
            <div className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 bg-white/10 rounded-full px-4 py-2 mb-6">
              <div className="w-2 h-2 bg-white rounded-full"></div>
              <span className="text-white text-sm font-semibold tracking-wide uppercase">
                {pageData.heroSection.badge}
              </span>
            </div>

            <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold text-white mb-6 leading-tight">

              >
                <span>Join a Credit Union</span>
                <FiArrowRight size={20} />
              </Link>
              <Link
                href="/find-credit-union"
                className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 bg-white/10 text-white border-2 border-white px-6 py-3 rounded-full font-bold hover:bg-white/20 transition-colors"

          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Statistics Bar */}
      <section className="bg-white border-b">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 py-12">
          <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-8">
            {pageData.statistics.map((stat) => {

                  <div className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-[#01366b] mb-2">

                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* What is a Credit Union */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">

      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28 bg-white">

          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">

                    {principle.order}

                    <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">{principle.title}</h3>
                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">{principle.description}</p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Benefits */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Benefits of Credit Union Membership
            </h2>
            <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
              Why choose a credit union over a traditional bank
            </p>
          </div>

          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
            {pageData.benefits.map((benefit) => {
              const IconComponent = iconMap[benefit.icon];
              return (
                <div
                  key={benefit.id}
                  className="bg-white rounded-2xl p-8 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow"
                >
                  <div
                    className="w-16 h-16 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mb-6"
                    style={{ backgroundColor: `${benefit.iconColor}15` }}
                  >
                    {IconComponent && (
                      <IconComponent size={32} style={{ color: benefit.iconColor }} />
                    )}
                  </div>
                  <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">{benefit.title}</h3>
                  <p className="text-gray-600">{benefit.description}</p>
                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* How It Works */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28 bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] to-[#024d8a]">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">

          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8">

                  {step.step}

                <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-white mb-3">{step.title}</h3>
                <p className="text-blue-100">{step.description}</p>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Comparison Table */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28 bg-white">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="text-center mb-16">
```

### Page Implementation

**File**: `app/credit-unions/top-20/page.js`

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import { FiUsers, FiDollarSign, FiTrendingUp, FiMail, FiPhone, FiExternalLink, FiAward } from 'react-icons/fi';

// ISR with 1 hour revalidation
export const revalidate = 3600;

export const metadata = {
  title: 'Top 20 Credit Unions - CUA Ghana',
  description: 'Discover Ghana\'s top 20 credit unions ranked by total assets, serving hundreds of thousands of members across the country.',
};

export default async function Top20Page() {
  let creditUnions;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/credit-unions', {
      query: {
        filters: {
          isActive: { $eq: true },
          isFeatured: { $eq: true }
        },
        sort: ['totalAssets:desc'],
        pagination: {
          limit: 20
        },
        populate: {
          logo: {
            fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
          }
        },
        fields: [
          'name',
          'location',
          'region',
          'totalAssets',
          'totalMembers',
          'totalLoans',
          'totalSavings',
          'establishedYear',
          'contactEmail',
          'contactPhone',
          'website',
          'rank'
        ]
      }
    });

    creditUnions = response.data;

    if (!creditUnions || creditUnions.length === 0) {
      notFound();
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching top 20 credit unions:', error);
    notFound();
  }

  // Calculate totals
  const totalMembers = creditUnions.reduce((sum, cu) => sum + cu.attributes.totalMembers, 0);
  const totalAssets = creditUnions.reduce((sum, cu) => {
    const assets = parseFloat(cu.attributes.totalAssets.replace(/[₵M]/g, ''));
    return sum + assets;
  }, 0);

  return (
    <main className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] via-[#024d8a] to-[#01366b] py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-[url('/images/patterns/grid.svg')] opacity-10"></div>

        <div className="relative max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center">
          <div className="inline-flex items-center space-x-2 bg-white/10 rounded-full px-4 py-2 mb-6">
            <FiAward className="text-white" size={20} />
            <span className="text-white text-sm font-semibold tracking-wide uppercase">
              Top Performers
            </span>
          </div>

          <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold text-white mb-6 leading-tight">
            Top 20 Credit Unions in Ghana
          </h1>

          <p className="text-lg lg:text-xl text-blue-100 max-w-3xl mx-auto leading-relaxed">
            Ranked by total assets, these credit unions represent the best in cooperative banking across Ghana
          </p>

          {/* Aggregate Stats */}
          <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6 mt-12 max-w-4xl mx-auto">
            <div className="bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-xl p-6">
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-white mb-2">20</div>
              <div className="text-sm text-blue-100">Top Credit Unions</div>
            </div>
            <div className="bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-xl p-6">
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-white mb-2">
                {(totalMembers / 1000).toFixed(0)}K+
              </div>
              <div className="text-sm text-blue-100">Combined Members</div>
            </div>
            <div className="bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-xl p-6 col-span-2 md:col-span-1">
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-white mb-2">₵{totalAssets.toFixed(0)}M+</div>
              <div className="text-sm text-blue-100">Combined Assets</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Credit Unions List */}
      <section className="py-20 lg:py-28">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <div className="space-y-6">
            {creditUnions.map((cu, index) => {
              const c = cu.attributes;
              const isTop3 = index < 3;

              return (
                <div
                  key={cu.id}
                  className={`bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300 ${
                    isTop3 ? 'border-2 border-[#01366b]' : ''
                  }`}
                >
                  <div className="p-6 md:p-8">
                    <div className="flex flex-col lg:flex-row gap-6">
                      {/* Rank & Logo */}
                      <div className="flex items-center space-x-6 lg:w-64 flex-shrink-0">
                        <div
                          className={`flex-shrink-0 w-16 h-16 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-2xl ${
                            index === 0
                              ? 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-700'
                              : index === 1
                              ? 'bg-gray-200 text-gray-700'
                              : index === 2
                              ? 'bg-orange-100 text-orange-700'
                              : 'bg-blue-50 text-[#01366b]'
                          }`}
                        >
                          #{c.rank}
                        </div>

                        {c.logo.data && (
                          <div className="relative w-32 h-16 flex-shrink-0">
                            <Image
                              src={getStrapiMedia(c.logo.data.attributes.url)}
                              alt={c.logo.data.attributes.alternativeText}
                              fill
                              className="object-contain"
                            />
                          </div>
                        )}
                      </div>

                      {/* Details */}
                      <div className="flex-1 space-y-4">
                        <div>
                          <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">{c.name}</h2>
                          <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-3 text-sm text-gray-600">
                            <span className="flex items-center">
                              <span className="font-semibold mr-2">Location:</span>
                              {c.location}, {c.region}
                            </span>
                            <span className="flex items-center">
                              <span className="font-semibold mr-2">Est:</span>
                              {c.establishedYear}
                            </span>
                          </div>
                        </div>

                        {/* Statistics Grid */}
                        <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4">
                          <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-4">
                            <div className="flex items-center text-[#01366b] mb-2">
                              <FiDollarSign size={20} className="mr-2" />
                              <span className="text-xs font-semibold">Total Assets</span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">{c.totalAssets}</div>
                          </div>

                          <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-4">
                            <div className="flex items-center text-green-600 mb-2">
                              <FiUsers size={20} className="mr-2" />
                              <span className="text-xs font-semibold">Members</span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">
                              {(c.totalMembers / 1000).toFixed(1)}K
                            </div>
                          </div>

                          <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-4">
                            <div className="flex items-center text-orange-600 mb-2">
                              <FiTrendingUp size={20} className="mr-2" />
                              <span className="text-xs font-semibold">Total Loans</span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">{c.totalLoans}</div>
                          </div>

                          <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-4">
                            <div className="flex items-center text-purple-600 mb-2">
                              <FiDollarSign size={20} className="mr-2" />
                              <span className="text-xs font-semibold">Total Savings</span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">{c.totalSavings}</div>
                          </div>
                        </div>

                        {/* Contact */}
                        <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-4 pt-4 border-t">
                          {c.contactEmail && (
                            <a
                              href={`mailto:${c.contactEmail}`}
                              className="inline-flex items-center text-sm text-gray-600 hover:text-[#01366b]"
                            >
                              <FiMail className="mr-2" size={16} />
                              {c.contactEmail}
                            </a>
                          )}
                          {c.contactPhone && (
                            <a
                              href={`tel:${c.contactPhone}`}
                              className="inline-flex items-center text-sm text-gray-600 hover:text-[#01366b]"
                            >
                              <FiPhone className="mr-2" size={16} />
                              {c.contactPhone}
                            </a>
                          )}
                          {c.website && (
                            <a
                              href={c.website}
                              target="_blank"
                              rel="noopener noreferrer"
                              className="inline-flex items-center text-sm text-[#01366b] font-semibold hover:underline"
                            >
                              Visit Website
                              <FiExternalLink className="ml-2" size={16} />
                            </a>
                          )}
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>

                  {isTop3 && (
                    <div className="bg-gradient-to-r from-[#01366b] to-[#024d8a] px-6 py-2">
                      <p className="text-white text-sm font-semibold text-center">
                        {index === 0
                          ? '🥇 #1 Largest Credit Union by Assets'
                          : index === 1
                          ? '🥈 #2 Largest Credit Union by Assets'
                          : '🥉 #3 Largest Credit Union by Assets'}
                      </p>
                    </div>
                  )}
                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* CTA Section */}
      <section className="py-20 bg-white">
        <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center">
          <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
            Join One of Ghana's Top Credit Unions
          </h2>
          <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 mb-8 leading-relaxed">
            Experience world-class cooperative banking with proven track records of member service and financial stability
          </p>
          <a
            href="/find-credit-union"
            className="inline-block bg-[#01366b] text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-bold hover:bg-[#024d8a] transition-colors"
          >
            Find a Credit Union Near You
          </a>
        </div>
      </section>
    </main>
  );
}
```

### Strapi Content Type Structure

**Collection Type**: `credit-unions`

**Fields**:

1. **name** (Text, Required)
   - Credit union name

2. **location** (Text, Required)
   - City/town location

3. **region** (Text, Required)
   - Region in Ghana

4. **totalAssets** (Text, Required)
   - Total assets (e.g., "₵850M")

5. **totalMembers** (Integer, Required)
   - Number of members

6. **totalLoans** (Text, Required)
   - Total loans disbursed (e.g., "₵620M")

7. **totalSavings** (Text, Required)
   - Total member savings (e.g., "₵720M")

8. **establishedYear** (Text, Required)
   - Year established

9. **contactEmail** (Email)
   - Contact email address

10. **contactPhone** (Text)
    - Contact phone number

11. **website** (Text)
    - Website URL

12. **logo** (Media)
    - Credit union logo (400x200px)

13. **rank** (Integer, Required)
    - Ranking position (1-20)

14. **isActive** (Boolean, Required, Default: true)
    - Whether to display

15. **isFeatured** (Boolean, Required, Default: false)
    - Whether in top 20

### API Summary

**Total API Calls**: 1 (Top 20 Credit Unions List)

**Caching Strategy**:
- ISR with 1-hour revalidation (3600s)
- Content updates reflect within 1 hour

**Key Features**:
- Hero with aggregate statistics
- Ranked list of 20 credit unions
- Top 3 highlighted with special border and badge
- 4 key metrics per credit union (Assets, Members, Loans, Savings)
- Contact information with clickable links
- Ranking badges with colors (gold, silver, bronze for top 3)
- CTA section

**Display Logic**:
- Top 3 get special border and footer badge
- Rank 1 = gold badge, Rank 2 = silver, Rank 3 = bronze
- Ranks 4-20 = blue badge
- All show logo, statistics, and contact info

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import Button from '@/app/components/Button';
import {
  FiUsers, FiDollarSign, FiShield, FiHeart, FiAward, FiPhone,
  FiUser, FiStar, FiBriefcase, FiMapPin, FiFileText, FiMonitor,
  FiEdit3, FiCheckCircle, FiArrowRight, FiCheck
} from 'react-icons/fi';

export const revalidate = 3600; // Revalidate every hour

// Icon mapping
const iconMap = {
  FiUsers, FiDollarSign, FiShield, FiHeart, FiAward, FiPhone,
  FiUser, FiStar, FiBriefcase, FiMapPin, FiFileText, FiMonitor,
  FiEdit3, FiCheckCircle, FiCheck
};

export async function generateMetadata() {
  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/credit-unions-members-page', {
      query: {
        populate: {
          seo: { populate: '*' }
        }
      }
    });

    const seo = response.data?.attributes?.seo;

    return {
      title: seo?.metaTitle || 'Become a Member | CUA Ghana',
      description: seo?.metaDescription || 'Join over 2.5 million Ghanaians who benefit from cooperative banking.',
      keywords: seo?.keywords,
      alternates: {
        canonical: seo?.canonicalURL
      },
      openGraph: {
        title: seo?.metaTitle,
        description: seo?.metaDescription,
        url: seo?.canonicalURL,
        type: 'website'
      }
    };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching SEO metadata:', error);
    return {
      title: 'Become a Member | CUA Ghana',
      description: 'Join a credit union today'
    };
  }
}

export default async function MembersPage() {
  let pageData;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/credit-unions-members-page', {
      query: {
        populate: {
          heroSection: {
            populate: {
              backgroundImage: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          benefitsSection: {
            populate: {
              benefits: { populate: '*' }
            }
          },
          membershipTypesSection: {
            populate: {
              membershipTypes: { populate: '*' }
            }
          },
          requirementsSection: { populate: '*' },
          processSection: {
            populate: {
              steps: { populate: '*' }
            }
          },
          feesSection: {
            populate: {
              feeStructure: { populate: '*' }
            }
          },
          testimonialsSection: {
            populate: {
              testimonials: {
                populate: {
                  member: {
                    populate: {
                      photo: {
                        fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },
          ctaSection: { populate: '*' }
        }
      }
    });

    pageData = response.data?.attributes;

    if (!pageData) {
      notFound();
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching members page:', error);
    notFound();
  }

  const {
    heroSection,
    benefitsSection,
    membershipTypesSection,
    requirementsSection,
    processSection,
    feesSection,
    testimonialsSection,
    ctaSection
  } = pageData;

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-white">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative h-[500px] lg:h-[600px] flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden">
        {heroSection?.backgroundImage?.data && (
          <Image
            src={getStrapiMedia(heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.url)}
            alt={heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.alternativeText || 'Members Hero'}
            fill
            className="object-cover"
            priority
          />
        )}
        <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-black/80 via-black/60 to-black/40"></div>

        <div className="relative z-10 max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center text-white">
          <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold mb-6 leading-tight">
            {heroSection?.title}
          </h1>
          <p className="text-xl lg:text-2xl mb-4 text-gray-200">
            {heroSection?.subtitle}
          </p>
          <p className="text-lg text-gray-300 max-w-3xl mx-auto mb-8">
            {heroSection?.description}
          </p>
          {heroSection?.ctaText && heroSection?.ctaLink && (
            <Link href={heroSection.ctaLink}>
              <Button size="lg" variant="primary" icon={FiArrowRight} iconPosition="right">
                {heroSection.ctaText}
              </Button>
            </Link>
          )}
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Benefits Section */}
      {benefitsSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {benefitsSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600">
                {benefitsSection.subtitle}
              </p>
            </div>

            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
              {benefitsSection.benefits?.map((benefit) => {
                const Icon = iconMap[benefit.icon] || FiCheck;
                return (
                  <div key={benefit.id} className="bg-white p-8 rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow">
                    <div
                      className="w-14 h-14 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center mb-6"
                      style={{ backgroundColor: `${benefit.color}15` }}
                    >
                      <Icon className="w-7 h-7" style={{ color: benefit.color }} />
                    </div>
                    <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">
                      {benefit.title}
                    </h3>
                    <p className="text-gray-600 leading-relaxed">
                      {benefit.description}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Membership Types Section */}
      {membershipTypesSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-white">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {membershipTypesSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600">
                {membershipTypesSection.subtitle}
              </p>
            </div>

            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
              {membershipTypesSection.membershipTypes?.map((type) => {
                const Icon = iconMap[type.icon] || FiUser;
                return (
                  <div
                    key={type.id}
                    className={`relative bg-white border-2 rounded-2xl p-8 ${
                      type.isPopular
                        ? 'border-[#01366b] shadow-lg'
                        : 'border-gray-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md'
                    } transition-shadow`}
                  >
                    {type.isPopular && (
                      <div className="absolute -top-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bg-[#01366b] text-white px-4 py-1 rounded-full text-sm font-semibold">
                        Most Popular
                      </div>
                    )}

                    <div className="flex items-start gap-4 mb-6">
                      <div className="w-12 h-12 bg-blue-50 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center flex-shrink-0">
                        <Icon className="w-6 h-6 text-[#01366b]" />
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                          {type.name}
                        </h3>
                        <p className="text-gray-600">
                          {type.description}
                        </p>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    <div className="space-y-3">
                      <p className="font-semibold text-gray-900 text-sm uppercase tracking-wide">
                        Eligibility:
                      </p>
                      <ul className="space-y-2">
                        {type.eligibility?.map((item, idx) => (
                          <li key={idx} className="flex items-start gap-3">
                            <FiCheck className="w-5 h-5 text-green-600 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5" />
                            <span className="text-gray-700">{item}</span>
                          </li>
                        ))}
                      </ul>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Requirements Section */}
      {requirementsSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-5xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {requirementsSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600">
                {requirementsSection.subtitle}
              </p>
            </div>

            <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm p-8 lg:p-12 space-y-8">
              {requirementsSection.requirements?.map((req) => (
                <div key={req.id} className="border-b border-gray-200 last:border-0 pb-8 last:pb-0">
                  <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                    {req.category}
                  </h3>
                  <ul className="space-y-3">
                    {req.items?.map((item, idx) => (
                      <li key={idx} className="flex items-start gap-3">
                        <FiCheck className="w-5 h-5 text-[#01366b] flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5" />
                        <span className="text-gray-700">{item}</span>
                      </li>
                    ))}
                  </ul>
                </div>
              ))}

              {requirementsSection.note && (
                <div className="bg-blue-50 border-l-4 border-[#01366b] p-6 rounded-r-lg">
                  <p className="text-gray-700">
                    <strong>Note:</strong> {requirementsSection.note}
                  </p>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Process Section */}
      {processSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-white">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {processSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600">
                {processSection.subtitle}
              </p>
            </div>

            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
              {processSection.steps?.map((step) => {
                const Icon = iconMap[step.icon] || FiCheck;
                return (
                  <div key={step.id} className="relative">
                    <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-2xl p-8 h-full">
                      <div className="flex items-center gap-4 mb-6">
                        <div className="w-12 h-12 bg-[#01366b] text-white rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-lg flex-shrink-0">
                          {step.stepNumber}
                        </div>
                        <div className="w-12 h-12 bg-white rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center flex-shrink-0">
                          <Icon className="w-6 h-6 text-[#01366b]" />
                        </div>
                      </div>

                      <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">
                        {step.title}
                      </h3>
                      <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4">
                        {step.description}
                      </p>

                      {step.actionText && step.actionLink && (
                        <Link
                          href={step.actionLink}
                          className="text-[#01366b] font-semibold inline-flex items-center gap-2 hover:gap-3 transition-all"
                        >
                          {step.actionText} <FiArrowRight />
                        </Link>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Fees Section */}
      {feesSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-5xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {feesSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600">
                {feesSection.subtitle}
              </p>
            </div>

            <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm overflow-hidden">
              <div className="overflow-x-auto">
                <table className="w-full">
                  <thead className="bg-gray-50">
                    <tr>
                      <th className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-sm font-semibold text-gray-900">Fee Type</th>
                      <th className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-sm font-semibold text-gray-900">Amount</th>
                      <th className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-sm font-semibold text-gray-900">Frequency</th>
                      <th className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-sm font-semibold text-gray-900">Required</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody className="divide-y divide-gray-200">
                    {feesSection.feeStructure?.map((fee) => (
                      <tr key={fee.id} className="hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors">
                        <td className="px-6 py-4">
                          <div>
                            <p className="font-semibold text-gray-900">{fee.feeType}</p>
                            <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mt-1">{fee.description}</p>
                          </div>
                        </td>
                        <td className="px-6 py-4 font-semibold text-gray-900">
                          {fee.amount}
                        </td>
                        <td className="px-6 py-4 text-gray-700">
                          {fee.frequency}
                        </td>
                        <td className="px-6 py-4">
                          {fee.isRequired ? (
                            <span className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-3 py-1 bg-red-100 text-red-700 rounded-full text-sm font-medium">
                              <FiCheck className="w-4 h-4" /> Yes
                            </span>
                          ) : (
                            <span className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-600 rounded-full text-sm font-medium">
                              Optional
                            </span>
                          )}
                        </td>
                      </tr>
                    ))}
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>

              {feesSection.disclaimer && (
                <div className="bg-yellow-50 border-t border-yellow-200 p-6">
                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-700">
                    <strong>Disclaimer:</strong> {feesSection.disclaimer}
                  </p>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Testimonials Section */}
      {testimonialsSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-white">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {testimonialsSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600">
                {testimonialsSection.subtitle}
              </p>
            </div>

            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
              {testimonialsSection.testimonials?.map((testimonial) => {
                const member = testimonial.member?.data?.attributes;
                const photo = member?.photo?.data?.attributes;

                return (
                  <div key={testimonial.id} className="bg-gray-50 rounded-2xl p-8">
                    <div className="mb-6">
                      <svg className="w-10 h-10 text-[#01366b] opacity-20" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path d="M14.017 21v-7.391c0-5.704 3.731-9.57 8.983-10.609l.995 2.151c-2.432.917-3.995 3.638-3.995 5.849h4v10h-9.983zm-14.017 0v-7.391c0-5.704 3.748-9.57 9-10.609l.996 2.151c-2.433.917-3.996 3.638-3.996 5.849h3.983v10h-9.983z" />
                      </svg>
                    </div>

                    <p className="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed mb-6 italic">
                      "{testimonial.quote}"
                    </p>

                    <div className="flex items-center gap-4 pt-6 border-t border-gray-200">
                      {photo && (
                        <div className="relative w-12 h-12 rounded-full overflow-hidden flex-shrink-0">
                          <Image
                            src={getStrapiMedia(photo.url)}
                            alt={photo.alternativeText || member?.name}
                            fill
                            className="object-cover"
                          />
                        </div>
                      )}
                      <div>
                        <p className="font-semibold text-gray-900">{member?.name}</p>
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">{member?.location}</p>
                        <p className="text-xs text-gray-500 mt-1">
                          Member since {member?.memberSince}
                        </p>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    {testimonial.creditUnion && (
                      <div className="mt-4 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200">
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
                          <span className="font-semibold text-[#01366b]">
                            {testimonial.creditUnion}
                          </span>
                        </p>
                      </div>
                    )}
                  </div>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* CTA Section */}
      {ctaSection && (
        <section
          className="py-20 lg:py-32"
          style={{ backgroundColor: ctaSection.backgroundColor }}
        >
          <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center text-white">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold mb-6">
              {ctaSection.title}
            </h2>
            <p className="text-xl mb-10 text-gray-200">
              {ctaSection.description}
            </p>

            <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center">
              {ctaSection.primaryButtonText && ctaSection.primaryButtonLink && (
                <Link href={ctaSection.primaryButtonLink}>
                  <Button
                    size="lg"
                    variant="secondary"
                    icon={FiArrowRight}
                    iconPosition="right"
                  >
                    {ctaSection.primaryButtonText}
                  </Button>
                </Link>
              )}
              {ctaSection.secondaryButtonText && ctaSection.secondaryButtonLink && (
                <Link href={ctaSection.secondaryButtonLink}>
                  <Button
                    size="lg"
                    variant="outline"
                    className="text-white border-white hover:bg-white hover:text-[#01366b]"
                  >
                    {ctaSection.secondaryButtonText}
                  </Button>
                </Link>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

## API ENDPOINTS

### 1. Success Stories Page Content
**Endpoint**: `GET /api/credit-unions-success-stories-page`

**Query Parameters**:
```
?populate[heroSection][populate]=*
&populate[introSection][populate]=*
&populate[categoriesSection][populate]=*
&populate[ctaSection][populate]=*
&populate[seo][populate]=*
```

### 2. Success Stories Collection
**Endpoint**: `GET /api/success-stories`

**Purpose**: Fetch all success stories with filtering and pagination

**Query Parameters**:
```
?filters[isPublished][$eq]=true
&filters[category][$eq]=business-growth
&sort[0]=publishedDate:desc
&pagination[page]=1
&pagination[pageSize]=9
&populate[featuredImage][fields][0]=url
&populate[featuredImage][fields][1]=alternativeText
&populate[featuredImage][fields][2]=width
&populate[featuredImage][fields][3]=height
&populate[member][populate][photo]=*
&populate[creditUnion][fields][0]=name
&populate[creditUnion][fields][1]=logo
&fields[0]=title
&fields[1]=excerpt
&fields[2]=slug
&fields[3]=category
&fields[4]=publishedDate
&fields[5]=readTime
&fields[6]=impact
```
