## COMPLETE PAGE IMPLEMENTATION

**File**: `app/credit-unions/success-stories/page.js`

```javascript
'use client';

import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import Button from '@/app/components/Button';
import {
  FiUsers, FiTrendingUp, FiBriefcase, FiHeart, FiHome, FiBook,
  FiSun, FiGlobe, FiDollarSign, FiArrowRight, FiClock, FiFilter
} from 'react-icons/fi';

// Icon mapping
const iconMap = {
  FiUsers, FiTrendingUp, FiBriefcase, FiHeart, FiHome, FiBook,
  FiSun, FiGlobe, FiDollarSign, FiClock
};

export default function SuccessStoriesPage() {
  const [pageData, setPageData] = useState(null);
  const [stories, setStories] = useState([]);
  const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('all');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [totalPages, setTotalPages] = useState(1);
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);

  // Fetch page content
  useEffect(() => {
    async function fetchPageData() {
      try {
        const response = await fetchAPI('/credit-unions-success-stories-page', {
          query: {
            populate: {
              heroSection: {
                populate: {
                  backgroundImage: {
                    fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
                  }
                }
              },
              introSection: {
                populate: {
                  statsHighlight: { populate: '*' }
                }
              },
              categoriesSection: {
                populate: {
                  categories: { populate: '*' }
                }
              },
              ctaSection: { populate: '*' }
            }
          }
        });

        setPageData(response.data?.attributes);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching page data:', error);
      }
    }

    fetchPageData();
  }, []);

  // Fetch stories based on category and page
  useEffect(() => {
    async function fetchStories() {
      setIsLoading(true);
      try {
        const filters = {
          isPublished: { $eq: true }
        };

        if (selectedCategory !== 'all') {
          filters.category = { $eq: selectedCategory };
        }

        const response = await fetchAPI('/success-stories', {
          query: {
            filters,
            sort: ['publishedDate:desc'],
            pagination: {
              page: currentPage,
              pageSize: 9
            },
            populate: {
              featuredImage: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              },
              member: {
                populate: {
                  photo: {
                    fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
                  }
                }
              },
              creditUnion: {
                fields: ['name'],
                populate: {
                  logo: {
                    fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
                  }
                }
              }
            },
            fields: [
              'title', 'excerpt', 'slug', 'category', 'publishedDate',
              'readTime', 'impact', 'isFeatured'
            ]
          }
        });

        setStories(response.data || []);
        setTotalPages(response.meta?.pagination?.pageCount || 1);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching stories:', error);
        setStories([]);
      } finally {
        setIsLoading(false);
      }
    }

    fetchStories();
  }, [selectedCategory, currentPage]);

  if (!pageData) {
    return <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">Loading...</div>;
  }

  const { heroSection, introSection, categoriesSection, ctaSection } = pageData;

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-white">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative h-[400px] lg:h-[500px] flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden">
        {heroSection?.backgroundImage?.data && (
          <Image
            src={getStrapiMedia(heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.url)}
            alt={heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.alternativeText || 'Success Stories Hero'}
            fill
            className="object-cover"
            priority
          />
        )}
        <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-black/80 via-black/60 to-black/40"></div>

        <div className="relative z-10 max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center text-white">
          <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold mb-6 leading-tight">
            {heroSection?.title}
          </h1>
          <p className="text-xl lg:text-2xl mb-4 text-gray-200">
            {heroSection?.subtitle}
          </p>
          <p className="text-lg text-gray-300 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
            {heroSection?.description}
          </p>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Intro Section with Stats */}
      {introSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
                {introSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 max-w-4xl mx-auto leading-relaxed">
                {introSection.content}
              </p>
            </div>

            {/* Stats Highlight */}
            {introSection.statsHighlight && (
              <div className="grid grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8">
                {introSection.statsHighlight.map((stat) => {
                  const Icon = iconMap[stat.icon] || FiHeart;
                  return (
                    <div key={stat.id} className="text-center">
                      <div className="inline-flex items-center justify-center w-16 h-16 bg-[#01366b] text-white rounded-2xl mb-4">
                        <Icon className="w-8 h-8" />
                      </div>
                      <p className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-[#01366b] mb-2">
                        {stat.value}
                      </p>
                      <p className="text-gray-600 font-medium">
                        {stat.label}
                      </p>
                    </div>
                  );
                })}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Categories Section */}
      {categoriesSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-white">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {categoriesSection.title}
              </h2>
            </div>

            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6 mb-12">
              {/* All Categories Option */}
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  setSelectedCategory('all');
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}
                className={`p-6 rounded-2xl border-2 transition-all text-left ${
                  selectedCategory === 'all'
                    ? 'border-[#01366b] bg-blue-50 shadow-md'
                    : 'border-gray-200 hover:border-gray-300 hover:shadow-sm'
                }`}
              >
                <div className="flex items-start gap-4">
                  <div className={`w-12 h-12 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center flex-shrink-0 ${
                    selectedCategory === 'all' ? 'bg-[#01366b] text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-600'
                  }`}>
                    <FiFilter className="w-6 h-6" />
                  </div>
                  <div>
                    <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-1">
                      All Stories
                    </h3>
                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
                      View all success stories
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </button>

              {/* Category Options */}
              {categoriesSection.categories?.map((category) => {
                const Icon = iconMap[category.icon] || FiBriefcase;
                return (
                  <button
                    key={category.id}
                    onClick={() => {
                      setSelectedCategory(category.slug);
                      setCurrentPage(1);
                    }}
                    className={`p-6 rounded-2xl border-2 transition-all text-left ${
                      selectedCategory === category.slug
                        ? 'border-[#01366b] bg-blue-50 shadow-md'
                        : 'border-gray-200 hover:border-gray-300 hover:shadow-sm'
                    }`}
                  >
                    <div className="flex items-start gap-4">
                      <div
                        className={`w-12 h-12 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center flex-shrink-0 ${
                          selectedCategory === category.slug
                            ? 'bg-[#01366b] text-white'
                            : 'bg-gray-100'
                        }`}
                      >
                        <Icon
                          className="w-6 h-6"
                          style={{
                            color: selectedCategory === category.slug ? '#fff' : category.color
                          }}
                        />
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-1">
                          {category.name}
                        </h3>
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-2">
                          {category.description}
                        </p>
                        <span className="text-xs font-semibold text-[#01366b]">
                          {category.count} {category.count === 1 ? 'story' : 'stories'}
                        </span>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </button>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Stories Grid */}
      <section className="py-20 bg-gray-50">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          {isLoading ? (
            <div className="text-center py-20">
              <div className="inline-block animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-b-2 border-[#01366b]"></div>
              <p className="mt-4 text-gray-600">Loading stories...</p>
            </div>
          ) : stories.length === 0 ? (
            <div className="text-center py-20">
              <p className="text-xl text-gray-600">No stories found in this category.</p>
            </div>
          ) : (
            <>
              <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
                {stories.map((story) => {
                  const attributes = story.attributes;
                  const featuredImage = attributes.featuredImage?.data?.attributes;
                  const member = attributes.member?.data?.attributes;
                  const creditUnion = attributes.creditUnion?.data?.attributes;

                  return (
                    <Link
                      key={story.id}
                      href={`/credit-unions/success-stories/${attributes.slug}`}
                      className="group"
                    >
                      <article className="bg-white rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300">
                        {/* Featured Badge */}
                        {attributes.isFeatured && (
                          <div className="absolute top-4 left-4 z-10 bg-yellow-400 text-gray-900 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold">
                            Featured
                          </div>
                        )}

                        {/* Image */}
                        {featuredImage && (
                          <div className="relative h-64 overflow-hidden">
                            <Image
                              src={getStrapiMedia(featuredImage.url)}
                              alt={featuredImage.alternativeText || attributes.title}
                              fill
                              className="object-cover group-hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300"
                            />
                          </div>
                        )}

                        {/* Content */}
                        <div className="p-6">
                          {/* Category Badge */}
                          <span className="inline-block px-3 py-1 bg-blue-50 text-[#01366b] text-xs font-semibold rounded-full mb-3 capitalize">
                            {attributes.category.replace('-', ' ')}
                          </span>

                          <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3 group-hover:text-[#01366b] transition-colors">
                            {attributes.title}
                          </h3>

                          <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4 line-clamp-3">
                            {attributes.excerpt}
                          </p>

                          {/* Meta Info */}
                          <div className="flex items-center justify-between text-sm text-gray-500 mb-4">
                            <div className="flex items-center gap-1">
                              <FiClock className="w-4 h-4" />
                              <span>{attributes.readTime} min read</span>
                            </div>
                            <span>
                              {new Date(attributes.publishedDate).toLocaleDateString('en-GB', {
                                day: 'numeric',
                                month: 'short',
                                year: 'numeric'
                              })}
                            </span>
                          </div>

                          {/* Impact Badge */}
                          {attributes.impact && (
                            <div className="bg-green-50 border border-green-200 rounded-lg p-3 mb-4">
                              <p className="text-sm font-semibold text-green-800">
                                Impact: {attributes.impact}
                              </p>
                            </div>
                          )}

                          {/* Member & Credit Union */}
                          <div className="flex items-center justify-between pt-4 border-t border-gray-200">
                            {member && (
                              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                                {member.photo?.data && (
                                  <div className="relative w-8 h-8 rounded-full overflow-hidden">
                                    <Image
                                      src={getStrapiMedia(member.photo.data.attributes.url)}
                                      alt={member.name}
                                      fill
                                      className="object-cover"
                                    />
                                  </div>
                                )}
                                <span className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
                                  {member.name}
                                </span>
                              </div>
                            )}

                            {creditUnion && (
                              <span className="text-xs text-gray-500">
                                {creditUnion.name}
                              </span>
                            )}
                          </div>

                          {/* Read More Link */}
                          <div className="mt-4 flex items-center gap-2 text-[#01366b] font-semibold group-hover:gap-3 transition-all">
                            Read Story <FiArrowRight />
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </article>
                    </Link>
                  );
                })}
              </div>

              {/* Pagination */}
              {totalPages > 1 && (
                <div className="flex justify-center items-center gap-2 mt-12">
                  <button
                    onClick={() => setCurrentPage((prev) => Math.max(1, prev - 1))}
                    disabled={currentPage === 1}
                    className="px-4 py-2 rounded-lg border border-gray-300 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors"
                  >
                    Previous
                  </button>

                  {[...Array(totalPages)].map((_, idx) => (
                    <button
                      key={idx + 1}
                      onClick={() => setCurrentPage(idx + 1)}
                      className={`px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-colors ${
                        currentPage === idx + 1
                          ? 'bg-[#01366b] text-white'
                          : 'border border-gray-300 hover:bg-gray-50'
                      }`}
                    >
                      {idx + 1}
                    </button>
                  ))}

                  <button
                    onClick={() => setCurrentPage((prev) => Math.min(totalPages, prev + 1))}
                    disabled={currentPage === totalPages}
                    className="px-4 py-2 rounded-lg border border-gray-300 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors"
                  >
                    Next
                  </button>
                </div>
              )}
            </>
          )}
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* CTA Section */}
      {ctaSection && (
        <section
          className="py-20 lg:py-32"
          style={{ backgroundColor: ctaSection.backgroundColor }}
        >
          <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center text-white">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold mb-6">
              {ctaSection.title}
            </h2>
            <p className="text-xl mb-10 text-gray-200">
              {ctaSection.description}
            </p>

            <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center">
              {ctaSection.primaryButtonText && ctaSection.primaryButtonLink && (
                <Link href={ctaSection.primaryButtonLink}>
                  <Button
                    size="lg"
                    variant="secondary"
                    icon={FiArrowRight}
                    iconPosition="right"
                  >
                    {ctaSection.primaryButtonText}
                  </Button>
                </Link>
              )}
              {ctaSection.secondaryButtonText && ctaSection.secondaryButtonLink && (
                <Link href={ctaSection.secondaryButtonLink}>
                  <Button
                    size="lg"
                    variant="outline"
                    className="text-white border-white hover:bg-white hover:text-[#01366b]"
                  >
                    {ctaSection.secondaryButtonText}
                  </Button>
                </Link>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

## API SUMMARY

**Page**: Credit Unions - Success Stories
**Route**: `/credit-unions/success-stories`
**Data Sources**:
- Single Type: `credit-unions-success-stories-page`
- Collection Type: `success-stories`
**Rendering**: Client-side (interactive filtering and pagination)
**Caching**: Client-side data fetching with React state

**Key Features**:
- Hero section with background image
- Introduction with 4 statistics highlights
- 6 story categories with filtering (Business Growth, Home Ownership, Education, Agriculture, Community Impact, Financial Freedom)
- Dynamic story grid with 9 stories per page
- Pagination for browsing stories
- Category-based filtering
- Featured story badges
- Impact highlights on each card
- Read time estimates
- Member photos and credit union attribution
- Dual CTA section

**Components Used**:
- 1 new single type for page content
- 1 new collection type for stories
- 4 new section components
- 2 new element components
- Client-side interactivity with React hooks

**Related Pages**:
- Links to: Individual story detail pages (dynamic), Find Credit Union, Members page
- Part of: Credit Unions section

**Display Logic**:
- Stories sorted by published date (newest first)
- 9 stories per page with pagination
- Featured stories show badge
- Category filtering resets to page 1
- Empty state shown when no stories match filter

---

**Status**: ✅ COMPLETE - Credit Unions Success Stories page defined

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import Button from '@/app/components/Button';
import {
  FiUsers, FiTrendingUp, FiShield, FiHeart, FiAward, FiPhone,
  FiMapPin, FiCheckCircle, FiFileText, FiCheckSquare, FiBriefcase,
  FiUser, FiHome, FiCamera, FiDollarSign, FiArrowRight, FiAlertCircle,
  FiChevronDown
} from 'react-icons/fi';

export const revalidate = 3600; // Revalidate every hour

// Icon mapping
const iconMap = {
  FiUsers, FiTrendingUp, FiShield, FiHeart, FiAward, FiPhone,
  FiMapPin, FiCheckCircle, FiFileText, FiCheckSquare, FiBriefcase,
  FiUser, FiHome, FiCamera, FiDollarSign, FiAlertCircle
};

export async function generateMetadata() {
  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/credit-unions-join-page', {
      query: {
        populate: {
          seo: { populate: '*' }
        }
      }
    });

    const seo = response.data?.attributes?.seo;

    return {
      title: seo?.metaTitle || 'Join a Credit Union | CUA Ghana',
      description: seo?.metaDescription || 'Learn how to join a credit union in Ghana.',
      keywords: seo?.keywords,
      alternates: {
        canonical: seo?.canonicalURL
      },
      openGraph: {
        title: seo?.metaTitle,
        description: seo?.metaDescription,
        url: seo?.canonicalURL,
        type: 'website'
      }
    };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching SEO metadata:', error);
    return {
      title: 'Join a Credit Union | CUA Ghana',
      description: 'Learn how to join a credit union'
    };
  }
}

export default async function JoinPage() {
  let pageData;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/credit-unions-join-page', {
      query: {
        populate: {
          heroSection: {
            populate: {
              backgroundImage: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          whyJoinSection: {
            populate: {
              reasons: { populate: '*' }
            }
          },
          howToJoinSection: {
            populate: {
              steps: { populate: '*' }
            }
          },
          eligibilitySection: {
            populate: {
              eligibilityTypes: { populate: '*' }
            }
          },
          documentationSection: {
            populate: {

            }
          },
          faqSection: {
            populate: {
              faqs: { populate: '*' }
            }
          },
          ctaSection: { populate: '*' }
        }
      }
    });

    pageData = response.data?.attributes;

    if (!pageData) {
      notFound();
    }
  } catch (error) {

    notFound();
  }

  const {

    <div className="min-h-screen bg-white">

          />
        )}
        <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-black/80 via-black/60 to-black/40"></div>

        <div className="relative z-10 max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center text-white">

            {heroSection?.title}
          </h1>
          <p className="text-xl lg:text-2xl mb-4 text-gray-200">
            {heroSection?.subtitle}
          </p>
          <p className="text-lg text-gray-300 max-w-3xl mx-auto mb-8">
            {heroSection?.description}
          </p>
          {heroSection?.ctaText && heroSection?.ctaLink && (
            <Link href={heroSection.ctaLink}>
              <Button size="lg" variant="primary" icon={FiArrowRight} iconPosition="right">
                {heroSection.ctaText}
              </Button>
            </Link>
          )}
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Why Join Section */}
      {whyJoinSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {whyJoinSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600">
                {whyJoinSection.subtitle}
              </p>
            </div>

            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
              {whyJoinSection.reasons?.map((reason) => {
                const Icon = iconMap[reason.icon] || FiHeart;
                return (
                  <div key={reason.id} className="bg-white p-8 rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow">
                    <div
                      className="w-14 h-14 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center mb-6"
                      style={{ backgroundColor: `${reason.color}15` }}
                    >
                      <Icon className="w-7 h-7" style={{ color: reason.color }} />
                    </div>
                    <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">
                      {reason.title}
                    </h3>
                    <p className="text-gray-600 leading-relaxed">
                      {reason.description}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* How to Join Section */}
      {howToJoinSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-white">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">

                      )}

                      {step.actionText && step.actionLink && (

                      <span className="inline-block px-3 py-1 bg-[#01366b] text-white text-xs font-semibold rounded-full mb-4">

                    <div className="flex items-start gap-4 mb-6">

              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* FAQ Section */}
      {faqSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">

                  <div className="px-6 pb-6">
                    <p className="text-gray-600 leading-relaxed">
                      {faq.answer}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </details>

            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* CTA Section */}
      {ctaSection && (
        <section
          className="py-20 lg:py-32"
          style={{ backgroundColor: ctaSection.backgroundColor }}

          <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center text-white">

              {ctaSection.description}
            </p>

            <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center">
              {ctaSection.primaryButtonText && ctaSection.primaryButtonLink && (
                <Link href={ctaSection.primaryButtonLink}>
                  <Button
                    size="lg"
                    variant="secondary"
                    icon={FiArrowRight}
                    iconPosition="right"
                  >
                    {ctaSection.primaryButtonText}
                  </Button>
                </Link>
              )}
              {ctaSection.secondaryButtonText && ctaSection.secondaryButtonLink && (
                <Link href={ctaSection.secondaryButtonLink}>
                  <Button
                    size="lg"
                    variant="outline"
                    className="text-white border-white hover:bg-white hover:text-[#01366b]"
                  >
                    {ctaSection.secondaryButtonText}
                  </Button>
                </Link>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';

  FiUsers, FiDollarSign, FiHeart, FiTrendingUp, FiBook, FiShield,

  FiCheckSquare, FiAward, FiSettings, FiDownload, FiFile, FiArrowRight,
  FiClock, FiCheckCircle, FiAlertCircle, FiChevronDown
} from 'react-icons/fi';

export const revalidate = 3600; // Revalidate every hour

// Icon mapping
const iconMap = {
  FiUsers, FiDollarSign, FiHeart, FiTrendingUp, FiBook, FiShield,
  FiHome, FiLink, FiBriefcase, FiFileText, FiMapPin, FiUserPlus,

export async function generateMetadata() {
  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/credit-unions-form-page', {
      query: {
        populate: {
          seo: { populate: '*' }
        }
      }
    });

    const seo = response.data?.attributes?.seo;

    return {
      title: seo?.metaTitle || 'Form a Credit Union | CUA Ghana',
      description: seo?.metaDescription || 'Learn how to start your own credit union in Ghana.',
      keywords: seo?.keywords,
      alternates: {
        canonical: seo?.canonicalURL
      },
      openGraph: {
        title: seo?.metaTitle,
        description: seo?.metaDescription,
        url: seo?.canonicalURL,
        type: 'website'
      }
    };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching SEO metadata:', error);
    return {
      title: 'Form a Credit Union | CUA Ghana',
      description: 'Learn how to start a credit union'
    };
  }
}

          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Requirements Section */}
      {requirementsSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {requirementsSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600">
                {requirementsSection.subtitle}
              </p>
            </div>

            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
              {requirementsSection.requirements?.map((req) => {
                const Icon = iconMap[req.icon] || FiCheckCircle;
                return (
                  <div
                    key={req.id}
                    className={`bg-white rounded-2xl p-8 ${
                      req.isEssential ? 'border-2 border-[#01366b]' : 'border border-gray-200'
                    }`}
                  >
                    {req.isEssential && (
                      <span className="inline-block px-3 py-1 bg-[#01366b] text-white text-xs font-semibold rounded-full mb-4">
                        Essential
                      </span>
                    )}

                    <div className="flex items-start gap-4 mb-6">
                      <div className="w-12 h-12 bg-blue-50 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center flex-shrink-0">
                        <Icon className="w-6 h-6 text-[#01366b]" />
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                          {req.title}
                        </h3>
                        <p className="text-gray-600">
                          {req.description}
                        </p>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    {req.examples && req.examples.length > 0 && (
                      <div>
                        <p className="font-semibold text-gray-900 text-sm uppercase tracking-wide mb-3">
                          Examples:
                        </p>
                        <ul className="space-y-2">
                          {req.examples.map((example, idx) => (
                            <li key={idx} className="flex items-start gap-3">
                              <FiCheckCircle className="w-4 h-4 text-green-600 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5" />
                              <span className="text-gray-700 text-sm">{example}</span>
                            </li>
                          ))}
                        </ul>
                      </div>
                    )}
                  </div>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Process Section */}
      {processSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-white">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {processSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 mb-6">
                {processSection.subtitle}
              </p>
              {processSection.timelineNote && (
                <div className="inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 bg-blue-50 text-[#01366b] rounded-full">
                  <FiClock className="w-4 h-4" />
                  <span className="text-sm font-medium">{processSection.timelineNote}</span>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="relative">
              {/* Timeline Line */}
              <div className="hidden lg:block absolute left-1/2 top-0 bottom-0 w-0.5 bg-gray-200 -translate-x-1/2"></div>

              <div className="space-y-12">
                {processSection.steps?.map((step, index) => {
                  const Icon = iconMap[step.icon] || FiCheckCircle;
                  const isEven = index % 2 === 0;

                  return (
                    <div
                      key={step.id}
                      className={`relative flex flex-col lg:flex-row gap-8 ${
                        isEven ? 'lg:flex-row' : 'lg:flex-row-reverse'
                      }`}
                    >
                      {/* Content */}
                      <div className={`flex-1 ${isEven ? 'lg:text-right' : 'lg:text-left'}`}>
                        <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-2xl p-8 inline-block w-full">
                          <div className={`flex items-center gap-3 mb-4 ${isEven ? 'lg:flex-row-reverse lg:justify-end' : ''}`}>
                            <div className="w-12 h-12 bg-[#01366b] text-white rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-xl flex-shrink-0">
                              {step.stepNumber}
                            </div>
                            <div>
                              <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">
                                {step.title}
                              </h3>
                              <p className="text-sm text-gray-500 flex items-center gap-1">
                                <FiClock className="w-3 h-3" />
                                {step.duration}
                              </p>
                            </div>
                          </div>

                          <p className="text-gray-600 mb-6">
                            {step.description}
                          </p>

                          {step.tasks && step.tasks.length > 0 && (
                            <ul className={`space-y-2 ${isEven ? 'lg:text-right' : 'lg:text-left'}`}>
                              {step.tasks.map((task, idx) => (
                                <li key={idx} className={`flex items-start gap-2 ${isEven ? 'lg:flex-row-reverse lg:justify-end' : ''}`}>
                                  <FiCheckCircle className="w-4 h-4 text-green-600 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5" />
                                  <span className="text-sm text-gray-700">{task}</span>
                                </li>
                              ))}
                            </ul>
                          )}
                        </div>
                      </div>

                      {/* Icon Circle */}
                      <div className="hidden lg:flex items-center justify-center flex-shrink-0">
                        <div className="w-16 h-16 bg-white border-4 border-[#01366b] rounded-full flex items-center justify-center z-10">
                          <Icon className="w-7 h-7 text-[#01366b]" />
                        </div>
                      </div>

                      {/* Spacer */}
                      <div className="flex-1 hidden lg:block"></div>
                    </div>
                  );
                })}
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Support Section */}
      {supportSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-5xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
                {supportSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 leading-relaxed">
                {supportSection.content}
              </p>
            </div>

            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
              {supportSection.supportServices?.map((service) => (
                <div key={service.id} className="bg-white p-6 rounded-xl border border-gray-200">
                  <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                    {service.service}
                  </h3>
                  <p className="text-gray-600">
                    {service.description}
                  </p>
                </div>
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Resources Section */}
      {resourcesSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-white">
          <div className="max-w-5xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {resourcesSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600">
                {resourcesSection.subtitle}
              </p>
            </div>

            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
              {resourcesSection.resources?.map((resource) => {
                const Icon = iconMap[resource.icon] || FiFile;
                return (
                  <a
                    key={resource.id}
                    href={resource.downloadUrl}
                    download
                    className="group bg-gray-50 p-6 rounded-xl border border-gray-200 hover:border-[#01366b] hover:shadow-md transition-all"
                  >
                    <div className="flex items-start gap-4">
                      <div className="w-12 h-12 bg-white rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center flex-shrink-0 group-hover:bg-blue-50 transition-colors">
                        <Icon className="w-6 h-6 text-[#01366b]" />
                      </div>
                      <div className="flex-1">
                        <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2 group-hover:text-[#01366b] transition-colors">
                          {resource.title}
                        </h3>
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-3">
                          {resource.description}
                        </p>
                        <div className="flex items-center gap-4 text-xs text-gray-500">
                          <span className="px-2 py-1 bg-gray-200 rounded font-medium">
                            {resource.fileType}
                          </span>
                          <span>{resource.fileSize}</span>
                          <span className="flex items-center gap-1 text-[#01366b] font-semibold group-hover:gap-2 transition-all">
                            <FiDownload className="w-3 h-3" />
                            Download
                          </span>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </a>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* FAQ Section */}
      {faqSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {faqSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600">
                {faqSection.subtitle}
              </p>
            </div>

            <div className="space-y-4">
              {faqSection.faqs?.map((faq) => (
                <details
                  key={faq.id}
                  className="group bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow"
                >
                  <summary className="flex items-center justify-between p-6 cursor-pointer">
                    <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 pr-8">
                      {faq.question}
                    </h3>
                    <FiChevronDown className="w-5 h-5 text-gray-600 flex-shrink-0 group-open:rotate-180 transition-transform" />
                  </summary>
                  <div className="px-6 pb-6">
                    <p className="text-gray-600 leading-relaxed">
                      {faq.answer}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </details>
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* CTA Section */}
      {ctaSection && (
        <section
          className="py-20 lg:py-32"
          style={{ backgroundColor: ctaSection.backgroundColor }}
        >
          <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center text-white">
            <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold mb-6">
              {ctaSection.title}
            </h2>
            <p className="text-xl mb-10 text-gray-200">
              {ctaSection.description}
            </p>

            <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center">
              {ctaSection.primaryButtonText && ctaSection.primaryButtonLink && (
                <Link href={ctaSection.primaryButtonLink}>
                  <Button
                    size="lg"
                    variant="secondary"
                    icon={FiArrowRight}
                    iconPosition="right"
                  >
                    {ctaSection.primaryButtonText}
                  </Button>
                </Link>
              )}
              {ctaSection.secondaryButtonText && ctaSection.secondaryButtonLink && (
                <a href={ctaSection.secondaryButtonLink} download>
                  <Button
                    size="lg"
                    variant="outline"
                    icon={FiDownload}
                    iconPosition="right"
                    className="text-white border-white hover:bg-white hover:text-[#01366b]"
                  >
                    {ctaSection.secondaryButtonText}
                  </Button>
                </a>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

## API SUMMARY

**Page**: Credit Unions - Form a CU
**Route**: `/credit-unions/form`
**Data Source**: Single Type `credit-unions-form-page`
**Caching**: ISR with 1-hour revalidation

**Key Features**:
- Hero section with background
- Intro with 3 highlight statistics
- 6 benefits of forming a credit union
- 6 requirements (5 essential, 1 recommended) with examples
- 7-step formation process with timeline visualization (6-12 months total)
- 6 support services offered by CUA Ghana
- 4 downloadable resources
- 8 FAQ items
- Dual CTA (Contact + Download)

**Components Used**:
- 6 new section components
- 6 new element components
- Reusable components from previous pages

**Related Pages**:
- Links to: Contact page, downloadable resources
- Part of: Credit Unions section

**Display Logic**:
- Timeline with alternating left/right layout
- Essential requirements highlighted with border
- Visual timeline line connecting steps
- Downloadable resources with hover effects
- Step duration badges with clock icon

**Status**: ✅ COMPLETE - Form a Credit Union page defined

# PAGE 17: CREDIT UNIONS - CU'S IN GHANA

**Route**: `/credit-unions/cus-in-ghana`

## API ENDPOINTS

### 1. CU's in Ghana Page Content
**Endpoint**: `GET /api/credit-unions-in-ghana-page`

**Purpose**: Fetch page-specific content for the CU's in Ghana page

**Query Parameters**:
```
?populate[heroSection][populate]=*
&populate[overviewSection][populate][stats][populate]=*
&populate[historySection][populate]=*
&populate[mapSection][populate]=*
&populate[categoriesSection][populate][categories][populate]=*
&populate[impactSection][populate][impacts][populate]=*
&populate[ctaSection][populate]=*
&populate[seo][populate]=*
```

### 2. Credit Unions Collection (For Map and Directory)
**Endpoint**: `GET /api/credit-unions`

**Purpose**: Fetch all active credit unions for map display and directory listing

**Query Parameters**:
```
?filters[isActive][$eq]=true
&sort[0]=name:asc
&populate[logo][fields][0]=url
&populate[logo][fields][1]=alternativeText
&populate[logo][fields][2]=width
&populate[logo][fields][3]=height
&fields[0]=name
&fields[1]=location
&fields[2]=region
&fields[3]=type
&fields[4]=memberCount
&fields[5]=contactEmail
&fields[6]=contactPhone
&fields[7]=website
&fields[8]=latitude
&fields[9]=longitude
&fields[10]=established
&pagination[pageSize]=500
```

**Full Response Structure for Page Content**:

**File**: `app/credit-unions/cus-in-ghana/page.js`

```javascript
'use client';

import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import Button from '@/app/components/Button';
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic';
import {
  FiHome, FiUsers, FiTrendingUp, FiMapPin, FiBriefcase, FiGlobe,
  FiBook, FiSun, FiHeart, FiArrowRight, FiFilter, FiExternalLink,
  FiPhone, FiMail
} from 'react-icons/fi';

// Dynamically import map component (to avoid SSR issues with leaflet)
const InteractiveMap = dynamic(() => import('@/app/components/InteractiveMap'), {
  ssr: false,
  loading: () => (
    <div className="w-full h-[600px] bg-gray-100 rounded-2xl flex items-center justify-center">
      <p className="text-gray-600">Loading map...</p>
    </div>
  )
});

// Icon mapping
const iconMap = {
  FiHome, FiUsers, FiTrendingUp, FiMapPin, FiBriefcase, FiGlobe,
  FiBook, FiSun, FiHeart
};

export default function CUsInGhanaPage() {
  const [pageData, setPageData] = useState(null);
  const [creditUnions, setCreditUnions] = useState([]);
  const [filteredCreditUnions, setFilteredCreditUnions] = useState([]);
  const [selectedRegion, setSelectedRegion] = useState('all');
  const [selectedType, setSelectedType] = useState('all');
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);

  const regions = [
    'Greater Accra', 'Ashanti', 'Eastern', 'Western', 'Central',
    'Northern', 'Upper East', 'Upper West', 'Volta', 'Oti',
    'Bono', 'Bono East', 'Ahafo', 'Western North', 'North East', 'Savannah'
  ];

  const types = [
    { value: 'community-based', label: 'Community-Based' },
    { value: 'occupation-based', label: 'Occupation-Based' },
    { value: 'association-based', label: 'Association-Based' },
    { value: 'multi-common-bond', label: 'Multi-Common Bond' }
  ];

  // Fetch page data
  useEffect(() => {
    async function fetchPageData() {
      try {
        const response = await fetchAPI('/credit-unions-in-ghana-page', {
          query: {
            populate: {
              heroSection: {
                populate: {
                  backgroundImage: {
                    fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
                  }
                }
              },
              overviewSection: {
                populate: {
                  stats: { populate: '*' }
                }
              },
              historySection: {
                populate: {
                  timeline: { populate: '*' }
                }
              },
              mapSection: { populate: '*' },
              categoriesSection: {
                populate: {
                  categories: { populate: '*' }
                }
              },
              impactSection: {
                populate: {
                  impacts: { populate: '*' }
                }
              },
              ctaSection: { populate: '*' }
            }
          }
        });

        setPageData(response.data?.attributes);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching page data:', error);
      }
    }

    fetchPageData();
  }, []);

  // Fetch credit unions
  useEffect(() => {
    async function fetchCreditUnions() {
      setIsLoading(true);
      try {
        const response = await fetchAPI('/credit-unions', {
          query: {
            filters: {
              isActive: { $eq: true }
            },
            sort: ['name:asc'],
            populate: {
              logo: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            },
            fields: [
              'name', 'location', 'region', 'type', 'memberCount',
              'contactEmail', 'contactPhone', 'website', 'latitude',
              'longitude', 'established'
            ],
            pagination: {
              pageSize: 500
            }
          }
        });

        const cus = response.data || [];
        setCreditUnions(cus);
        setFilteredCreditUnions(cus);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching credit unions:', error);
        setCreditUnions([]);
        setFilteredCreditUnions([]);
      } finally {
        setIsLoading(false);
      }
    }

    fetchCreditUnions();
  }, []);

  // Filter credit unions
  useEffect(() => {
    let filtered = creditUnions;

    if (selectedRegion !== 'all') {
      filtered = filtered.filter(cu => cu.attributes.region === selectedRegion);
    }

    if (selectedType !== 'all') {
      filtered = filtered.filter(cu => cu.attributes.type === selectedType);
    }

    setFilteredCreditUnions(filtered);
  }, [selectedRegion, selectedType, creditUnions]);

  if (!pageData) {
    return <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">Loading...</div>;
  }

  const {
    heroSection,
    overviewSection,
    historySection,
    mapSection,
    categoriesSection,
    impactSection,
    ctaSection
  } = pageData;

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-white">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative h-[500px] lg:h-[600px] flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden">
        {heroSection?.backgroundImage?.data && (
          <Image
            src={getStrapiMedia(heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.url)}
            alt={heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.alternativeText || 'CUs Ghana Hero'}
            fill
            className="object-cover"
            priority
          />
        )}
        <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-black/80 via-black/60 to-black/40"></div>

        <div className="relative z-10 max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center text-white">
          <h1 className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold mb-6 leading-tight">
            {heroSection?.title}
          </h1>
          <p className="text-xl lg:text-2xl mb-4 text-gray-200">
            {heroSection?.subtitle}
          </p>
          <p className="text-lg text-gray-300 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
            {heroSection?.description}
          </p>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Overview Section */}
      {overviewSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-16">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
                {overviewSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 max-w-4xl mx-auto leading-relaxed">
                {overviewSection.content}
              </p>
            </div>

            {/* Stats Grid */}
            {overviewSection.stats && (
              <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6">
                {overviewSection.stats.map((stat) => {
                  const Icon = iconMap[stat.icon] || FiTrendingUp;
                  return (
                    <div key={stat.id} className="bg-white p-8 rounded-2xl shadow-sm text-center">
                      <div className="inline-flex items-center justify-center w-16 h-16 bg-blue-50 rounded-2xl mb-4">
                        <Icon className="w-8 h-8 text-[#01366b]" />
                      </div>
                      <p className="text-4xl font-bold text-[#01366b] mb-2">
                        {stat.value}
                      </p>
                      <p className="text-gray-900 font-semibold mb-2">
                        {stat.label}
                      </p>
                      <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
                        {stat.description}
                      </p>
                    </div>
                  );
                })}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* History Section */}
      {historySection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-white">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="grid lg:grid-cols-2 gap-12 items-start">
              {/* Content */}
              <div>
                <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
                  {historySection.title}
                </h2>
                <div className="prose prose-lg text-gray-600 leading-relaxed whitespace-pre-line">
                  {historySection.content}
                </div>
              </div>

              {/* Timeline */}
              {historySection.timeline && (
                <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-2xl p-8">
                  <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-8">Key Milestones</h3>
                  <div className="space-y-6">
                    {historySection.timeline.map((item, index) => (
                      <div key={item.id} className="flex gap-4">
                        <div className="flex-shrink-0">
                          <div className="w-12 h-12 bg-[#01366b] text-white rounded-full flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-sm">
                            {item.year}
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="flex-1 pt-2">
                          <p className="text-gray-700">{item.event}</p>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    ))}
                  </div>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Map Section */}
      {mapSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-12">
              <h2 className="text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                {mapSection.title}
              </h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 mb-2">
                {mapSection.subtitle}
              </p>
              <p className="text-gray-600">
                {mapSection.description}
              </p>
            </div>

            {/* Filters */}
            <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 mb-8">
              {/* Region Filter */}
              <div className="flex-1">
                <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                  Filter by Region
                </label>
                <select
                  value={selectedRegion}
                  onChange={(e) => setSelectedRegion(e.target.value)}
                  className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] focus:border-transparent"
                >
                  <option value="all">All Regions</option>
                  {regions.map((region) => (
                    <option key={region} value={region}>{region}</option>
                  ))}
                </select>
              </div>

              {/* Type Filter */}
              <div className="flex-1">
                <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                  Filter by Type
                </label>
                <select
                  value={selectedType}
                  onChange={(e) => setSelectedType(e.target.value)}
                  className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] focus:border-transparent"
                >
                  <option value="all">All Types</option>
                  {types.map((type) => (
                    <option key={type.value} value={type.value}>{type.label}</option>
                  ))}
                </select>
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Map */}
            <div className="mb-8">
              <InteractiveMap
                creditUnions={filteredCreditUnions}
                center={[mapSection.mapCenterLatitude, mapSection.mapCenterLongitude]}
                zoom={mapSection.defaultZoom}
              />
            </div>

            {/* Results Count */}
            <div className="text-center mb-8">
              <p className="text-gray-600">
                Showing <span className="font-bold text-[#01366b]">{filteredCreditUnions.length}</span> credit union{filteredCreditUnions.length !== 1 ? 's' : ''}
                {selectedRegion !== 'all' && ` in ${selectedRegion}`}
                {selectedType !== 'all' && ` (${types.find(t => t.value === selectedType)?.label})`}
              </p>
            </div>

            {/* Credit Union List */}
            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
              {isLoading ? (
                <div className="col-span-full text-center py-12">
                  <p className="text-gray-600">Loading credit unions...</p>
                </div>
              ) : filteredCreditUnions.length === 0 ? (
                <div className="col-span-full text-center py-12">
                  <p className="text-gray-600">No credit unions found matching your filters.</p>
                </div>
              ) : (
                filteredCreditUnions.map((cu) => {
                  const attributes = cu.attributes;
                  const logo = attributes.logo?.data?.attributes;

                  return (
                    <div key={cu.id} className="bg-white rounded-xl p-6 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow">
                      {/* Logo */}
                      {logo && (
                        <div className="relative w-16 h-16 mb-4">
                          <Image
                            src={getStrapiMedia(logo.url)}
                            alt={logo.alternativeText || attributes.name}
                            fill
                            className="object-contain"
                          />
                        </div>
                      )}

                      {/* Name */}
                      <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                        {attributes.name}
                      </h3>

                      {/* Location & Type */}
                      <div className="space-y-1 mb-4">
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 flex items-center gap-2">
                          <FiMapPin className="w-4 h-4" />
                          {attributes.location}, {attributes.region}
                        </p>
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 capitalize">
                          {attributes.type?.replace('-', ' ')}
                        </p>
                        {attributes.established && (
                          <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
                            Est. {attributes.established}
                          </p>
                        )}
                      </div>

                      {/* Member Count */}
                      {attributes.memberCount && (
                        <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-4">
                          <FiUsers className="w-4 h-4 text-[#01366b]" />
                          <p className="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700">
                            {attributes.memberCount.toLocaleString()} members
                          </p>
                        </div>
                      )}

                      {/* Contact Info */}
                      <div className="space-y-2 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200">
                        {attributes.contactPhone && (
                          <a
                            href={`tel:${attributes.contactPhone}`}
                            className="text-sm text-gray-600 hover:text-[#01366b] flex items-center gap-2"
                          >
                            <FiPhone className="w-4 h-4" />
                            {attributes.contactPhone}
                          </a>
                        )}
                        {attributes.contactEmail && (
                          <a
                            href={`mailto:${attributes.contactEmail}`}
                            className="text-sm text-gray-600 hover:text-[#01366b] flex items-center gap-2"
                          >
                            <FiMail className="w-4 h-4" />
                            {attributes.contactEmail}

                        {attributes.website && (
                          <a
                            href={attributes.website}

                            rel="noopener noreferrer"
                            className="text-sm text-[#01366b] hover:underline flex items-center gap-2"
                          >
                            <FiExternalLink className="w-4 h-4" />

                      </div>

                  );
                })

            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Categories Section */}
      {categoriesSection && (
        <section className="py-20 lg:py-32 bg-white">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">

                      </div>
                    </div>

                    {category.examples && category.examples.length > 0 && (
                      <div>

                    iconPosition="right"
                  >
                    {ctaSection.primaryButtonText}
                  </Button>
                </Link>
              )}
              {ctaSection.secondaryButtonText && ctaSection.secondaryButtonLink && (
                <Link href={ctaSection.secondaryButtonLink}>
                  <Button
                    size="lg"
                    variant="outline"
                    className="text-white border-white hover:bg-white hover:text-[#01366b]"
                  >
                    {ctaSection.secondaryButtonText}
                  </Button>
                </Link>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

**File**: `app/components/InteractiveMap.js`

```javascript
'use client';

import { MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker, Popup } from 'react-leaflet';
import 'leaflet/dist/leaflet.css';
import L from 'leaflet';
import { getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';

// Fix for default marker icon
delete L.Icon.Default.prototype._getIconUrl;
L.Icon.Default.mergeOptions({
  iconRetinaUrl: 'https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-icon-2x.png',
  iconUrl: 'https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-icon.png',
  shadowUrl: 'https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-shadow.png',
});

export default function InteractiveMap({ creditUnions, center, zoom }) {
  return (
    <div className="w-full h-[600px] rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-lg">
      <MapContainer
        center={center}
        zoom={zoom}
        scrollWheelZoom={false}
        style={{ height: '100%', width: '100%' }}
      >
        <TileLayer
          attribution='&copy; <a href="https://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright">OpenStreetMap</a> contributors'
          url="https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png"
        />

        {creditUnions.map((cu) => {
          const { latitude, longitude, name, location, region, memberCount, contactPhone } = cu.attributes;

          if (!latitude || !longitude) return null;

          return (
            <Marker key={cu.id} position={[latitude, longitude]}>
              <Popup>
                <div className="p-2">
                  <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">{name}</h3>
                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-1">
                    {location}, {region}
                  </p>
                  {memberCount && (
                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-1">
                      {memberCount.toLocaleString()} members
                    </p>
                  )}
                  {contactPhone && (
                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
                      {contactPhone}
                    </p>
                  )}
                </div>
              </Popup>
            </Marker>
          );
        })}
      </MapContainer>
    </div>
  );
}
```

## API SUMMARY

**Page**: Credit Unions - CU's in Ghana
**Route**: `/credit-unions/cus-in-ghana`
**Data Sources**:
- Single Type: `credit-unions-in-ghana-page`
- Collection Type: `credit-unions` (for map and directory)
**Rendering**: Client-side (interactive map and filtering)

**Key Features**:
- Hero section with background
- Overview with 4 detailed statistics
- History section with 6-milestone timeline
- Interactive map (Leaflet) with markers for all CUs
- Region and type filters (16 regions, 4 types)
- Credit union directory with contact info
- 4 credit union categories with examples
- 6 impact areas with statistics
- Dual CTA section

**Components Used**:
- 7 new section components
- 6 new element components
- InteractiveMap component (Leaflet)
- Client-side filtering and state management

**Dependencies**:
- `leaflet` and `react-leaflet` for maps
- Dynamic import to avoid SSR issues with Leaflet

**Related Pages**:
- Links to: Find Credit Union, Members page
- Part of: Credit Unions section

**Display Logic**:
- Map dynamically updates based on filters
- Results count updates with filtering
- All 16 regions of Ghana available as filters
- 4 credit union types as filters
- Empty state when no results match
