## FULL PAGE CODE

```javascript
// app/training/registration/page.js
'use client';

import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useSearchParams } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion';
import {
  FiCalendar,
  FiUser,
  FiBriefcase,
  FiCheckCircle,
  FiArrowRight,
  FiArrowLeft,
  FiMail,
  FiPhone,
  FiMapPin,
  FiAlertCircle,
  FiInfo,
  FiDollarSign,
  FiHome,
  FiClock
} from 'react-icons/fi';

const iconMap = {
  FiCalendar, FiUser, FiBriefcase, FiCheckCircle
};

export default function TrainingRegistrationPage() {
  const searchParams = useSearchParams();
  const courseSlug = searchParams.get('course');

  const [pageData, setPageData] = useState(null);
  const [selectedCourse, setSelectedCourse] = useState(null);
  const [courses, setCourses] = useState([]);
  const [currentStep, setCurrentStep] = useState(1);
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
  const [registrationComplete, setRegistrationComplete] = useState(false);
  const [registrationNumber, setRegistrationNumber] = useState('');
  const [errors, setErrors] = useState({});

  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    // Step 1: Course Selection
    courseId: '',
    courseName: '',
    courseStartDate: '',
    courseEndDate: '',
    coursePrice: 0,
    earlyBirdApplies: false,

    // Step 2: Personal Information
    participantTitle: '',
    participantFirstName: '',
    participantLastName: '',
    participantEmail: '',
    participantPhone: '',
    participantPosition: '',
    dietaryRequirements: '',
    specialNeeds: '',

    // Step 3: Organization Details
    organizationName: '',
    organizationType: '',
    organizationAddress: '',
    organizationCity: '',
    organizationRegion: '',

    // Step 4: Accommodation & Payment
    accommodationRequired: false,
    accommodationType: '',
    accommodationNights: 0,
    accommodationCost: 0,
    paymentMethod: '',
    agreedToTerms: false,
    totalAmount: 0
  });

  // Fetch page data
  useEffect(() => {
    async function fetchPageData() {
      try {
        const response = await fetch(
          `/api/training-registration-page?populate[heroSection][populate][backgroundImage][fields][0]=url&populate[heroSection][populate][backgroundImage][fields][1]=alternativeText&populate[instructionsSection][populate][steps][populate]=*&populate[policiesSection][populate]=*&populate[supportSection][populate]=*`
        );
        const data = await response.json();
        setPageData(data.data.attributes);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching page data:', error);
      }
    }
    fetchPageData();
  }, []);

  // Fetch available courses
  useEffect(() => {
    async function fetchCourses() {
      try {
        const response = await fetch(
          `/api/training-courses?filters[status][$eq]=published&sort[0]=startDate:asc&pagination[pageSize]=100`
        );
        const data = await response.json();
        setCourses(data.data);

        // Pre-select course if slug provided
        if (courseSlug && data.data) {
          const course = data.data.find(c => c.attributes.slug === courseSlug);
          if (course) {
            handleCourseSelect(course);
          }
        }

        setIsLoading(false);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching courses:', error);
        setIsLoading(false);
      }
    }
    fetchCourses();
  }, [courseSlug]);

  const handleCourseSelect = (course) => {
    const earlyBird = course.attributes.earlyBirdDeadline &&
                      new Date() <= new Date(course.attributes.earlyBirdDeadline);
    const price = earlyBird ? course.attributes.earlyBirdPrice : course.attributes.price;

    setSelectedCourse(course);
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      courseId: course.id,
      courseName: course.attributes.title,
      courseStartDate: course.attributes.startDate,
      courseEndDate: course.attributes.endDate,
      coursePrice: price,
      earlyBirdApplies: earlyBird,
      totalAmount: price
    }));
  };

  const validateStep = (step) => {
    const newErrors = {};

    if (step === 1) {
      if (!formData.courseId) newErrors.courseId = 'Please select a course';
    }

    if (step === 2) {
      if (!formData.participantTitle) newErrors.participantTitle = 'Required';
      if (!formData.participantFirstName) newErrors.participantFirstName = 'Required';
      if (!formData.participantLastName) newErrors.participantLastName = 'Required';
      if (!formData.participantEmail) newErrors.participantEmail = 'Required';
      else if (!/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(formData.participantEmail)) newErrors.participantEmail = 'Invalid email';
      if (!formData.participantPhone) newErrors.participantPhone = 'Required';
      if (!formData.participantPosition) newErrors.participantPosition = 'Required';
    }

    if (step === 3) {
      if (!formData.organizationName) newErrors.organizationName = 'Required';
      if (!formData.organizationType) newErrors.organizationType = 'Required';
      if (!formData.organizationAddress) newErrors.organizationAddress = 'Required';
      if (!formData.organizationCity) newErrors.organizationCity = 'Required';
      if (!formData.organizationRegion) newErrors.organizationRegion = 'Required';
    }

    if (step === 4) {
      if (!formData.paymentMethod) newErrors.paymentMethod = 'Please select a payment method';
      if (!formData.agreedToTerms) newErrors.agreedToTerms = 'You must agree to the terms';
    }

    setErrors(newErrors);
    return Object.keys(newErrors).length === 0;
  };

  const handleNext = () => {
    if (validateStep(currentStep)) {
      setCurrentStep(prev => prev + 1);
      window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
    }
  };

  const handleBack = () => {
    setCurrentStep(prev => prev - 1);
    window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
  };

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
    }));

    // Clear error when user starts typing
    if (errors[name]) {
      setErrors(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: '' }));
    }
  };

  const handleAccommodationChange = (required) => {
    if (required) {
      const nights = Math.ceil(
        (new Date(formData.courseEndDate) - new Date(formData.courseStartDate)) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)
      ) + 1;
      const accommodationCost = nights * 150; // GH₵150 per night

      setFormData(prev => ({
        ...prev,
        accommodationRequired: true,
        accommodationType: 'single',
        accommodationNights: nights,
        accommodationCost,
        totalAmount: prev.coursePrice + accommodationCost
      }));
    } else {
      setFormData(prev => ({
        ...prev,
        accommodationRequired: false,
        accommodationType: '',
        accommodationNights: 0,
        accommodationCost: 0,
        totalAmount: prev.coursePrice
      }));
    }
  };

  const handleSubmit = async () => {
    if (!validateStep(4)) return;

    setIsSubmitting(true);

    try {
      const response = await fetch('/api/training-registrations', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json'
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          data: {
            ...formData,
            registrationDate: new Date().toISOString(),
            status: 'pending-payment'
          }
        })
      });

      const result = await response.json();

      if (response.ok) {
        setRegistrationNumber(result.data.attributes.registrationNumber);
        setRegistrationComplete(true);
        window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
      } else {
        alert('Registration failed. Please try again.');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Registration error:', error);
      alert('An error occurred. Please try again.');
    } finally {
      setIsSubmitting(false);
    }
  };

  if (isLoading || !pageData) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="text-center">
          <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-b-2 border-[#01366b] mx-auto mb-4"></div>
          <p className="text-gray-600">Loading registration form...</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  const { heroSection, instructionsSection, policiesSection, supportSection } = pageData;

  // Registration Complete Screen
  if (registrationComplete) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
        {/* Hero */}
        <section className="relative h-[300px] flex items-center justify-center bg-gradient-to-r from-[#01366b] to-[#446494]">
          <div className="relative z-10 max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center text-white">
            <FiCheckCircle className="text-6xl mx-auto mb-4 text-green-400" />
            <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">Registration Complete!</h1>
            <p className="text-lg">Your registration has been successfully submitted.</p>
          </div>
        </section>

        {/* Confirmation Details */}
        <section className="py-16">
          <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8 mb-8">
              <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Registration Details</h2>

              <div className="space-y-4 mb-6">
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between py-3 border-b">
                  <span className="text-gray-600">Registration Number</span>
                  <span className="font-bold text-[#01366b] text-lg">{registrationNumber}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between py-3 border-b">
                  <span className="text-gray-600">Course</span>
                  <span className="font-semibold text-gray-900">{formData.courseName}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between py-3 border-b">
                  <span className="text-gray-600">Participant</span>
                  <span className="font-semibold text-gray-900">
                    {formData.participantTitle} {formData.participantFirstName} {formData.participantLastName}
                  </span>
                </div>
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between py-3 border-b">
                  <span className="text-gray-600">Total Amount</span>
                  <span className="font-bold text-gray-900 text-xl">GH₵{formData.totalAmount.toLocaleString()}</span>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="bg-blue-50 rounded-xl p-6">
                <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 flex items-center gap-2">
                  <FiInfo className="text-[#01366b]" />
                  Next Steps
                </h3>
                <ol className="space-y-3 text-gray-700">
                  <li className="flex items-start gap-3">
                    <span className="font-bold text-[#01366b] flex-shrink-0">1.</span>
                    <span>A confirmation email has been sent to <strong>{formData.participantEmail}</strong> with payment instructions.</span>
                  </li>
                  <li className="flex items-start gap-3">
                    <span className="font-bold text-[#01366b] flex-shrink-0">2.</span>
                    <span>Complete payment within 5 days to confirm your registration.</span>
                  </li>
                  <li className="flex items-start gap-3">
                    <span className="font-bold text-[#01366b] flex-shrink-0">3.</span>
                    <span>You will receive a final confirmation email once payment is verified.</span>
                  </li>
                  <li className="flex items-start gap-3">
                    <span className="font-bold text-[#01366b] flex-shrink-0">4.</span>
                    <span>Course materials and joining instructions will be sent 3 days before the course starts.</span>
                  </li>
                </ol>
              </div>
            </div>

            {supportSection && (
              <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8 text-center">
                <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">{supportSection.title}</h3>
                <p className="text-gray-600 mb-6">{supportSection.description}</p>
                <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center">
                  <a
                    href={`mailto:${supportSection.contactEmail}`}
                    className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-6 py-3 bg-[#01366b] text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-[#024a8f] transition"
                  >
                    <FiMail />
                    Email Support
                  </a>
                  <a
                    href={`tel:${supportSection.contactPhone}`}
                    className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-6 py-3 border-2 border-[#01366b] text-[#01366b] rounded-lg hover:bg-[#01366b] hover:text-white transition"
                  >
                    <FiPhone />
                    Call Us
                  </a>
                </div>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </section>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // Main Registration Form
  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative h-[300px] flex items-center justify-center">
        {heroSection?.backgroundImage?.data && (
          <>
            <Image
              src={`${process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_STRAPI_URL || 'http://localhost:1337'}${heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.url}`}
              alt={heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.alternativeText || heroSection.title}
              fill
              className="object-cover"
              priority
            />
            <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-black/80 via-black/60 to-black/40"></div>
          </>
        )}
        <div className="relative z-10 max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center text-white">
          {heroSection?.subtitle && (
            <p className="text-lg font-medium text-white/90 mb-4">{heroSection.subtitle}</p>
          )}
          <h1 className="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold mb-6">{heroSection?.title}</h1>
          {heroSection?.description && (
            <p className="text-lg text-white/90 max-w-3xl mx-auto">{heroSection.description}</p>
          )}
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Instructions Section */}
      {instructionsSection && (
        <section className="py-12 bg-white border-b">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-8">
              <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">{instructionsSection.title}</h2>
              <p className="text-gray-600">{instructionsSection.description}</p>
            </div>

            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-4 gap-6">
              {instructionsSection.steps?.map((step) => {
                const IconComponent = iconMap[step.icon] || FiCheckCircle;
                const isActive = currentStep === step.stepNumber;
                const isComplete = currentStep > step.stepNumber;

                return (
                  <div
                    key={step.id}
                    className={`relative p-6 rounded-xl border-2 transition-all ${
                      isActive
                        ? 'border-[#01366b] bg-blue-50'
                        : isComplete
                        ? 'border-green-500 bg-green-50'
                        : 'border-gray-200 bg-white'
                    }`}
                  >
                    <div className={`w-12 h-12 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mb-4 ${
                      isActive
                        ? 'bg-[#01366b] text-white'
                        : isComplete
                        ? 'bg-green-500 text-white'
                        : 'bg-gray-200 text-gray-600'
                    }`}>
                      {isComplete ? (
                        <FiCheckCircle className="text-2xl" />
                      ) : (
                        <IconComponent className="text-2xl" />
                      )}
                    </div>
                    <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">{step.title}</h3>
                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">{step.description}</p>
                  </div>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Registration Form */}
      <section className="py-16">
        <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
          <AnimatePresence mode="wait">
            {/* Step 1: Course Selection */}
            {currentStep === 1 && (
              <motion.div
                key="step1"
                initial={{ opacity: 0, x: 20 }}
                animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
                exit={{ opacity: 0, x: -20 }}
                className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8"
              >
                <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Select Your Course</h2>

                {errors.courseId && (
                  <div className="mb-4 p-4 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg flex items-center gap-2 text-red-700">
                    <FiAlertCircle />
                    <span>{errors.courseId}</span>
                  </div>
                )}

                <div className="space-y-4">
                  {courses.map((course) => {
                    const isSelected = formData.courseId === course.id;
                    const earlyBird = course.attributes.earlyBirdDeadline &&
                                     new Date() <= new Date(course.attributes.earlyBirdDeadline);
                    const price = earlyBird ? course.attributes.earlyBirdPrice : course.attributes.price;

                    return (
                      <div
                        key={course.id}
                        onClick={() => handleCourseSelect(course)}
                        className={`p-6 rounded-xl border-2 cursor-pointer transition-all ${
                          isSelected
                            ? 'border-[#01366b] bg-blue-50'
                            : 'border-gray-200 hover:border-[#01366b] hover:bg-gray-50'
                        }`}
                      >
                        <div className="flex items-start justify-between">
                          <div className="flex-1">
                            <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">{course.attributes.title}</h3>
                            <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-3">{course.attributes.description}</p>

                            <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-4 text-sm text-gray-700">
                              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                                <FiCalendar className="text-[#01366b]" />
                                <span>{new Date(course.attributes.startDate).toLocaleDateString('en-GB')}</span>
                              </div>
                              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                                <FiClock className="text-[#01366b]" />
                                <span>{course.attributes.duration}</span>
                              </div>
                              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                                <FiMapPin className="text-[#01366b]" />
                                <span>{course.attributes.location}</span>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>

                          <div className="text-right ml-6">
                            <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-[#01366b]">GH₵{price.toLocaleString()}</p>
                            {earlyBird && (
                              <p className="text-xs text-green-600 font-semibold">Early Bird Price</p>
                            )}
                          </div>
                        </div>

                        {isSelected && (
                          <div className="mt-4 flex items-center gap-2 text-[#01366b]">
                            <FiCheckCircle />
                            <span className="font-semibold">Selected</span>
                          </div>
                        )}
                      </div>
                    );
                  })}
                </div>

                <div className="mt-8 flex justify-end">
                  <button
                    onClick={handleNext}
                    className="flex items-center gap-2 px-8 py-3 bg-[#01366b] text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-[#024a8f] transition disabled:opacity-50"
                    disabled={!formData.courseId}
                  >
                    Next Step
                    <FiArrowRight />
                  </button>
                </div>
              </motion.div>
            )}

            {/* Step 2: Personal Information */}
            {currentStep === 2 && (
              <motion.div
                key="step2"
                initial={{ opacity: 0, x: 20 }}
                animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
                exit={{ opacity: 0, x: -20 }}
                className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8"
              >
                <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Personal Information</h2>

                <div className="space-y-6">
                  {/* Title */}
                  <div>
                    <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                      Title <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
                    </label>
                    <select
                      name="participantTitle"
                      value={formData.participantTitle}
                      onChange={handleInputChange}
                      className={`w-full px-4 py-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] ${
                        errors.participantTitle ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
                      }`}
                    >
                      <option value="">Select title</option>
                      <option value="Mr.">Mr.</option>
                      <option value="Mrs.">Mrs.</option>
                      <option value="Ms.">Ms.</option>
                      <option value="Dr.">Dr.</option>
                      <option value="Prof.">Prof.</option>
                    </select>
                    {errors.participantTitle && (
                      <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.participantTitle}</p>
                    )}
                  </div>

                  {/* First Name & Last Name */}
                  <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
                    <div>
                      <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                        First Name <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
                      </label>
                      <input
                        type="text"
                        name="participantFirstName"
                        value={formData.participantFirstName}
                        onChange={handleInputChange}
                        className={`w-full px-4 py-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] ${
                          errors.participantFirstName ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
                        }`}
                        placeholder="Enter first name"
                      />
                      {errors.participantFirstName && (
                        <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.participantFirstName}</p>
                      )}
                    </div>

                    <div>
                      <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                        Last Name <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
                      </label>
                      <input
                        type="text"
                        name="participantLastName"
                        value={formData.participantLastName}
                        onChange={handleInputChange}
                        className={`w-full px-4 py-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] ${
                          errors.participantLastName ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
                        }`}
                        placeholder="Enter last name"
                      />
                      {errors.participantLastName && (
                        <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.participantLastName}</p>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </div>

                  {/* Email & Phone */}
                  <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
                    <div>
                      <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                        Email Address <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
                      </label>
                      <input
                        type="email"
                        name="participantEmail"
                        value={formData.participantEmail}
                        onChange={handleInputChange}
                        className={`w-full px-4 py-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] ${
                          errors.participantEmail ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
                        }`}
                        placeholder="your.email@example.com"
                      />
                      {errors.participantEmail && (
                        <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.participantEmail}</p>
                      )}
                    </div>

                    <div>
                      <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                        Phone Number <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
                      </label>
                      <input
                        type="tel"
                        name="participantPhone"
                        value={formData.participantPhone}
                        onChange={handleInputChange}
                        className={`w-full px-4 py-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] ${
                          errors.participantPhone ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
                        }`}
                        placeholder="+233 24 123 4567"
                      />
                      {errors.participantPhone && (
                        <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.participantPhone}</p>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </div>

                  {/* Position */}
                  <div>
                    <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                      Position/Title <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
                    </label>
                    <input
                      type="text"
                      name="participantPosition"
                      value={formData.participantPosition}
                      onChange={handleInputChange}
                      className={`w-full px-4 py-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] ${
                        errors.participantPosition ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
                      }`}
                      placeholder="e.g., Board Member, Manager, CEO"
                    />
                    {errors.participantPosition && (
                      <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.participantPosition}</p>
                    )}
                  </div>

                  {/* Dietary Requirements */}
                  <div>
                    <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                      Dietary Requirements (Optional)
                    </label>
                    <input
                      type="text"
                      name="dietaryRequirements"
                      value={formData.dietaryRequirements}
                      onChange={handleInputChange}
                      className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b]"
                      placeholder="e.g., Vegetarian, Halal, Allergies"
                    />
                  </div>

                  {/* Special Needs */}
                  <div>
                    <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                      Special Needs or Accessibility Requirements (Optional)
                    </label>
                    <textarea
                      name="specialNeeds"
                      value={formData.specialNeeds}
                      onChange={handleInputChange}
                      rows={3}
                      className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b]"
                      placeholder="Please let us know if you have any special needs"
                    ></textarea>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div className="mt-8 flex justify-between">
                  <button
                    onClick={handleBack}
                    className="flex items-center gap-2 px-8 py-3 border-2 border-gray-300 text-gray-700 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-50 transition"
                  >
                    <FiArrowLeft />
                    Back
                  </button>
                  <button
                    onClick={handleNext}
                    className="flex items-center gap-2 px-8 py-3 bg-[#01366b] text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-[#024a8f] transition"
                  >
                    Next Step
                    <FiArrowRight />
                  </button>
                </div>
              </motion.div>
            )}

            {/* Step 3: Organization Details */}
            {currentStep === 3 && (
              <motion.div
                key="step3"
                initial={{ opacity: 0, x: 20 }}
                animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
                exit={{ opacity: 0, x: -20 }}
                className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8"
              >
                <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Organization Details</h2>

                <div className="space-y-6">
                  {/* Organization Name */}
                  <div>
                    <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                      Organization Name <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
                    </label>
                    <input
                      type="text"
                      name="organizationName"
                      value={formData.organizationName}
                      onChange={handleInputChange}
                      className={`w-full px-4 py-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] ${
                        errors.organizationName ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
                      }`}
                      placeholder="Enter organization name"
                    />
                    {errors.organizationName && (
                      <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.organizationName}</p>
                    )}
                  </div>

                  {/* Organization Type */}
                  <div>
                    <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                      Organization Type <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
                    </label>
                    <select
                      name="organizationType"
                      value={formData.organizationType}
                      onChange={handleInputChange}
                      className={`w-full px-4 py-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] ${
                        errors.organizationType ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
                      }`}
                    >
                      <option value="">Select type</option>
                      <option value="Credit Union">Credit Union</option>
                      <option value="Savings & Loans">Savings & Loans</option>
                      <option value="Microfinance">Microfinance Institution</option>
                      <option value="Bank">Bank</option>
                      <option value="NGO">NGO</option>
                      <option value="Government">Government Agency</option>
                      <option value="Other">Other</option>
                    </select>
                    {errors.organizationType && (
                      <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.organizationType}</p>
                    )}
                  </div>

                  {/* Address */}
                  <div>
                    <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                      Address <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
                    </label>
                    <input
                      type="text"
                      name="organizationAddress"
                      value={formData.organizationAddress}
                      onChange={handleInputChange}
                      className={`w-full px-4 py-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] ${
                        errors.organizationAddress ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
                      }`}
                      placeholder="Street address"
                    />
                    {errors.organizationAddress && (
                      <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.organizationAddress}</p>
                    )}
                  </div>

                  {/* City & Region */}
                  <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
                    <div>
                      <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                        City <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
                      </label>
                      <input
                        type="text"
                        name="organizationCity"
                        value={formData.organizationCity}
                        onChange={handleInputChange}
                        className={`w-full px-4 py-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] ${
                          errors.organizationCity ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
                        }`}
                        placeholder="City"
                      />
                      {errors.organizationCity && (
                        <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.organizationCity}</p>
                      )}
                    </div>

                    <div>
                      <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                        Region <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
                      </label>
                      <select
                        name="organizationRegion"
                        value={formData.organizationRegion}
                        onChange={handleInputChange}
                        className={`w-full px-4 py-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b] ${
                          errors.organizationRegion ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
                        }`}
                      >
                        <option value="">Select region</option>
                        <option value="Greater Accra">Greater Accra</option>
                        <option value="Ashanti">Ashanti</option>
                        <option value="Central">Central</option>
                        <option value="Eastern">Eastern</option>
                        <option value="Western">Western</option>
                        <option value="Western North">Western North</option>
                        <option value="Volta">Volta</option>
                        <option value="Northern">Northern</option>
                        <option value="Upper East">Upper East</option>
                        <option value="Upper West">Upper West</option>
                        <option value="Brong-Ahafo">Brong-Ahafo</option>
                        <option value="Bono East">Bono East</option>
                        <option value="Ahafo">Ahafo</option>
                        <option value="Oti">Oti</option>
                        <option value="Savannah">Savannah</option>
                        <option value="North East">North East</option>
                      </select>
                      {errors.organizationRegion && (
                        <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.organizationRegion}</p>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div className="mt-8 flex justify-between">
                  <button
                    onClick={handleBack}
                    className="flex items-center gap-2 px-8 py-3 border-2 border-gray-300 text-gray-700 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-50 transition"
                  >
                    <FiArrowLeft />
                    Back
                  </button>
                  <button
                    onClick={handleNext}
                    className="flex items-center gap-2 px-8 py-3 bg-[#01366b] text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-[#024a8f] transition"
                  >
                    Next Step
                    <FiArrowRight />
                  </button>
                </div>
              </motion.div>
            )}

            {/* Step 4: Review & Payment */}
            {currentStep === 4 && (
              <motion.div
                key="step4"
                initial={{ opacity: 0, x: 20 }}
                animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
                exit={{ opacity: 0, x: -20 }}
                className="space-y-6"
              >
                {/* Review Summary */}
                <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8">
                  <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Review Your Registration</h2>

                  <div className="space-y-6">
                    {/* Course Details */}
                    <div>
                      <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">Course Details</h3>
                      <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-4 space-y-2">
                        <p className="text-gray-700"><strong>Course:</strong> {formData.courseName}</p>
                        <p className="text-gray-700"><strong>Dates:</strong> {new Date(formData.courseStartDate).toLocaleDateString('en-GB')} - {new Date(formData.courseEndDate).toLocaleDateString('en-GB')}</p>
                        <p className="text-gray-700"><strong>Price:</strong> GH₵{formData.coursePrice.toLocaleString()}</p>
                        {formData.earlyBirdApplies && (
                          <p className="text-green-600 font-semibold text-sm">✓ Early bird pricing applied</p>
                        )}
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Participant Details */}
                    <div>
                      <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">Participant Details</h3>
                      <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-4 space-y-2">
                        <p className="text-gray-700"><strong>Name:</strong> {formData.participantTitle} {formData.participantFirstName} {formData.participantLastName}</p>
                        <p className="text-gray-700"><strong>Email:</strong> {formData.participantEmail}</p>
                        <p className="text-gray-700"><strong>Phone:</strong> {formData.participantPhone}</p>
                        <p className="text-gray-700"><strong>Position:</strong> {formData.participantPosition}</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Organization Details */}
                    <div>
                      <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">Organization Details</h3>
                      <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-4 space-y-2">
                        <p className="text-gray-700"><strong>Name:</strong> {formData.organizationName}</p>
                        <p className="text-gray-700"><strong>Type:</strong> {formData.organizationType}</p>
                        <p className="text-gray-700"><strong>Address:</strong> {formData.organizationAddress}, {formData.organizationCity}, {formData.organizationRegion}</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                {/* Accommodation */}
                <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8">
                  <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Accommodation</h2>

                  <div className="space-y-4">
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                      <input
                        type="checkbox"
                        id="accommodationRequired"
                        checked={formData.accommodationRequired}
                        onChange={(e) => handleAccommodationChange(e.target.checked)}
                        className="w-5 h-5 text-[#01366b] focus:ring-[#01366b] rounded"
                      />
                      <label htmlFor="accommodationRequired" className="font-semibold text-gray-900">
                        I require on-site accommodation
                      </label>
                    </div>

                    {formData.accommodationRequired && (
                      <div className="bg-blue-50 rounded-lg p-4">
                        <p className="text-gray-700 mb-2">
                          <strong>Accommodation:</strong> On-site Single Room
                        </p>
                        <p className="text-gray-700 mb-2">
                          <strong>Nights:</strong> {formData.accommodationNights} nights
                        </p>
                        <p className="text-gray-700">
                          <strong>Cost:</strong> GH₵{formData.accommodationCost.toLocaleString()}
                        </p>
                      </div>
                    )}
                  </div>
                </div>

                {/* Payment Method */}
                <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8">
                  <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Payment Method</h2>

                  <div className="space-y-4">
                    {['bank-transfer', 'mobile-money', 'card'].map((method) => (
                      <div
                        key={method}
                        className={`p-4 rounded-lg border-2 cursor-pointer transition ${
                          formData.paymentMethod === method
                            ? 'border-[#01366b] bg-blue-50'
                            : 'border-gray-200 hover:border-[#01366b]'
                        }`}
                        onClick={() => setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, paymentMethod: method }))}
                      >
                        <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                          <input
                            type="radio"
                            name="paymentMethod"
                            value={method}
                            checked={formData.paymentMethod === method}
                            onChange={handleInputChange}
                            className="w-4 h-4 text-[#01366b]"
                          />
                          <div>
                            <p className="font-semibold text-gray-900">
                              {method === 'bank-transfer' && 'Bank Transfer'}
                              {method === 'mobile-money' && 'Mobile Money'}
                              {method === 'card' && 'Credit/Debit Card'}
                            </p>
                            <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
                              {method === 'bank-transfer' && 'Transfer to our bank account'}
                              {method === 'mobile-money' && 'Pay via MTN or Vodafone Cash'}
                              {method === 'card' && 'Pay securely with card'}
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    ))}

                    {errors.paymentMethod && (
                      <p className="text-sm text-red-500">{errors.paymentMethod}</p>
                    )}
                  </div>
                </div>

                {/* Total */}
                <div className="bg-gradient-to-r from-[#01366b] to-[#446494] rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8 text-white">
                  <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                    <div>
                      <p className="text-white/80 mb-1">Total Amount</p>
                      <p className="text-4xl font-bold">GH₵{formData.totalAmount.toLocaleString()}</p>
                    </div>
                    <FiDollarSign className="text-6xl text-white/30" />
                  </div>
                </div>

                {/* Terms & Conditions */}
                <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8">
                  <div className="flex items-start gap-3">
                    <input
                      type="checkbox"
                      id="agreedToTerms"
                      name="agreedToTerms"
                      checked={formData.agreedToTerms}
                      onChange={handleInputChange}
                      className="w-5 h-5 text-[#01366b] focus:ring-[#01366b] rounded mt-1"
                    />
                    <label htmlFor="agreedToTerms" className="text-gray-700">
                      I agree to the registration policies including cancellation, substitution, and payment terms outlined above. I understand that full payment is required to confirm my registration.
                    </label>
                  </div>
                  {errors.agreedToTerms && (
                    <p className="mt-2 text-sm text-red-500">{errors.agreedToTerms}</p>
                  )}
                </div>

                {/* Action Buttons */}
                <div className="flex justify-between">
                  <button
                    onClick={handleBack}
                    className="flex items-center gap-2 px-8 py-3 border-2 border-gray-300 text-gray-700 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-50 transition"
                  >
                    <FiArrowLeft />
                    Back
                  </button>
                  <button
                    onClick={handleSubmit}
                    disabled={isSubmitting}
                    className="flex items-center gap-2 px-8 py-4 bg-green-600 text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-green-700 transition disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed text-lg font-semibold"
                  >
                    {isSubmitting ? (
                      <>
                        <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-5 w-5 border-b-2 border-white"></div>
                        Processing...
                      </>
                    ) : (
                      <>
                        Complete Registration
                        <FiCheckCircle />
                      </>
                    )}
                  </button>
                </div>
              </motion.div>
            )}
          </AnimatePresence>

          {/* Policies Section */}
          {policiesSection && currentStep < 4 && (
            <div className="mt-8 bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8">
              <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">{policiesSection.title}</h3>

              <div className="space-y-4">
                <div>
                  <h4 className="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">Cancellation Policy</h4>
                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">{policiesSection.cancellationPolicy}</p>
                </div>

                <div>
                  <h4 className="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">Substitution Policy</h4>
                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">{policiesSection.substitutionPolicy}</p>
                </div>

                <div>
                  <h4 className="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">Payment Policy</h4>
                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">{policiesSection.paymentPolicy}</p>
                </div>

                {policiesSection.accommodationPolicy && (
                  <div>
                    <h4 className="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">Accommodation Policy</h4>
                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">{policiesSection.accommodationPolicy}</p>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      </section>
    </div>
  );
}
```

## API SUMMARY

**Page**: Training - Registration
**Route**: `/training/registration`
**Data Sources**:
- Single Type `training-registration-page`
- Collection Type `training-courses` (for course selection)
- Collection Type `training-registrations` (for submissions)

**Caching**: Client-side only (no ISR due to form functionality)

**Key Features**:
- 4-step multi-step form with progress indicator
- Pre-populate course from URL parameter
- Real-time form validation
- Accommodation cost calculator
- Early bird pricing detection
- Payment method selection (3 options)
- Registration policies display
- Confirmation screen with registration number
- Email confirmation trigger
- Responsive design with animations

**Form Steps**:
1. Course Selection - Browse and select from available courses
2. Personal Information - Participant details and dietary requirements
3. Organization Details - Organization info and address
4. Review & Payment - Summary, accommodation, payment method, terms

**Components Used**:
- 3 new section components (registration-instructions, registration-policies, support-info)
- 1 new element component (instruction-step)
- New collection type for registration submissions
- Framer Motion for step transitions

**Related Pages**:
- Links to: Training Calendar, CUTRAC Overview, Travel
- Part of: Training section

**Display Logic**:
- Client-side rendering for form interactivity
- Multi-step wizard with validation
- Dynamic course selection from API
- Accommodation cost auto-calculation
- Terms acceptance requirement
- Success screen after submission
- Payment instructions generation

---

**Status**: ✅ COMPLETE - Training Registration page defined

# PAGE 22: TRAINING - PRICES

**Route**: `/training/prices`

**Purpose**: Display comprehensive pricing information for all CUTRAC training programs, including course fees, accommodation, group discounts, and payment options.


## FULL PAGE CODE

```javascript
// app/training/prices/page.js
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from '@/lib/strapi';
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import Button from '@/app/components/Button';
import {
  FiAward,
  FiBook,
  FiMonitor,
  FiBriefcase,
  FiCheckCircle,
  FiClock,
  FiUsers,
  FiStar,
  FiRefreshCw,
  FiDollarSign,
  FiSmartphone,
  FiCreditCard,
  FiFileText,
  FiHome,
  FiChevronDown,
  FiChevronUp,
  FiInfo,
  FiArrowRight
} from 'react-icons/fi';

export const revalidate = 3600; // Revalidate every hour

const iconMap = {
  FiAward, FiBook, FiMonitor, FiBriefcase, FiClock, FiUsers,
  FiStar, FiRefreshCw, FiDollarSign, FiSmartphone, FiCreditCard,
  FiFileText, FiHome
};

export async function generateMetadata() {
  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/training-prices-page', {
      query: {
        populate: {
          seo: {
            populate: {
              metaImage: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText']
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    });

    const seo = response.data?.attributes?.seo;

    return {
      title: seo?.metaTitle || 'Training Prices - CUTRAC | CUA Ghana',
      description: seo?.metaDescription || 'View training prices and fees',
      keywords: seo?.keywords,
      openGraph: {
        title: seo?.metaTitle,
        description: seo?.metaDescription,
        images: seo?.metaImage?.data?.attributes?.url
          ? [getStrapiMedia(seo.metaImage.data.attributes.url)]
          : []
      }
    };
  } catch (error) {
    return {
      title: 'Training Prices - CUTRAC | CUA Ghana'
    };
  }
}

export default async function TrainingPricesPage() {
  let pageData;

  try {
    const response = await fetchAPI('/training-prices-page', {
      query: {
        populate: {
          heroSection: {
            populate: {
              backgroundImage: {
                fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
              }
            }
          },
          introSection: { populate: '*' },
          pricingCategories: { populate: { courses: { populate: '*' } } },
          accommodationPricing: { populate: { options: { populate: '*' } } },
          discountsSection: { populate: { discounts: { populate: '*' } } },
          additionalCosts: { populate: { items: { populate: '*' } } },
          paymentOptions: { populate: { methods: { populate: '*' } } },
          faqSection: { populate: { faqs: { populate: '*' } } },
          ctaSection: { populate: '*' },
          seo: { populate: '*' }
        }
      }
    });

    pageData = response.data?.attributes;

    if (!pageData) {
      notFound();
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching page data:', error);
    notFound();
  }

  const {
    heroSection,
    introSection,
    pricingCategories,
    accommodationPricing,
    discountsSection,
    additionalCosts,
    paymentOptions,
    faqSection,
    ctaSection
  } = pageData;

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-white">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="relative h-[400px] flex items-center justify-center">
        {heroSection?.backgroundImage?.data && (
          <>
            <Image
              src={getStrapiMedia(heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.url)}
              alt={heroSection.backgroundImage.data.attributes.alternativeText || heroSection.title}
              fill
              className="object-cover"
              priority
            />
            <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-black/80 via-black/60 to-black/40"></div>
          </>
        )}
        <div className="relative z-10 max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center text-white">
          {heroSection?.subtitle && (
            <p className="text-lg font-medium text-white/90 mb-4">{heroSection.subtitle}</p>
          )}
          <h1 className="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold mb-6">{heroSection?.title}</h1>
          {heroSection?.description && (
            <p className="text-lg text-white/90 max-w-3xl mx-auto">{heroSection.description}</p>
          )}
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Intro Section */}
      {introSection && (
        <section className="py-16 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto text-center">
              <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">{introSection.title}</h2>
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 mb-8">{introSection.description}</p>
              {introSection.highlights && introSection.highlights.length > 0 && (
                <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4">
                  {introSection.highlights.map((highlight, index) => (
                    <div key={index} className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 text-gray-700">
                      <FiCheckCircle className="text-green-600 flex-shrink-0" />
                      <span className="text-sm font-medium">{highlight}</span>
                    </div>
                  ))}
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Pricing Categories */}
      {pricingCategories && pricingCategories.length > 0 && (
        <section className="py-16">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="space-y-16">
              {pricingCategories.map((category) => {
                const IconComponent = iconMap[category.icon] || FiBook;

                return (
                  <div key={category.id}>
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-4 mb-8">
                      <div className="p-3 bg-blue-100 rounded-xl">
                        <IconComponent className="text-3xl text-[#01366b]" />
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{category.title}</h2>
                        <p className="text-gray-600">{category.description}</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
                      {category.courses?.map((course) => (
                        <div key={course.id} className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-6 hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow border border-gray-100">
                          <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3">{course.name}</h3>
                          <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-4 flex items-center gap-2">
                            <FiClock className="text-[#01366b]" />
                            {course.duration}
                          </p>

                          {/* Pricing */}
                          <div className="mb-6">
                            <div className="flex items-baseline gap-2 mb-1">
                              <span className="text-3xl font-bold text-[#01366b]">
                                GH₵{course.standardPrice.toLocaleString()}
                              </span>
                              <span className="text-sm text-gray-600">standard</span>
                            </div>

                            {course.earlyBirdPrice && (
                              <p className="text-sm text-green-600 font-semibold">
                                Early bird: GH₵{course.earlyBirdPrice.toLocaleString()}
                              </p>
                            )}

                            {course.groupPrice && (
                              <p className="text-sm text-blue-600 font-semibold">
                                Group rate: GH₵{course.groupPrice.toLocaleString()}/person
                              </p>
                            )}
                          </div>

                          {/* Includes */}
                          {course.includes && course.includes.length > 0 && (
                            <div>
                              <h4 className="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3">Includes:</h4>
                              <ul className="space-y-2">
                                {course.includes.map((item, idx) => (
                                  <li key={idx} className="flex items-start gap-2 text-sm text-gray-700">
                                    <FiCheckCircle className="text-green-600 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5" />
                                    <span>{item}</span>
                                  </li>
                                ))}
                              </ul>
                            </div>
                          )}
                        </div>
                      ))}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* Accommodation Pricing */}
      {accommodationPricing && (
        <section className="py-16 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">

                <p className="text-lg text-gray-600 max-w-3xl mx-auto">{accommodationPricing.description}</p>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 max-w-4xl mx-auto">
              {accommodationPricing.options?.map((option) => (
                <div key={option.id} className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-8">

                    <FiHome className="text-2xl text-[#01366b]" />

                  </div>

                  <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4">{option.description}</p>

                  <div className="mb-6">
                    <div className="flex items-baseline gap-2">

                        GH₵{option.pricePerNight.toLocaleString()}
                      </span>
                      <span className="text-sm text-gray-600">per night</span>
                    </div>

                  {option.includes && option.includes.length > 0 && (

                        {option.includes.map((item, idx) => (

                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">{method.name}</h3>
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">Processing: {method.processingTime}</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    <p className="text-gray-700 mb-4">{method.description}</p>

                    {method.details && method.details.length > 0 && (
                      <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-4">
                        <ul className="space-y-2">
                          {method.details.map((detail, idx) => (
                            <li key={idx} className="text-sm text-gray-700">
                              {detail}
                            </li>
                          ))}
                        </ul>
                      </div>
                    )}
                  </div>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* FAQ Section */}
      {faqSection && (
        <section className="py-16 bg-gray-50">
          <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <div className="text-center mb-12">
              <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">{faqSection.title}</h2>
            </div>

            <div className="space-y-4">
              {faqSection.faqs?.map((faq) => (
                <details key={faq.id} className="group bg-white rounded-xl shadow p-6">
                  <summary className="flex items-center justify-between cursor-pointer list-none">
                    <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 pr-4">{faq.question}</h3>
                    <FiChevronDown className="text-2xl text-[#01366b] group-open:rotate-180 transition-transform flex-shrink-0" />
                  </summary>
                  <div className="mt-4 text-gray-700 leading-relaxed">
                    {faq.answer}
                  </div>
                </details>
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}

      {/* CTA Section */}
      {ctaSection && (
        <section className="py-16 bg-gradient-to-r from-[#01366b] to-[#446494]">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 text-center">
            <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-white mb-4">{ctaSection.title}</h2>
            {ctaSection.description && (
              <p className="text-lg text-white/90 mb-8 max-w-2xl mx-auto">{ctaSection.description}</p>
            )}
            <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center">
              {ctaSection.primaryButton && (
                <Button
                  href={ctaSection.primaryButton.url}
                  size="lg"
                  backgroundColor={ctaSection.primaryButton.backgroundColor}
                  textColor={ctaSection.primaryButton.textColor}
                  icon={FiArrowRight}
                  iconPosition="right"
                >
                  {ctaSection.primaryButton.text}
                </Button>
              )}
              {ctaSection.secondaryButton && (
                <Button
                  href={ctaSection.secondaryButton.url}
                  size="lg"
                  backgroundColor={ctaSection.secondaryButton.backgroundColor}
                  textColor={ctaSection.secondaryButton.textColor}
                  borderColor={ctaSection.secondaryButton.borderColor}
                  hoverBackgroundColor="white"
                  hoverTextColor="#01366b"
                >
                  {ctaSection.secondaryButton.text}
                </Button>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

## API SUMMARY

**Page**: Training - Prices
**Route**: `/training/prices`
**Data Source**: Single Type `training-prices-page`
**Caching**: ISR with 1-hour revalidation

**Key Features**:
- Comprehensive pricing for 4 training categories (9 courses total)
- Certificate programs, workshops, online learning, custom training
- 2 accommodation options with detailed pricing
- 4 discount types (early bird, group, member, repeat participant)
- 4 additional cost items
- 4 payment methods with full details
- 6 pricing FAQs with collapsible accordion
- Dual CTA to calendar and contact

**Pricing Categories**:
1. **Certificate Programs** - 2 courses (GH₵2,000-2,500)
2. **Short Courses & Workshops** - 3 courses (GH₵600-1,200)
3. **Online Learning** - 2 courses (GH₵400-600)
4. **Custom In-House Training** - 2 options (GH₵5,000-12,000)

**Discount Programs**:
- Early Bird: Up to 15% (21+ days before)
- Group: Up to 20% (3+ participants)
- Member Organization: 10% (CUA members)
- Repeat Participant: 5% (previous attendees)

**Components Used**:
- 7 new section components (pricing-category, accommodation-pricing, discounts-list, additional-costs, payment-methods, faq-list)
- 6 new element components (course-pricing, accommodation-price, discount-item, cost-item, payment-method, faq-item)

**Related Pages**:
- Links to: Training Calendar, Registration, Contact
- Part of: Training section

**Display Logic**:
- Pricing organized by category with icons
- Standard, early bird, and group pricing displayed
- Includes list for each course
- Discounts highlighted with green styling
- Payment methods with processing times
- FAQ accordion using HTML details element
- All prices in GH₵ with proper formatting
