```javascript
"use client";

import { useState, useMemo } from "react";
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from "framer-motion";
import {
  FiSearch,
  FiMap,
  FiList,
  FiMapPin,
  FiPhone,
  FiMail,
  FiGlobe,
  FiClock,
  FiUsers,
  FiCheckCircle,
  FiStar,
  FiFilter,
  FiX,
  FiDollarSign,
  FiTrendingUp,
  FiSmartphone,
  FiShield,
  FiPieChart,
  FiHome,
} from "react-icons/fi";
import dynamic from "next/dynamic";
import Link from "next/link";
import Image from "next/image";
import { getStrapiMedia } from "../lib/api";

// Dynamic import for map to avoid SSR issues
const CreditUnionsMap = dynamic(() => import("./CreditUnionsMap"), {
  ssr: false,
  loading: () => (
    <div className="h-[600px] bg-gray-100 rounded-lg flex items-center justify-center">
      <p className="text-gray-500">Loading map...</p>
    </div>
  ),
});

const iconMap = {
  FiDollarSign,
  FiTrendingUp,
  FiSmartphone,
  FiShield,
  FiPieChart,
  FiUsers,
  FiHome,
  FiMapPin,
  FiCheckCircle,
  FiMail,
};

export default function FindCreditUnionClient({ sections, creditUnions }) {
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState("");
  const [selectedRegion, setSelectedRegion] = useState("");
  const [selectedServices, setSelectedServices] = useState([]);
  const [selectedMembershipType, setSelectedMembershipType] = useState("");
  const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState("list"); // "list" or "map"
  const [showFilters, setShowFilters] = useState(true);

  // Find sections
  const searchHeader = sections.find(
    (s) => s.__component === "sections.search-header"
  );
  const filterOptions = sections.find(
    (s) => s.__component === "sections.filter-options"
  );
  const viewToggle = sections.find(
    (s) => s.__component === "sections.view-toggle"
  );
  const directoryInfo = sections.find(
    (s) => s.__component === "sections.directory-info"
  );
  const helpSection = sections.find(
    (s) => s.__component === "sections.help-section"
  );

  // Filter credit unions
  const filteredCreditUnions = useMemo(() => {
    return creditUnions.filter((cu) => {
      const attrs = cu.attributes;

      // Search term filter
      if (searchTerm) {
        const searchLower = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
        const matchesSearch =
          attrs.name?.toLowerCase().includes(searchLower) ||
          attrs.description?.toLowerCase().includes(searchLower) ||
          attrs.city?.toLowerCase().includes(searchLower) ||
          attrs.district?.toLowerCase().includes(searchLower);

        if (!matchesSearch) return false;
      }

      // Region filter
      if (selectedRegion && attrs.region !== selectedRegion) {
        return false;
      }

      // Services filter
      if (selectedServices.length > 0) {
        const hasAllServices = selectedServices.every((service) =>
          attrs.servicesOffered?.includes(service)
        );
        if (!hasAllServices) return false;
      }

      // Membership type filter
      if (
        selectedMembershipType &&
        attrs.membershipType !== selectedMembershipType
      ) {
        return false;
      }

      return true;
    });
  }, [
    creditUnions,
    searchTerm,
    selectedRegion,
    selectedServices,
    selectedMembershipType,
  ]);

  // Handle service toggle
  const toggleService = (service) => {
    setSelectedServices((prev) =>
      prev.includes(service)
        ? prev.filter((s) => s !== service)
        : [...prev, service]
    );
  };

  // Clear all filters
  const clearFilters = () => {
    setSearchTerm("");
    setSelectedRegion("");
    setSelectedServices([]);
    setSelectedMembershipType("");
  };

  const hasActiveFilters =
    searchTerm ||
    selectedRegion ||
    selectedServices.length > 0 ||
    selectedMembershipType;

  return (
    <div className="w-full">
      {/* Search Header */}
      {searchHeader && (
        <div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] to-[#446494] text-white py-16">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12">
            <motion.div
              initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
              animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
              transition={{ duration: 0.6 }}
              className="text-center"
            >
              <h1 className="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold mb-4">
                {searchHeader.title}
              </h1>
              <p className="text-xl text-white/90 mb-8 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
                {searchHeader.subtitle}
              </p>

              {/* Search Bar */}
              <div className="max-w-2xl mx-auto relative">
                <div className="relative">
                  <FiSearch className="absolute left-4 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 text-gray-400 text-xl" />
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    placeholder={searchHeader.searchPlaceholder}
                    value={searchTerm}
                    onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
                    className="w-full pl-12 pr-4 py-4 rounded-lg text-gray-900 text-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-white/50"
                  />
                </div>
              </div>

              {/* Total Count */}
              <div className="mt-6">
                <p className="text-white/80">
                  <span className="font-bold text-2xl text-white">
                    {filteredCreditUnions.length}
                  </span>{" "}
                  {searchHeader.totalCountLabel}
                </p>
              </div>
            </motion.div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}

      {/* Main Content */}
      <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 lg:px-12 py-12">
        <div className="flex flex-col lg:flex-row gap-8">
          {/* Filters Sidebar */}
          {filterOptions && (
            <motion.div
              initial={{ opacity: 0, x: -20 }}
              animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
              className={`lg:w-80 ${showFilters ? "block" : "hidden lg:block"}`}
            >
              <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-gray-200 p-6 sticky top-6">
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-6">
                  <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 flex items-center gap-2">
                    <FiFilter className="text-[#01366b]" />
                    {filterOptions.title}
                  </h3>
                  <button
                    onClick={() => setShowFilters(false)}
                    className="lg:hidden text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700"
                  >
                    <FiX className="text-xl" />
                  </button>
                </div>

                <div className="space-y-6">
                  {filterOptions.filters?.map((filter) => (
                    <div key={filter.id} className="space-y-3">
                      <label className="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700">
                        {filter.label}
                      </label>

                      {filter.type === "region" && (
                        <select
                          value={selectedRegion}
                          onChange={(e) => setSelectedRegion(e.target.value)}
                          className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b]/20"
                        >
                          <option value="">{filter.placeholder}</option>
                          {filter.options?.map((option) => (
                            <option key={option.id} value={option.value}>
                              {option.label} ({option.count})
                            </option>
                          ))}
                        </select>
                      )}

                      {filter.type === "services" && (
                        <div className="space-y-2">
                          {filter.options?.map((option) => {
                            const Icon = iconMap[option.icon] || FiCheckCircle;
                            return (
                              <label
                                key={option.id}
                                className="flex items-center gap-3 p-3 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-50 cursor-pointer transition-colors"
                              >
                                <input
                                  type="checkbox"
                                  checked={selectedServices.includes(
                                    option.value
                                  )}
                                  onChange={() => toggleService(option.value)}
                                  className="w-4 h-4 text-[#01366b] rounded focus:ring-[#01366b]"
                                />
                                <Icon className="text-[#01366b]" />
                                <span className="text-sm text-gray-700">
                                  {option.label}
                                </span>
                              </label>
                            );
                          })}
                        </div>
                      )}

                      {filter.type === "membershipType" && (
                        <div className="space-y-2">
                          {filter.options?.map((option) => (
                            <label
                              key={option.id}
                              className="flex items-start gap-3 p-3 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-50 cursor-pointer transition-colors"
                            >
                              <input
                                type="radio"
                                name="membershipType"
                                checked={
                                  selectedMembershipType === option.value
                                }
                                onChange={() =>
                                  setSelectedMembershipType(option.value)
                                }
                                className="mt-1 w-4 h-4 text-[#01366b] focus:ring-[#01366b]"
                              />
                              <div className="flex-1">
                                <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">
                                  {option.label}
                                </p>
                                <p className="text-xs text-gray-500 mt-1">
                                  {option.description}
                                </p>
                              </div>
                            </label>
                          ))}
                        </div>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  ))}
                </div>

                {/* Clear Filters */}
                {hasActiveFilters && (
                  <button
                    onClick={clearFilters}
                    className="w-full mt-6 px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-[#01366b] border border-[#01366b] rounded-lg hover:bg-[#01366b] hover:text-white transition-colors"
                  >
                    Clear All Filters
                  </button>
                )}
              </div>
            </motion.div>
          )}

          {/* Results Section */}
          <div className="flex-1">
            {/* View Toggle & Filter Button */}
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-6">
              <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
                <button
                  onClick={() => setShowFilters(true)}
                  className="lg:hidden flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50"
                >
                  <FiFilter />
                  Filters
                  {hasActiveFilters && (
                    <span className="bg-[#01366b] text-white text-xs px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full">
                      Active
                    </span>
                  )}
                </button>

                <p className="text-gray-600">
                  Showing{" "}
                  <span className="font-semibold text-gray-900">
                    {filteredCreditUnions.length}
                  </span>{" "}
                  credit union{filteredCreditUnions.length !== 1 ? "s" : ""}
                </p>
              </div>

              {viewToggle && (
                <div className="flex items-center gap-2 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg p-1">
                  {viewToggle.views?.map((view) => {
                    const Icon = view.type === "list" ? FiList : FiMap;
                    return (
                      <button
                        key={view.id}
                        onClick={() => setViewMode(view.type)}
                        className={`flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 rounded-md transition-colors ${
                          viewMode === view.type
                            ? "bg-[#01366b] text-white"
                            : "text-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-100"
                        }`}
                      >
                        <Icon />
                        <span className="hidden sm:inline">{view.label}</span>
                      </button>
                    );
                  })}
                </div>
              )}
            </div>

            {/* List View */}
            {viewMode === "list" && (
              <div className="space-y-6">
                <AnimatePresence mode="popLayout">
                  {filteredCreditUnions.map((cu) => (
                    <CreditUnionCard key={cu.id} creditUnion={cu} />
                  ))}
                </AnimatePresence>

                {filteredCreditUnions.length === 0 && (
                  <motion.div
                    initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
                    animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
                    className="text-center py-12"
                  >
                    <FiSearch className="mx-auto text-5xl text-gray-300 mb-4" />
                    <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                      No credit unions found
                    </h3>
                    <p className="text-gray-600 mb-6">
                      Try adjusting your filters or search term
                    </p>
                    {hasActiveFilters && (
                      <button
                        onClick={clearFilters}
                        className="px-6 py-2 bg-[#01366b] text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-[#024a8f] transition-colors"
                      >
                        Clear Filters
                      </button>
                    )}
                  </motion.div>
                )}
              </div>
            )}

            {/* Map View */}
            {viewMode === "map" && (
              <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-gray-200 overflow-hidden">
                <CreditUnionsMap creditUnions={filteredCreditUnions} />
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Directory Info */}
        {directoryInfo && (
          <motion.div
            initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
            animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
            transition={{ delay: 0.2 }}
            className="mt-16 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-gray-200 p-8"
          >
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              {directoryInfo.title}
            </h2>
            <p className="text-gray-600 mb-8">{directoryInfo.content}</p>

            <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6">
              {directoryInfo.stats?.map((stat) => {
                const Icon = iconMap[stat.icon] || FiCheckCircle;
                return (
                  <div
                    key={stat.id}
                    className="text-center p-4 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg"
                  >
                    <Icon className="mx-auto text-3xl text-[#01366b] mb-2" />
                    <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-1">
                      {stat.value}
                    </p>
                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">{stat.label}</p>
                  </div>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </motion.div>
        )}

        {/* Help Section */}
        {helpSection && (
          <motion.div
            initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
            animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
            transition={{ delay: 0.3 }}
            className="mt-8 bg-gradient-to-r from-[#01366b] to-[#446494] rounded-lg p-8 text-white"
          >
            <div className="flex flex-col md:flex-row items-center justify-between gap-6">
              <div className="flex-1">
                <h3 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-2">
                  {helpSection.title}
                </h3>
                <p className="text-white/90 mb-4">{helpSection.description}</p>
                {helpSection.contactInfo && (
                  <div className="space-y-2 text-sm">
                    <p className="flex items-center gap-2">
                      <FiPhone />
                      {helpSection.contactInfo.phone}
                    </p>
                    <p className="flex items-center gap-2">
                      <FiMail />
                      {helpSection.contactInfo.email}
                    </p>
                    <p className="flex items-center gap-2">
                      <FiClock />
                      {helpSection.contactInfo.availableHours}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
              {helpSection.ctaButton && (
                <Link
                  href={helpSection.ctaButton.link}
                  className="px-8 py-3 bg-white text-[#01366b] font-semibold rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors flex items-center gap-2"
                >
                  {helpSection.ctaButton.text}
                  {helpSection.ctaButton.icon && (
                    <FiMail className="text-lg" />
                  )}
                </Link>
              )}
            </div>
          </motion.div>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// Credit Union Card Component
function CreditUnionCard({ creditUnion }) {
  const attrs = creditUnion.attributes;
  const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(false);

  const serviceIcons = {
    savings: FiDollarSign,
    loans: FiTrendingUp,
    "mobile-banking": FiSmartphone,
    insurance: FiShield,
    investments: FiPieChart,
    youth: FiUsers,
  };

  return (
    <motion.div
      layout
      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}
      className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-gray-200 overflow-hidden hover:shadow-md transition-shadow"
    >
      <div className="p-6">
        {/* Header */}
        <div className="flex items-start justify-between mb-4">
          <div className="flex items-start gap-4 flex-1">
            {attrs.logo?.data && (
              <div className="w-16 h-16 relative flex-shrink-0">
                <Image
                  src={getStrapiMedia(attrs.logo.data.attributes.url)}
                  alt={attrs.logo.data.attributes.alternativeText || attrs.name}
                  fill
                  className="object-contain"
                />
              </div>
            )}
            <div className="flex-1">
              <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-1">
                <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">
                  {attrs.name}
                </h3>
                {attrs.featured && (
                  <FiStar className="text-yellow-500 fill-yellow-500" />
                )}
                {attrs.verified && (
                  <FiCheckCircle className="text-green-500" />
                )}
              </div>
              <p className="text-gray-600 text-sm">{attrs.description}</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Contact Info */}
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-4">
          <div className="space-y-2 text-sm">
            <p className="flex items-start gap-2 text-gray-700">
              <FiMapPin className="mt-0.5 flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
              <span>
                {attrs.address}, {attrs.city}
              </span>
            </p>
            {attrs.contactInfo && (
              <>
                <p className="flex items-center gap-2 text-gray-700">
                  <FiPhone className="flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
                  <a
                    href={`tel:${attrs.contactInfo.phone}`}
                    className="hover:text-[#01366b]"
                  >
                    {attrs.contactInfo.phone}
                  </a>
                </p>
                <p className="flex items-center gap-2 text-gray-700">
                  <FiMail className="flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
                  <a
                    href={`mailto:${attrs.contactInfo.email}`}
                    className="hover:text-[#01366b]"
                  >
                    {attrs.contactInfo.email}
                  </a>
                </p>
                {attrs.contactInfo.website && (
                  <p className="flex items-center gap-2 text-gray-700">
                    <FiGlobe className="flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
                    <a
                      href={attrs.contactInfo.website}
                      target="_blank"
                      rel="noopener noreferrer"
                      className="hover:text-[#01366b]"
                    >
                      Visit Website
                    </a>
                  </p>
                )}
              </>
            )}
          </div>

          {attrs.operatingHours && (
            <div className="text-sm">
              <p className="flex items-start gap-2 text-gray-700 mb-1">
                <FiClock className="mt-0.5 flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
                <span className="font-semibold">Operating Hours:</span>
              </p>
              <div className="ml-6 space-y-1 text-gray-600">
                <p>{attrs.operatingHours.weekdays}</p>
                <p>{attrs.operatingHours.saturday}</p>
              </div>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>

        {/* Services Offered */}
        {attrs.servicesOffered && attrs.servicesOffered.length > 0 && (
          <div className="mb-4">
            <p className="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
              Services Offered:
            </p>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
              {attrs.servicesOffered.map((service) => {
                const Icon = serviceIcons[service] || FiCheckCircle;
                return (
                  <span
                    key={service}
                    className="inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 px-3 py-1.5 bg-blue-50 text-[#01366b] rounded-full text-xs font-medium"
                  >
                    <Icon className="text-sm" />
                    {service
                      .split("-")
                      .map((w) => w.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + w.slice(1))
                      .join(" ")}
                  </span>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        )}

        {/* Expandable Details */}
        <AnimatePresence>
          {isExpanded && (
            <motion.div
              initial={{ opacity: 0, height: 0 }}
              animate={{ opacity: 1, height: "auto" }}
              exit={{ opacity: 0, height: 0 }}
              className="border-t border-gray-200 pt-4 mt-4 space-y-4"
            >
              {/* Special Programs */}
              {attrs.specialPrograms && attrs.specialPrograms.length > 0 && (
                <div>
                  <p className="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                    Special Programs:
                  </p>
                  <ul className="space-y-2">
                    {attrs.specialPrograms.map((program) => (
                      <li key={program.id} className="text-sm text-gray-600">
                        <span className="font-medium text-gray-900">
                          {program.name}:
                        </span>{" "}
                        {program.description}
                      </li>
                    ))}
                  </ul>
                </div>
              )}

              {/* Membership Requirements */}
              {attrs.membershipRequirements && (
                <div>
                  <p className="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">
                    Membership Requirements:
                  </p>
                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
                    {attrs.membershipRequirements}
                  </p>
                </div>
              )}

              {/* Stats */}
              <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-4 pt-2">
                {attrs.establishedYear && (
                  <div className="text-center p-3 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg">
                    <p className="text-xs text-gray-600 mb-1">Established</p>
                    <p className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900">
                      {attrs.establishedYear}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                )}
                {attrs.memberCount && (
                  <div className="text-center p-3 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg">
                    <p className="text-xs text-gray-600 mb-1">Members</p>
                    <p className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900">
                      {attrs.memberCount.toLocaleString()}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                )}
                {attrs.totalAssets && (
                  <div className="text-center p-3 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg">
                    <p className="text-xs text-gray-600 mb-1">Total Assets</p>
                    <p className="text-sm font-bold text-gray-900">
                      {attrs.totalAssets}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            </motion.div>
          )}
        </AnimatePresence>

        {/* Toggle Button */}
        <button
          onClick={() => setIsExpanded(!isExpanded)}
          className="mt-4 w-full py-2 text-sm font-medium text-[#01366b] hover:bg-blue-50 rounded-lg transition-colors"
        >
          {isExpanded ? "Show Less" : "Show More Details"}
        </button>
      </div>
    </motion.div>
  );
}
```

```javascript
"use client";

import { MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker, Popup } from "react-leaflet";
import "leaflet/dist/leaflet.css";
import L from "leaflet";
import { FiMapPin, FiPhone, FiMail } from "react-icons/fi";

// Fix for default marker icon
delete L.Icon.Default.prototype._getIconUrl;
L.Icon.Default.mergeOptions({
  iconRetinaUrl:
    "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-icon-2x.png",
  iconUrl:
    "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-icon.png",
  shadowUrl:
    "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-shadow.png",
});

export default function CreditUnionsMap({ creditUnions }) {
  // Default center (Accra, Ghana)
  const defaultCenter = [5.6037, -0.187];

  // Filter credit unions with valid location data
  const creditUnionsWithLocation = creditUnions.filter(
    (cu) =>
      cu.attributes.location?.latitude && cu.attributes.location?.longitude
  );

  return (
    <MapContainer
      center={defaultCenter}
      zoom={7}
      style={{ height: "600px", width: "100%" }}
      scrollWheelZoom={false}
    >
      <TileLayer
        attribution='&copy; <a href="https://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright">OpenStreetMap</a> contributors'
        url="https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png"
      />

      {creditUnionsWithLocation.map((cu) => {
        const attrs = cu.attributes;
        const position = [
          attrs.location.latitude,
          attrs.location.longitude,
        ];

        return (
          <Marker key={cu.id} position={position}>
            <Popup>
              <div className="p-2 min-w-[250px]">
                <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">{attrs.name}</h3>
                <div className="space-y-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                  <p className="flex items-start gap-2">
                    <FiMapPin className="mt-0.5 flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
                    <span>
                      {attrs.address}, {attrs.city}
                    </span>
                  </p>
                  {attrs.contactInfo && (
                    <>
                      <p className="flex items-center gap-2">
                        <FiPhone className="flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
                        <a
                          href={`tel:${attrs.contactInfo.phone}`}
                          className="hover:text-[#01366b]"
                        >
                          {attrs.contactInfo.phone}
                        </a>
                      </p>
                      <p className="flex items-center gap-2">
                        <FiMail className="flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
                        <a
                          href={`mailto:${attrs.contactInfo.email}`}
                          className="hover:text-[#01366b] text-xs"
                        >
                          {attrs.contactInfo.email}
                        </a>
                      </p>
                    </>
                  )}
                </div>
              </div>
            </Popup>
          </Marker>
        );
      })}
    </MapContainer>
  );
}
```

### API Summary

**Endpoints Used:**
1. `GET /api/find-credit-union-page?populate[sections][populate]=*` - Page content
2. `GET /api/credit-unions?populate=*&sort=name:asc&pagination[pageSize]=100` - All credit unions

**New Strapi Content Types:**
- Single Type: `find-credit-union-page`
- Collection Type: `credit-unions`

**New Components:**
- Section: `sections.search-header`
- Section: `sections.filter-options`
- Section: `sections.view-toggle`
- Section: `sections.directory-info`
- Element: `elements.map-coordinates`
- Element: `elements.credit-union-contact`
- Element: `elements.operating-hours`
- Element: `elements.special-program`
- Element: `elements.filter-group`
- Element: `elements.filter-option`
- Element: `elements.view-option`
- Element: `elements.stat-item`

**Features:**
- Comprehensive search functionality
- Multi-criteria filtering (region, services, membership type)
- List and map view toggle
- Interactive Leaflet map with markers
- 156 credit unions across 8 regions
- 6 service categories
- 3 membership types
- Featured and verified badges
- Expandable credit union details
- Special programs display
- Operating hours information
- Contact information with click-to-call/email
- Directory statistics
- Help section with contact options
- Real-time filter results
- Clear filters functionality
- Empty state handling
- Responsive design

**Caching Strategy:**
- ISR with 1-hour (3600s) revalidation
- All credit unions fetched server-side
- Client-side filtering for instant results
- Dynamic map import to avoid SSR issues
- Optimized image loading for logos

---

## Page 30: News Article Detail (`/news/[slug]`)

### Overview
Dynamic page displaying individual news articles with full content, rich media, related articles, social sharing, and comment functionality.

### API Endpoint

**Collection Type**: `news-articles`

```
GET /api/news-articles?filters[slug][$eq]={slug}&populate=deep
```

**Detailed populate structure:**
```javascript
{
  filters: {
    slug: {
      $eq: slug
    }
  },
  populate: {
    featuredImage: {
      fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
    },
    gallery: {
      fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
    },
    author: {
      populate: {
        photo: {
          fields: ['url', 'alternativeText']
        }
      }
    },
    category: {
      fields: ['name', 'slug', 'color']
    },
    tags: {
      fields: ['name', 'slug']
    },
    relatedArticles: {
      populate: {
        featuredImage: {
          fields: ['url', 'alternativeText']
        },
        category: {
          fields: ['name', 'slug', 'color']
        },
        author: {
          fields: ['name']
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

**For Related Articles (if not manually set):**
```
GET /api/news-articles?filters[category][slug][$eq]={categorySlug}&filters[id][$ne]={currentArticleId}&sort=publishedDate:desc&pagination[limit]=3&populate[featuredImage][fields][0]=url&populate[featuredImage][fields][1]=alternativeText&populate[category][fields][0]=name&populate[category][fields][1]=color&populate[author][fields][0]=name
```

### Next.js Page Implementation

**File**: `app/news/[slug]/page.js`

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from "@/app/lib/api";
import { notFound } from "next/navigation";
import NewsArticleClient from "./NewsArticleClient";
import ReactMarkdown from "react-markdown";
import remarkGfm from "remark-gfm";

export const revalidate = 3600; // Revalidate every 1 hour

// Generate static params for all news articles
export async function generateStaticParams() {
  try {
    const articlesData = await fetchAPI("/news-articles", {
      fields: ["slug"],
      pagination: {
        pageSize: 100,
      },
    });

    return (
      articlesData?.data?.map((article) => ({
        slug: article.attributes.slug,
      })) || []
    );
  } catch (error) {
    console.error("Error generating static params:", error);
    return [];
  }
}

export async function generateMetadata({ params }) {
  try {
    const articlesData = await fetchAPI("/news-articles", {
      filters: {
        slug: {
          $eq: params.slug,
        },
      },
      populate: {
        featuredImage: {
          fields: ["url", "alternativeText"],
        },
        seo: {
          populate: {
            ogImage: {
              fields: ["url"],
            },
          },
        },
      },
    });

    const article = articlesData?.data?.[0];

    if (!article) {
      return {
        title: "Article Not Found",
      };
    }

    const attrs = article.attributes;
    const seo = attrs.seo;

    return {
      title: seo?.metaTitle || attrs.title,
      description: seo?.metaDescription || attrs.excerpt,
      keywords: seo?.keywords,
      openGraph: {
        title: seo?.metaTitle || attrs.title,
        description: seo?.metaDescription || attrs.excerpt,
        images: seo?.ogImage?.data
          ? [getStrapiMedia(seo.ogImage.data.attributes.url)]
          : attrs.featuredImage?.data
          ? [getStrapiMedia(attrs.featuredImage.data.attributes.url)]
          : [],
        type: "article",
        publishedTime: attrs.publishedDate,
      },
      twitter: {
        card: "summary_large_image",
        title: seo?.metaTitle || attrs.title,
        description: seo?.metaDescription || attrs.excerpt,
        images: seo?.ogImage?.data
          ? [getStrapiMedia(seo.ogImage.data.attributes.url)]
          : attrs.featuredImage?.data
          ? [getStrapiMedia(attrs.featuredImage.data.attributes.url)]
          : [],
      },
    };
  } catch (error) {
    return {
      title: "News Article",
    };
  }
}

export default async function NewsArticlePage({ params }) {
  let article = null;
  let relatedArticles = [];

  try {
    // Fetch article with all relationships
    const articlesData = await fetchAPI("/news-articles", {
      filters: {
        slug: {
          $eq: params.slug,
        },
      },
      populate: {
        featuredImage: {
          fields: ["url", "alternativeText", "width", "height"],
        },
        gallery: {
          fields: ["url", "alternativeText", "width", "height"],
        },
        author: {
          populate: {
            photo: {
              fields: ["url", "alternativeText"],
            },
          },
        },
        category: {
          fields: ["name", "slug", "color"],
        },
        tags: {
          fields: ["name", "slug"],
        },
        relatedArticles: {
          populate: {
            featuredImage: {
              fields: ["url", "alternativeText"],
            },
            category: {
              fields: ["name", "slug", "color"],
            },
            author: {
              fields: ["name"],
            },
          },
        },
      },
    });

    article = articlesData?.data?.[0];

    if (!article) {
      notFound();
    }

    // If no manual related articles, fetch by category
    if (
      !article.attributes.relatedArticles?.data ||
      article.attributes.relatedArticles.data.length === 0
    ) {
      const categorySlug = article.attributes.category?.data?.attributes?.slug;
      if (categorySlug) {
        const relatedData = await fetchAPI("/news-articles", {
          filters: {
            category: {
              slug: {
                $eq: categorySlug,
              },
            },
            id: {
              $ne: article.id,
            },
          },
          sort: ["publishedDate:desc"],
          pagination: {
            limit: 3,
          },
          populate: {
            featuredImage: {
              fields: ["url", "alternativeText"],
            },
            category: {
              fields: ["name", "slug", "color"],
            },
            author: {
              fields: ["name"],
            },
          },
        });

        relatedArticles = relatedData?.data || [];
      }
    } else {
      relatedArticles = article.attributes.relatedArticles.data;
    }

    // Increment view count (fire and forget)
    incrementViewCount(article.id).catch(console.error);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error("Error fetching news article:", error);
    notFound();
  }

  const attrs = article.attributes;

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      <NewsArticleClient article={article} relatedArticles={relatedArticles} />
    </div>
  );
}

// Helper function to increment view count
async function incrementViewCount(articleId) {
  try {
    const strapiUrl = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_STRAPI_URL || "http://localhost:1337";
    const apiToken = process.env.STRAPI_API_TOKEN;

    // Get current view count
    const currentArticle = await fetch(
      `${strapiUrl}/api/news-articles/${articleId}`,
      {
        headers: {
          Authorization: `Bearer ${apiToken}`,
        },
      }
    ).then((res) => res.json());

    const currentViews = currentArticle?.data?.attributes?.views || 0;

    // Update view count
    await fetch(`${strapiUrl}/api/news-articles/${articleId}`, {
      method: "PUT",
      headers: {
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        Authorization: `Bearer ${apiToken}`,
      },
      body: JSON.stringify({
        data: {
          views: currentViews + 1,
        },
      }),
    });
  } catch (error) {
    console.error("Failed to increment view count:", error);
  }
}
```

```javascript
"use client";

import { useState } from "react";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";
import {
  FiCalendar,
  FiClock,
  FiEye,
  FiUser,
  FiTag,
  FiShare2,
  FiTwitter,
  FiFacebook,
  FiLinkedin,
  FiMail,
  FiLink,
  FiChevronLeft,
  FiChevronRight,
} from "react-icons/fi";
import Image from "next/image";
import Link from "next/link";
import { getStrapiMedia } from "@/app/lib/api";
import ReactMarkdown from "react-markdown";
import remarkGfm from "remark-gfm";

export default function NewsArticleClient({ article, relatedArticles }) {
  const attrs = article.attributes;
  const [showShareMenu, setShowShareMenu] = useState(false);
  const [currentImageIndex, setCurrentImageIndex] = useState(0);
  const [showLightbox, setShowLightbox] = useState(false);

  const galleryImages = attrs.gallery?.data || [];

  // Format date
  const formatDate = (dateString) => {
    const date = new Date(dateString);
    return date.toLocaleDateString("en-US", {
      year: "numeric",
      month: "long",
      day: "numeric",
    });
  };

  // Share functions
  const shareUrl = typeof window !== "undefined" ? window.location.href : "";
  const shareTitle = attrs.title;

  const shareOnTwitter = () => {
    window.open(
      `https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=${encodeURIComponent(
        shareTitle
      )}&url=${encodeURIComponent(shareUrl)}`,
      "_blank"
    );
  };

  const shareOnFacebook = () => {
    window.open(
      `https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=${encodeURIComponent(
        shareUrl
      )}`,
      "_blank"
    );
  };

  const shareOnLinkedIn = () => {
    window.open(
      `https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=${encodeURIComponent(
        shareUrl
      )}`,
      "_blank"
    );
  };

  const shareViaEmail = () => {
    window.location.href = `mailto:?subject=${encodeURIComponent(
      shareTitle
    )}&body=${encodeURIComponent(shareUrl)}`;
  };

  const copyLink = async () => {
    try {
      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(shareUrl);
      alert("Link copied to clipboard!");
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Failed to copy link:", error);
    }
  };

  // Lightbox navigation
  const openLightbox = (index) => {
    setCurrentImageIndex(index);
    setShowLightbox(true);
  };

  const closeLightbox = () => {
    setShowLightbox(false);
  };

  const goToPrevious = () => {
    setCurrentImageIndex((prev) =>
      prev === 0 ? galleryImages.length - 1 : prev - 1
    );
  };

  const goToNext = () => {
    setCurrentImageIndex((prev) =>
      prev === galleryImages.length - 1 ? 0 : prev + 1
    );
  };

  return (
    <div className="w-full">
      {/* Article Header */}
      <div className="bg-white border-b border-gray-200">
        <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 py-8">
          {/* Breadcrumb */}
          <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-gray-600 mb-6">
            <Link href="/" className="hover:text-[#01366b]">
              Home
            </Link>
            <span>/</span>
            <Link href="/news" className="hover:text-[#01366b]">
              News
            </Link>
            <span>/</span>
            {attrs.category?.data && (
              <>
                <Link
                  href={`/news/category/${attrs.category.data.attributes.slug}`}
                  className="hover:text-[#01366b]"
                >
                  {attrs.category.data.attributes.name}
                </Link>
                <span>/</span>
              </>
            )}
            <span className="text-gray-900">{attrs.title}</span>
          </div>

          {/* Category Badge */}
          {attrs.category?.data && (
            <div className="mb-4">
              <Link
                href={`/news/category/${attrs.category.data.attributes.slug}`}
                className="inline-block px-4 py-1.5 rounded-full text-sm font-medium text-white"
                style={{
                  backgroundColor: attrs.category.data.attributes.color,
                }}
              >
                {attrs.category.data.attributes.name}
              </Link>
            </div>
          )}

          {/* Title */}
          <motion.h1
            initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
            animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
            className="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6"
          >
            {attrs.title}
          </motion.h1>

          {/* Excerpt */}
          {attrs.excerpt && (
            <p className="text-xl text-gray-600 mb-8 leading-relaxed">
              {attrs.excerpt}
            </p>
          )}

          {/* Meta Information */}
          <div className="flex flex-wrap items-center gap-6 text-sm text-gray-600">
            {/* Author */}
            {attrs.author?.data && (
              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                {attrs.author.data.attributes.photo?.data && (
                  <div className="w-10 h-10 relative rounded-full overflow-hidden">
                    <Image
                      src={getStrapiMedia(
                        attrs.author.data.attributes.photo.data.attributes.url
                      )}
                      alt={attrs.author.data.attributes.name}
                      fill
                      className="object-cover"
                    />
                  </div>
                )}
                <div>
                  <p className="font-medium text-gray-900">
                    {attrs.author.data.attributes.name}
                  </p>
                  {attrs.author.data.attributes.title && (
                    <p className="text-xs text-gray-500">
                      {attrs.author.data.attributes.title}
                    </p>
                  )}
                </div>
              </div>
            )}

            {/* Published Date */}
            <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
              <FiCalendar className="text-[#01366b]" />
              <span>{formatDate(attrs.publishedDate)}</span>

        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Featured Image */}
      {attrs.featuredImage?.data && (
        <div className="w-full h-[500px] relative bg-gray-200">
          <Image
            src={getStrapiMedia(attrs.featuredImage.data.attributes.url)}
            alt={
              attrs.featuredImage.data.attributes.alternativeText || attrs.title
            }
            fill
            className="object-cover"
            priority
          />
        </div>
      )}

      {/* Article Content */}
      <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 py-12">
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-12">
          {/* Main Content */}
          <div className="lg:col-span-2">
            <article className="prose prose-lg max-w-none">
              <ReactMarkdown
                remarkPlugins={[remarkGfm]}
                components={{
                  h1: ({ node, ...props }) => (
                    <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mt-8 mb-4" {...props} />
                  ),
                  h2: ({ node, ...props }) => (
                    <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mt-6 mb-3" {...props} />
                  ),
                  h3: ({ node, ...props }) => (
                    <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mt-4 mb-2" {...props} />
                  ),
                  p: ({ node, ...props }) => (
                    <p className="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed mb-4" {...props} />
                  ),
                  ul: ({ node, ...props }) => (
                    <ul className="list-disc list-inside space-y-2 mb-4" {...props} />
                  ),
                  ol: ({ node, ...props }) => (
                    <ol className="list-decimal list-inside space-y-2 mb-4" {...props} />
                  ),
                  blockquote: ({ node, ...props }) => (
                    <blockquote
                      className="border-l-4 border-[#01366b] pl-4 italic text-gray-600 my-6"
                      {...props}
                    />
                  ),
                  strong: ({ node, ...props }) => (
                    <strong className="font-bold text-gray-900" {...props} />
                  ),
                }}
              >
                {attrs.content}
              </ReactMarkdown>
            </article>

            {/* Gallery */}
            {galleryImages.length > 0 && (
              <div className="mt-12">
                <h3 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
                  Photo Gallery
                </h3>
                <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
                  {galleryImages.map((image, index) => (
                    <button
                      key={image.id}
                      onClick={() => openLightbox(index)}
                      className="relative h-48 bg-gray-200 rounded-lg overflow-hidden hover:opacity-90 transition-opacity"
                    >
                      <Image
                        src={getStrapiMedia(image.attributes.url)}
                        alt={image.attributes.alternativeText || `Gallery image ${index + 1}`}
                        fill
                        className="object-cover"
                      />
                    </button>
                  ))}
                </div>
              </div>
            )}

            {/* Tags */}
            {attrs.tags?.data && attrs.tags.data.length > 0 && (
              <div className="mt-12 pt-8 border-t border-gray-200">
                <div className="flex items-center gap-2 flex-wrap">
                  <FiTag className="text-gray-600" />
                  <span className="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700">
                    Tags:
                  </span>
                  {attrs.tags.data.map((tag) => (
                    <Link
                      key={tag.id}
                      href={`/news/tag/${tag.attributes.slug}`}
                      className="px-3 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 rounded-full text-sm hover:bg-gray-200 transition-colors"
                    >
                      {tag.attributes.name}
                    </Link>
                  ))}
                </div>
              </div>
            )}

            {/* Author Bio */}
            {attrs.author?.data?.attributes?.bio && (
              <div className="mt-12 p-6 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg">
                <h4 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                  About the Author
                </h4>
                <div className="flex items-start gap-4">
                  {attrs.author.data.attributes.photo?.data && (
                    <div className="w-16 h-16 relative rounded-full overflow-hidden flex-shrink-0">
                      <Image
                        src={getStrapiMedia(
                          attrs.author.data.attributes.photo.data.attributes.url
                        )}
                        alt={attrs.author.data.attributes.name}
                        fill
                        className="object-cover"
                      />
                    </div>
                  )}
                  <div>
                    <p className="font-bold text-gray-900">
                      {attrs.author.data.attributes.name}
                    </p>
                    {attrs.author.data.attributes.title && (
                      <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-2">
                        {attrs.author.data.attributes.title}
                      </p>
                    )}
                    <p className="text-gray-700 text-sm">
                      {attrs.author.data.attributes.bio}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          {/* Sidebar */}
          <div className="lg:col-span-1">
            {/* Related Articles */}
            {relatedArticles.length > 0 && (
              <div className="bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 p-6 sticky top-6">
                <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
                  Related Articles
                </h3>
                <div className="space-y-6">
                  {relatedArticles.map((relatedArticle) => (
                    <RelatedArticleCard
                      key={relatedArticle.id}
                      article={relatedArticle}
                    />
                  ))}
                </div>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Lightbox */}
      {showLightbox && galleryImages.length > 0 && (
        <div
          className="fixed inset-0 bg-black/90 z-50 flex items-center justify-center"
          onClick={closeLightbox}
        >
          <button
            onClick={closeLightbox}
            className="absolute top-4 right-4 text-white text-4xl hover:text-gray-300"
          >
            ×
          </button>

          <button
            onClick={(e) => {
              e.stopPropagation();
              goToPrevious();
            }}
            className="absolute left-4 text-white text-4xl hover:text-gray-300"
          >
            <FiChevronLeft />
          </button>

          <button
            onClick={(e) => {
              e.stopPropagation();
              goToNext();
            }}
            className="absolute right-4 text-white text-4xl hover:text-gray-300"
          >
            <FiChevronRight />
          </button>

          <div
            className="relative max-w-5xl max-h-[80vh] w-full h-full"
            onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}
          >
            <Image
              src={getStrapiMedia(
                galleryImages[currentImageIndex].attributes.url
              )}
              alt={
                galleryImages[currentImageIndex].attributes.alternativeText ||
                `Image ${currentImageIndex + 1}`
              }
              fill
              className="object-contain"
            />
          </div>

          <div className="absolute bottom-4 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 text-white">
            {currentImageIndex + 1} / {galleryImages.length}
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

// Related Article Card Component
function RelatedArticleCard({ article }) {
  const attrs = article.attributes;

  const formatDate = (dateString) => {
    const date = new Date(dateString);
    return date.toLocaleDateString("en-US", {
      month: "short",
      day: "numeric",
      year: "numeric",
    });
  };

  return (
    <Link
      href={`/news/${attrs.slug}`}
      className="block group hover:bg-gray-50 rounded-lg transition-colors p-2 -m-2"
    >
      {attrs.featuredImage?.data && (
        <div className="relative h-32 bg-gray-200 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-3">
          <Image
            src={getStrapiMedia(attrs.featuredImage.data.attributes.url)}
            alt={
              attrs.featuredImage.data.attributes.alternativeText || attrs.title
            }
            fill
            className="object-cover group-hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300"
          />
        </div>
      )}

      {attrs.category?.data && (
        <span
          className="inline-block px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium text-white mb-2"
          style={{ backgroundColor: attrs.category.data.attributes.color }}
        >
          {attrs.category.data.attributes.name}
        </span>
      )}

      <h4 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2 line-clamp-2 group-hover:text-[#01366b] transition-colors">
        {attrs.title}
      </h4>

      <div className="flex items-center gap-3 text-xs text-gray-600">
        <span>{formatDate(attrs.publishedDate)}</span>
        {attrs.readTime && (
          <>
            <span>•</span>
            <span>{attrs.readTime} min</span>
          </>
        )}
      </div>
    </Link>
  );
}
```

### API Summary

**Endpoints Used:**
1. `GET /api/news-articles?filters[slug][$eq]={slug}&populate=deep` - Article content with all relationships
2. `GET /api/news-articles?filters[category][slug][$eq]={categorySlug}&filters[id][$ne]={id}&sort=publishedDate:desc&pagination[limit]=3` - Related articles by category

**New Strapi Content Types:**
- Collection Type: `news-articles`
- Collection Type: `authors`
- Collection Type: `news-categories`
- Collection Type: `news-tags`

**New Components:**
- SEO: `seo.meta-data`

**Features:**
- Full markdown article content with custom styling
- Featured image display
- Photo gallery with lightbox
- Author information with photo and bio
- Category and tags display
- Article metadata (published date, read time, views)
- Social sharing (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Email, Copy Link)
- Related articles sidebar
- View count tracking
- SEO optimization with Open Graph and Twitter Cards
- Breadcrumb navigation
- Responsive design
- Static generation with ISR

**Caching Strategy:**
- ISR with 1-hour (3600s) revalidation
- Static generation for all articles
- View count incremented server-side (fire and forget)
- Related articles fetched automatically by category if not manually set

## Page 31: Event Detail (`/events/[slug]`)

### Overview
Dynamic page displaying individual event details with registration functionality, location maps, schedule information, and related events.

### API Endpoint

**Collection Type**: `events`

```
GET /api/events?filters[slug][$eq]={slug}&populate=deep
```

**Detailed populate structure:**
```javascript
{
  filters: {
    slug: {
      $eq: slug
    }
  },
  populate: {
    featuredImage: {
      fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
    },
    gallery: {
      fields: ['url', 'alternativeText', 'width', 'height']
    },
    venue: {
      populate: '*'
    },
    organizer: {
      populate: {
        logo: {
          fields: ['url', 'alternativeText']
        }
      }
    },
    speakers: {
      populate: {
        photo: {
          fields: ['url', 'alternativeText']
        }
      }
    },
    schedule: {
      populate: '*'
    },
    category: {
      fields: ['name', 'slug', 'color']
    },
    relatedEvents: {
      populate: {
        featuredImage: {
          fields: ['url', 'alternativeText']
        },
        category: {
          fields: ['name', 'slug', 'color']
        },
        venue: {
          fields: ['name', 'city']
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

**For Related Events (if not manually set):**
```
GET /api/events?filters[category][slug][$eq]={categorySlug}&filters[id][$ne]={currentEventId}&filters[startDate][$gte]={today}&sort=startDate:asc&pagination[limit]=3&populate[featuredImage][fields][0]=url&populate[category][fields][0]=name&populate[category][fields][1]=color&populate[venue][fields][0]=name&populate[venue][fields][1]=city
```

### Next.js Page Implementation

**File**: `app/events/[slug]/page.js`

```javascript
import { fetchAPI, getStrapiMedia } from "@/app/lib/api";
import { notFound } from "next/navigation";
import EventDetailClient from "./EventDetailClient";

export const revalidate = 1800; // Revalidate every 30 minutes (events change more frequently)

// Generate static params for all events
export async function generateStaticParams() {
  try {
    const eventsData = await fetchAPI("/events", {
      fields: ["slug"],
      pagination: {
        pageSize: 100,
      },
    });

    return (
      eventsData?.data?.map((event) => ({
        slug: event.attributes.slug,
      })) || []
    );
  } catch (error) {
    console.error("Error generating static params:", error);
    return [];
  }
}

export async function generateMetadata({ params }) {
  try {
    const eventsData = await fetchAPI("/events", {
      filters: {
        slug: {
          $eq: params.slug,
        },
      },
      populate: {
        featuredImage: {
          fields: ["url", "alternativeText"],
        },
        seo: {
          populate: {
            ogImage: {
              fields: ["url"],
            },
          },
        },
      },
    });

    const event = eventsData?.data?.[0];

    if (!event) {
      return {
        title: "Event Not Found",
      };
    }

    const attrs = event.attributes;
    const seo = attrs.seo;

    return {
      title: seo?.metaTitle || attrs.title,
      description: seo?.metaDescription || attrs.description,
      keywords: seo?.keywords,
      openGraph: {
        title: seo?.metaTitle || attrs.title,
        description: seo?.metaDescription || attrs.description,
        images: seo?.ogImage?.data
          ? [getStrapiMedia(seo.ogImage.data.attributes.url)]
          : attrs.featuredImage?.data
          ? [getStrapiMedia(attrs.featuredImage.data.attributes.url)]
          : [],
        type: "event",
      },
      twitter: {
        card: "summary_large_image",
        title: seo?.metaTitle || attrs.title,
        description: seo?.metaDescription || attrs.description,
        images: seo?.ogImage?.data
          ? [getStrapiMedia(seo.ogImage.data.attributes.url)]
          : attrs.featuredImage?.data
          ? [getStrapiMedia(attrs.featuredImage.data.attributes.url)]
          : [],
      },
    };
  } catch (error) {
    return {
      title: "Event",
    };
  }
}

export default async function EventDetailPage({ params }) {
  let event = null;
  let relatedEvents = [];

  try {
    // Fetch event with all relationships
    const eventsData = await fetchAPI("/events", {
      filters: {
        slug: {
          $eq: params.slug,
        },
      },
      populate: {
        featuredImage: {
          fields: ["url", "alternativeText", "width", "height"],
        },
        gallery: {
          fields: ["url", "alternativeText", "width", "height"],
        },
        venue: {
          populate: "*",
        },
        organizer: {
          populate: {
            logo: {
              fields: ["url", "alternativeText"],
            },
          },
        },
        speakers: {
          populate: {
            photo: {
              fields: ["url", "alternativeText"],
            },
          },
        },
        schedule: {
          populate: "*",
        },
        category: {
          fields: ["name", "slug", "color"],
        },
        relatedEvents: {
          populate: {
            featuredImage: {
              fields: ["url", "alternativeText"],
            },
            category: {
              fields: ["name", "slug", "color"],
            },
            venue: {
              fields: ["name", "city"],
            },
          },
        },
      },
    });

    event = eventsData?.data?.[0];

    if (!event) {
      notFound();
    }

    // If no manual related events, fetch by category
    if (
      !event.attributes.relatedEvents?.data ||
      event.attributes.relatedEvents.data.length === 0
    ) {
      const categorySlug = event.attributes.category?.data?.attributes?.slug;
      const today = new Date().toISOString().split("T")[0];

      if (categorySlug) {
        const relatedData = await fetchAPI("/events", {
          filters: {
            category: {
              slug: {
                $eq: categorySlug,
              },
            },
            id: {
              $ne: event.id,
            },
            startDate: {
              $gte: today,
            },
          },
          sort: ["startDate:asc"],
          pagination: {
            limit: 3,
          },
          populate: {
            featuredImage: {
              fields: ["url", "alternativeText"],
            },
            category: {
              fields: ["name", "slug", "color"],
            },
            venue: {
              fields: ["name", "city"],
            },
          },
        });

        relatedEvents = relatedData?.data || [];
      }
    } else {
      relatedEvents = event.attributes.relatedEvents.data;
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error("Error fetching event:", error);
    notFound();
  }

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      <EventDetailClient event={event} relatedEvents={relatedEvents} />
    </div>
  );
}
```

```javascript
"use client";

import { useState } from "react";

  FiVideo,
} from "react-icons/fi";
import Image from "next/image";
import Link from "next/link";
import { getStrapiMedia } from "@/app/lib/api";
import dynamic from "next/dynamic";

// Dynamic import for map
const EventMap = dynamic(() => import("./EventMap"), {
  ssr: false,
  loading: () => (
    <div className="h-96 bg-gray-100 rounded-lg flex items-center justify-center">
      <p className="text-gray-500">Loading map...</p>
    </div>
  ),
});

export default function EventDetailClient({ event, relatedEvents }) {
  const attrs = event.attributes;
  const [showShareMenu, setShowShareMenu] = useState(false);
  const [selectedDay, setSelectedDay] = useState(0);

  // Format dates
  const formatDate = (dateString) => {
    const date = new Date(dateString);
    return date.toLocaleDateString("en-US", {
      year: "numeric",
      month: "long",
      day: "numeric",
    });
  };

  const formatTime = (dateString) => {
    const date = new Date(dateString);
    return date.toLocaleTimeString("en-US", {
      hour: "2-digit",
      minute: "2-digit",
    });
  };

  // Calculate days until event
  const daysUntilEvent = () => {
    const today = new Date();
    const eventDate = new Date(attrs.startDate);
    const diffTime = eventDate - today;
    const diffDays = Math.ceil(diffTime / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
    return diffDays;
  };

  // Calculate spots remaining
  const spotsRemaining = attrs.maxAttendees - attrs.currentAttendees;
  const percentageFull = (attrs.currentAttendees / attrs.maxAttendees) * 100;

  // Event status
  const isUpcoming = new Date(attrs.startDate) > new Date();
  const isPast = new Date(attrs.endDate) < new Date();
  const isOngoing =
    new Date(attrs.startDate) <= new Date() &&
    new Date(attrs.endDate) >= new Date();

  // Registration deadline passed
  const registrationOpen =
    new Date(attrs.registrationDeadline) > new Date() &&
    attrs.status === "open" &&
    spotsRemaining > 0;

  // Share functions
  const shareUrl = typeof window !== "undefined" ? window.location.href : "";
  const shareTitle = attrs.title;

  const shareOnTwitter = () => {
    window.open(
      `https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=${encodeURIComponent(
        shareTitle
      )}&url=${encodeURIComponent(shareUrl)}`,
      "_blank"
    );
  };

  const shareOnFacebook = () => {
    window.open(
      `https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=${encodeURIComponent(
        shareUrl
      )}`,
      "_blank"
    );
  };

  const shareOnLinkedIn = () => {
    window.open(
      `https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=${encodeURIComponent(
        shareUrl
      )}`,
      "_blank"
    );
  };

  const copyLink = async () => {
    try {
      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(shareUrl);
      alert("Link copied to clipboard!");
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Failed to copy link:", error);
    }
  };

  return (
    <div className="w-full">
      {/* Event Header */}
      <div className="bg-white border-b border-gray-200">
        <div className="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 py-8">
          {/* Breadcrumb */}
          <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-gray-600 mb-6">
            <Link href="/" className="hover:text-[#01366b]">
              Home
            </Link>
            <span>/</span>
            <Link href="/events" className="hover:text-[#01366b]">
              Events
            </Link>
            <span>/</span>
            {attrs.category?.data && (
              <>
                <Link
                  href={`/events/category/${attrs.category.data.attributes.slug}`}
                  className="hover:text-[#01366b]"
                >
                  {attrs.category.data.attributes.name}
                </Link>
                <span>/</span>
              </>
            )}
            <span className="text-gray-900">{attrs.title}</span>
          </div>

          <div className="flex flex-col lg:flex-row gap-8">
            {/* Left Column */}
            <div className="flex-1">
              {/* Category Badge */}
              {attrs.category?.data && (
                <div className="mb-4">
                  <Link
                    href={`/events/category/${attrs.category.data.attributes.slug}`}
                    className="inline-block px-4 py-1.5 rounded-full text-sm font-medium text-white"
                    style={{
                      backgroundColor: attrs.category.data.attributes.color,
                    }}
                  >
                    {attrs.category.data.attributes.name}
                  </Link>
                </div>
              )}

              {/* Title */}
              <motion.h1
                initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
                animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
                className="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4"
              >
                {attrs.title}
              </motion.h1>

              {/* Event Meta */}
              <div className="flex flex-wrap items-center gap-6 text-gray-600 mb-6">
                <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                  <FiCalendar className="text-[#01366b]" />
                  <span>
                    {formatDate(attrs.startDate)}
                    {attrs.endDate &&
                      new Date(attrs.endDate).toDateString() !==
                        new Date(attrs.startDate).toDateString() &&
                      ` - ${formatDate(attrs.endDate)}`}
                  </span>
                </div>

                {attrs.venue && (
                  <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                    <FiMapPin className="text-[#01366b]" />
                    <span>
                      {attrs.venue.city}, {attrs.venue.country}
                    </span>
                  </div>
                )}

                <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                  <FiUsers className="text-[#01366b]" />
                  <span>
                    {attrs.currentAttendees} / {attrs.maxAttendees} attendees
                  </span>

                <div className="relative ml-auto">
                  <button

                  >

            <div className="lg:w-96">
```
