```javascript
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        )}

        {/* Schedule */}
        {attrs.schedule && attrs.schedule.length > 0 && (
          <div className="mb-12">
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
              Event Schedule
            </h2>

            {/* Day Tabs */}
            {attrs.schedule.length > 1 && (
              <div className="flex gap-2 mb-6 overflow-x-auto">
                {attrs.schedule.map((day, index) => (
                  <button
                    key={day.id}
                    onClick={() => setSelectedDay(index)}
                    className={`px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-medium whitespace-nowrap transition-colors ${
                      selectedDay === index
                        ? "bg-[#01366b] text-white"
                        : "bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-200"
                    }`}
                  >
                    {day.day}
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}

            {/* Sessions */}
            <div className="space-y-4">
              {attrs.schedule[selectedDay]?.sessions?.map((session) => (
                <div
                  key={session.id}
                  className="bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-6"
                >
                  <div className="flex items-start gap-4">
                    <div className="flex-shrink-0">
                      <div className="w-20 text-sm font-semibold text-[#01366b]">
                        {session.time}
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    <div className="flex-1">
                      <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                        {session.title}
                      </h3>
                      {session.speaker && (
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-2">
                          Speaker: {session.speaker}
                        </p>
                      )}
                      {session.description && (
                        <p className="text-gray-700">{session.description}</p>
                      )}
                      <span
                        className={`inline-block mt-3 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium ${
                          session.type === "keynote"
                            ? "bg-purple-100 text-purple-700"
                            : session.type === "workshop"
                            ? "bg-blue-100 text-blue-700"
                            : session.type === "panel"
                            ? "bg-green-100 text-green-700"
                            : session.type === "break"
                            ? "bg-gray-100 text-gray-700"
                            : "bg-orange-100 text-orange-700"
                        }`}
                      >
                        {session.type.charAt(0).toUpperCase() +
                          session.type.slice(1)}
                      </span>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        )}

        {/* Speakers */}
        {attrs.speakers?.data && attrs.speakers.data.length > 0 && (
          <div className="mb-12">
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">Speakers</h2>
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
              {attrs.speakers.data.map((speaker) => (
                <SpeakerCard key={speaker.id} speaker={speaker} />
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        )}

        {/* Venue */}
        {attrs.venue && (
          <div className="mb-12">
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
              Venue Information
            </h2>
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
              <div className="bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-6">
                <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                  {attrs.venue.name}
                </h3>
                <div className="space-y-3 text-gray-700">
                  <div className="flex items-start gap-3">
                    <FiMapPin className="mt-1 flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
                    <div>
                      <p>{attrs.venue.address}</p>
                      <p>
                        {attrs.venue.city}, {attrs.venue.region}
                      </p>
                      <p>{attrs.venue.country}</p>
                    </div>
                  </div>

                  {attrs.venue.phone && (
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                      <FiPhone className="flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
                      <a
                        href={`tel:${attrs.venue.phone}`}
                        className="hover:text-[#01366b]"
                      >
                        {attrs.venue.phone}
                      </a>
                    </div>
                  )}

                  {attrs.venue.website && (
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                      <FiGlobe className="flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
                      <a
                        href={attrs.venue.website}
                        target="_blank"
                        rel="noopener noreferrer"
                        className="hover:text-[#01366b]"
                      >
                        Visit Website
                      </a>
                    </div>
                  )}

                  {attrs.venue.capacity && (
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                      <FiUsers className="flex-shrink-0 text-[#01366b]" />
                      <span>Capacity: {attrs.venue.capacity} people</span>
                    </div>
                  )}

                  {attrs.venue.amenities && attrs.venue.amenities.length > 0 && (
                    <div className="pt-4 border-t border-gray-200">
                      <p className="font-semibold mb-2">Amenities:</p>
                      <ul className="space-y-1">
                        {attrs.venue.amenities.map((amenity, index) => (
                          <li key={index} className="flex items-center gap-2">
                            <FiCheckCircle className="text-green-500 text-sm" />
                            <span className="text-sm">{amenity}</span>
                          </li>
                        ))}
                      </ul>
                    </div>
                  )}
                </div>
              </div>

              {/* Map */}
              {attrs.venue.location && (
                <div className="rounded-lg overflow-hidden">
                  <EventMap
                    latitude={attrs.venue.location.latitude}
                    longitude={attrs.venue.location.longitude}
                    venueName={attrs.venue.name}
                  />
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        )}

        {/* Requirements */}
        {attrs.requirements && attrs.requirements.length > 0 && (
          <div className="mb-12">
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
              What to Bring
            </h2>
            <div className="bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200 rounded-lg p-6">
              <ul className="space-y-2">
                {attrs.requirements.map((requirement, index) => (
                  <li key={index} className="flex items-start gap-3">
                    <FiAlertCircle className="text-yellow-600 mt-1 flex-shrink-0" />
                    <span className="text-gray-700">{requirement}</span>
                  </li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>
          </div>
        )}

        {/* Gallery */}
        {attrs.gallery?.data && attrs.gallery.data.length > 0 && (
          <div className="mb-12">
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
              Event Gallery
            </h2>
            <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
              {attrs.gallery.data.map((image) => (
                <div
                  key={image.id}
                  className="relative h-64 bg-gray-200 rounded-lg overflow-hidden"
                >
                  <Image
                    src={getStrapiMedia(image.attributes.url)}
                    alt={image.attributes.alternativeText || "Event gallery"}
                    fill
                    className="object-cover"
                  />
                </div>
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        )}

        {/* Related Events */}
        {relatedEvents.length > 0 && (
          <div>
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">
              Related Events
            </h2>
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
              {relatedEvents.map((relatedEvent) => (
                <RelatedEventCard
                  key={relatedEvent.id}
                  event={relatedEvent}
                />
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// Speaker Card Component
function SpeakerCard({ speaker }) {
  const attrs = speaker.attributes;

  return (
    <div className="bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-6">
      {attrs.photo?.data && (
        <div className="w-24 h-24 relative rounded-full overflow-hidden mx-auto mb-4">
          <Image
            src={getStrapiMedia(attrs.photo.data.attributes.url)}
            alt={attrs.name}
            fill
            className="object-cover"
          />
        </div>
      )}

      <div className="text-center">
        <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-1">{attrs.name}</h3>
        {attrs.role && attrs.organization && (
          <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-3">
            {attrs.role} at {attrs.organization}
          </p>
        )}

        {attrs.sessionTitle && (
          <div className="mb-3 pt-3 border-t border-gray-200">
            <p className="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-1">
              {attrs.sessionTitle}
            </p>
            {attrs.sessionTime && (
              <p className="text-xs text-gray-600">
                {new Date(attrs.sessionTime).toLocaleTimeString("en-US", {
                  month: "short",
                  day: "numeric",
                  hour: "2-digit",
                  minute: "2-digit",
                })}
              </p>
            )}
          </div>
        )}

        {attrs.bio && <p className="text-sm text-gray-700">{attrs.bio}</p>}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// Related Event Card Component
function RelatedEventCard({ event }) {
  const attrs = event.attributes;

  const formatDate = (dateString) => {
    const date = new Date(dateString);
    return date.toLocaleDateString("en-US", {
      month: "short",
      day: "numeric",
      year: "numeric",
    });
  };

  return (
    <Link
      href={`/events/${attrs.slug}`}
      className="block group bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg overflow-hidden hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow"
    >
      {attrs.featuredImage?.data && (
        <div className="relative h-48 bg-gray-200">
          <Image
            src={getStrapiMedia(attrs.featuredImage.data.attributes.url)}
            alt={
              attrs.featuredImage.data.attributes.alternativeText || attrs.title
            }
            fill
            className="object-cover group-hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300"
          />
        </div>
      )}

      <div className="p-4">
        {attrs.category?.data && (
          <span
            className="inline-block px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium text-white mb-2"
            style={{ backgroundColor: attrs.category.data.attributes.color }}
          >
            {attrs.category.data.attributes.name}
          </span>
        )}

        <h3 className="font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2 line-clamp-2 group-hover:text-[#01366b] transition-colors">
          {attrs.title}
        </h3>

        <div className="space-y-1 text-sm text-gray-600">
          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
            <FiCalendar className="text-[#01366b]" />
            <span>{formatDate(attrs.startDate)}</span>
          </div>

          {attrs.venue && (
            <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
              <FiMapPin className="text-[#01366b]" />
              <span>{attrs.venue.city}</span>
            </div>
          )}

          {attrs.price && (
            <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
              <FiDollarSign className="text-[#01366b]" />
              <span>
                {attrs.currency || "GHS"} {attrs.price.toFixed(2)}
              </span>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
    </Link>
  );
}
```

**File**: `app/events/[slug]/EventMap.js`

```javascript
"use client";

import { MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker, Popup } from "react-leaflet";
import "leaflet/dist/leaflet.css";
import L from "leaflet";

// Fix for default marker icon
delete L.Icon.Default.prototype._getIconUrl;
L.Icon.Default.mergeOptions({
  iconRetinaUrl:
    "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-icon-2x.png",
  iconUrl:
    "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-icon.png",
  shadowUrl:
    "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-shadow.png",
});

export default function EventMap({ latitude, longitude, venueName }) {
  const position = [latitude, longitude];

  return (
    <MapContainer
      center={position}
      zoom={15}
      style={{ height: "400px", width: "100%" }}
      scrollWheelZoom={false}
    >
      <TileLayer
        attribution='&copy; <a href="https://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright">OpenStreetMap</a> contributors'
        url="https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png"
      />

      <Marker position={position}>
        <Popup>
          <div className="p-2">
            <p className="font-bold">{venueName}</p>
          </div>
        </Popup>
      </Marker>
    </MapContainer>
  );
}
```

### API Summary

**Endpoints Used:**
1. `GET /api/events?filters[slug][$eq]={slug}&populate=deep` - Event with all relationships
2. `GET /api/events?filters[category][slug][$eq]={categorySlug}&filters[id][$ne]={id}&filters[startDate][$gte]={today}&sort=startDate:asc&pagination[limit]=3` - Related upcoming events

**New Strapi Content Types:**
- Collection Type: `events`
- Collection Type: `event-organizers`
- Collection Type: `speakers`
- Collection Type: `event-categories`

**New Components:**
- Events: `events.venue`
- Events: `events.schedule-day`
- Events: `events.session`

**Features:**
- Event details with dates, venue, pricing
- Registration status and deadline tracking
- Attendee count with visual progress bar
- Multi-day schedule with tabbed navigation
- Speaker profiles with photos and bios
- Venue information with interactive map
- Event highlights and requirements
- Photo gallery from previous events
- Virtual attendance option
- Social sharing (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Copy Link)
- Related events by category
- Event status badges (Upcoming, Ongoing, Past, Full, Closed)
- Days until event countdown
- Category color coding
- SEO optimization
- Responsive design

**Caching Strategy:**
- ISR with 30-minute (1800s) revalidation (events change more frequently)
- Static generation for all events
- Related events auto-fetch by category and future dates
- Dynamic map import to avoid SSR issues

## Page 32: Search Results (`/search`)

### Overview
Global search page that searches across all content types (news articles, events, pages, credit unions, downloads) and displays unified results with filtering and sorting capabilities.

### API Endpoints

The search page queries multiple content types in parallel:

**News Articles:**
```
GET /api/news-articles?filters[$or][0][title][$containsi]={query}&filters[$or][1][content][$containsi]={query}&populate[featuredImage][fields][0]=url&populate[category][fields][0]=name&populate[category][fields][1]=color&sort=publishedDate:desc&pagination[limit]=5
```

**Events:**
```
GET /api/events?filters[$or][0][title][$containsi]={query}&filters[$or][1][description][$containsi]={query}&populate[featuredImage][fields][0]=url&populate[category][fields][0]=name&populate[category][fields][1]=color&populate[venue][fields][0]=city&sort=startDate:desc&pagination[limit]=5
```

**Credit Unions:**
```
GET /api/credit-unions?filters[$or][0][name][$containsi]={query}&filters[$or][1][description][$containsi]={query}&populate[logo][fields][0]=url&populate[category][fields][0]=name&sort=name:asc&pagination[limit]=5
```

**Downloads:**
```
GET /api/downloads?filters[$or][0][title][$containsi]={query}&filters[$or][1][description][$containsi]={query}&populate[category][fields][0]=name&sort=createdAt:desc&pagination[limit]=5
```

### Complete API Response Example

**News Articles Response:**
```json
{
  "data": [
```

```javascript
import { Suspense } from "react";
import SearchClient from "./SearchClient";

export const metadata = {
  title: "Search | CUA Ghana",
  description: "Search across news, events, credit unions, and resources",
};

export default function SearchPage() {
  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      <Suspense fallback={<SearchLoadingFallback />}>
        <SearchClient />
      </Suspense>

}

function SearchLoadingFallback() {
  return (
    <div className="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 py-12">

          ))}

      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

**File**: `app/search/SearchClient.js`

```javascript
"use client";

import { useState, useEffect, useMemo } from "react";
import { useSearchParams, useRouter } from "next/navigation";
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from "framer-motion";
import {
  FiSearch,
  FiFilter,
  FiX,
  FiCalendar,
  FiMapPin,
  FiFileText,
  FiUsers,
  FiDownload,
  FiClock,
  FiDollarSign,
} from "react-icons/fi";
import Image from "next/image";
import Link from "next/link";
import { getStrapiMedia } from "../lib/api";

export default function SearchClient() {
  const searchParams = useSearchParams();
  const router = useRouter();
  const queryParam = searchParams.get("q") || "";

  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(queryParam);
  const [activeFilters, setActiveFilters] = useState({
    contentType: "all", // all, news, events, credit-unions, downloads
    sortBy: "relevance", // relevance, date-desc, date-asc, name
  });
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [results, setResults] = useState({
    news: [],
    events: [],
    creditUnions: [],
    downloads: [],
  });
  const [totalResults, setTotalResults] = useState({
    news: 0,
    events: 0,
    creditUnions: 0,
    downloads: 0,
  });

  // Perform search
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!queryParam) return;

    const performSearch = async () => {
      setIsLoading(true);
      const strapiUrl = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_STRAPI_URL || "http://localhost:1337";

      try {
        // Search all content types in parallel
        const [newsRes, eventsRes, creditUnionsRes, downloadsRes] =
          await Promise.all([
            // News articles
            fetch(
              `${strapiUrl}/api/news-articles?filters[$or][0][title][$containsi]=${encodeURIComponent(
                queryParam
              )}&filters[$or][1][content][$containsi]=${encodeURIComponent(
                queryParam
              )}&populate[featuredImage][fields][0]=url&populate[category][fields][0]=name&populate[category][fields][1]=color&populate[author][fields][0]=name&sort=publishedDate:desc&pagination[limit]=10`
            ).then((res) => res.json()),

            // Events
            fetch(
              `${strapiUrl}/api/events?filters[$or][0][title][$containsi]=${encodeURIComponent(
                queryParam
              )}&filters[$or][1][description][$containsi]=${encodeURIComponent(
                queryParam
              )}&populate[featuredImage][fields][0]=url&populate[category][fields][0]=name&populate[category][fields][1]=color&populate[venue][fields][0]=city&sort=startDate:desc&pagination[limit]=10`
            ).then((res) => res.json()),

            // Credit Unions
            fetch(
              `${strapiUrl}/api/credit-unions?filters[$or][0][name][$containsi]=${encodeURIComponent(
                queryParam
              )}&filters[$or][1][description][$containsi]=${encodeURIComponent(
                queryParam
              )}&populate[logo][fields][0]=url&sort=name:asc&pagination[limit]=10`
            ).then((res) => res.json()),

            // Downloads
            fetch(
              `${strapiUrl}/api/downloads?filters[$or][0][title][$containsi]=${encodeURIComponent(
                queryParam
              )}&filters[$or][1][description][$containsi]=${encodeURIComponent(
                queryParam
              )}&populate[category][fields][0]=name&sort=createdAt:desc&pagination[limit]=10`
            ).then((res) => res.json()),
          ]);

        setResults({
          news: newsRes?.data || [],
          events: eventsRes?.data || [],
          creditUnions: creditUnionsRes?.data || [],
          downloads: downloadsRes?.data || [],
        });

        setTotalResults({
          news: newsRes?.meta?.pagination?.total || 0,
          events: eventsRes?.meta?.pagination?.total || 0,
          creditUnions: creditUnionsRes?.meta?.pagination?.total || 0,
          downloads: downloadsRes?.meta?.pagination?.total || 0,
        });
      } catch (error) {
        console.error("Search error:", error);
      } finally {
        setIsLoading(false);
      }
    };

    performSearch();
  }, [queryParam]);

  // Handle search submission
  const handleSearch = (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    if (searchQuery.trim()) {
      router.push(`/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(searchQuery.trim())}`);
    }
  };

  // Calculate total results
  const totalCount = useMemo(() => {
    if (activeFilters.contentType === "all") {
      return (
        totalResults.news +
        totalResults.events +
        totalResults.creditUnions +
        totalResults.downloads
      );
    }
    return totalResults[activeFilters.contentType.replace("-", "")] || 0;
  }, [totalResults, activeFilters.contentType]);

  // Filter results based on content type
  const filteredResults = useMemo(() => {
    if (activeFilters.contentType === "all") {
      return [
        ...results.news.map((item) => ({ ...item, type: "news" })),
        ...results.events.map((item) => ({ ...item, type: "events" })),
        ...results.creditUnions.map((item) => ({
          ...item,
          type: "creditUnions",
        })),
        ...results.downloads.map((item) => ({ ...item, type: "downloads" })),
      ];
    }

    const typeMap = {
      news: "news",
      events: "events",
      "credit-unions": "creditUnions",
      downloads: "downloads",
    };

    const type = typeMap[activeFilters.contentType];
    return results[type].map((item) => ({ ...item, type }));
  }, [results, activeFilters.contentType]);

  // Sort results
  const sortedResults = useMemo(() => {
    const sorted = [...filteredResults];

    switch (activeFilters.sortBy) {
      case "date-desc":
        return sorted.sort((a, b) => {
          const dateA = new Date(
            a.attributes.publishedDate ||
              a.attributes.startDate ||
              a.attributes.createdAt
          );
          const dateB = new Date(
            b.attributes.publishedDate ||
              b.attributes.startDate ||
              b.attributes.createdAt
          );
          return dateB - dateA;
        });
      case "date-asc":
        return sorted.sort((a, b) => {
          const dateA = new Date(
            a.attributes.publishedDate ||
              a.attributes.startDate ||
              a.attributes.createdAt
          );
          const dateB = new Date(
            b.attributes.publishedDate ||
              b.attributes.startDate ||
              b.attributes.createdAt
          );
          return dateA - dateB;
        });
      case "name":
        return sorted.sort((a, b) => {
          const nameA = a.attributes.title || a.attributes.name || "";
          const nameB = b.attributes.title || b.attributes.name || "";
          return nameA.localeCompare(nameB);
        });
      default: // relevance
        return sorted;
    }
  }, [filteredResults, activeFilters.sortBy]);

  return (
    <div className="w-full">
      {/* Search Header */}
      <div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-[#01366b] to-[#446494] text-white py-16">
        <div className="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8">
          <h1 className="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold mb-6">Search</h1>

          {/* Search Form */}
          <form onSubmit={handleSearch} className="max-w-3xl">
            <div className="relative">
              <FiSearch className="absolute left-4 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 text-gray-400 text-xl" />
              <input
                type="text"
                value={searchQuery}
                onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
                placeholder="Search news, events, credit unions, and more..."
                className="w-full pl-12 pr-4 py-4 rounded-lg text-gray-900 text-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-white/50"
              />
              {searchQuery && (
                <button
                  type="button"
                  onClick={() => setSearchQuery("")}
                  className="absolute right-4 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600"
                >
                  <FiX className="text-xl" />
                </button>
              )}
            </div>
          </form>

          {/* Results Summary */}
          {queryParam && (
            <div className="mt-6">
              <p className="text-white/90">
                {isLoading ? (
                  "Searching..."
                ) : (
                  <>
                    Found <span className="font-bold">{totalCount}</span>{" "}
                    result{totalCount !== 1 ? "s" : ""} for "
                    <span className="font-bold">{queryParam}</span>"
                  </>
                )}
              </p>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Main Content */}
      {queryParam && (
        <div className="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 py-12">
          {/* Filters */}
          <div className="flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-4 mb-8">
            {/* Content Type Filter */}
            <div className="flex gap-2 flex-wrap">
              <FilterButton
                active={activeFilters.contentType === "all"}
                onClick={() =>
                  setActiveFilters((prev) => ({ ...prev, contentType: "all" }))
                }
              >
                All ({totalResults.news + totalResults.events + totalResults.creditUnions + totalResults.downloads})
              </FilterButton>
              <FilterButton
                active={activeFilters.contentType === "news"}
                onClick={() =>
                  setActiveFilters((prev) => ({ ...prev, contentType: "news" }))
                }
              >
                News ({totalResults.news})
              </FilterButton>
              <FilterButton
                active={activeFilters.contentType === "events"}
                onClick={() =>
                  setActiveFilters((prev) => ({
                    ...prev,
                    contentType: "events",
                  }))
                }
              >
                Events ({totalResults.events})
              </FilterButton>
              <FilterButton
                active={activeFilters.contentType === "credit-unions"}
                onClick={() =>
                  setActiveFilters((prev) => ({
                    ...prev,
                    contentType: "credit-unions",
                  }))
                }
              >
                Credit Unions ({totalResults.creditUnions})
              </FilterButton>
              <FilterButton
                active={activeFilters.contentType === "downloads"}
                onClick={() =>
                  setActiveFilters((prev) => ({
                    ...prev,
                    contentType: "downloads",
                  }))
                }
              >
                Downloads ({totalResults.downloads})
              </FilterButton>
            </div>

            {/* Sort Filter */}
            <div className="md:ml-auto">
              <select
                value={activeFilters.sortBy}
                onChange={(e) =>
                  setActiveFilters((prev) => ({
                    ...prev,
                    sortBy: e.target.value,
                  }))
                }
                className="px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#01366b]/20"
              >
                <option value="relevance">Most Relevant</option>
                <option value="date-desc">Newest First</option>
                <option value="date-asc">Oldest First</option>
                <option value="name">Alphabetical</option>
              </select>
            </div>
          </div>

          {/* Results */}
          {isLoading ? (
            <div className="space-y-6">
              {[1, 2, 3, 4].map((i) => (
                <div
                  key={i}
                  className="bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-6 animate-pulse"
                >
                  <div className="h-6 bg-gray-200 rounded w-3/4 mb-4"></div>
                  <div className="h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-full mb-2"></div>
                  <div className="h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-2/3"></div>
                </div>
              ))}
            </div>
          ) : sortedResults.length === 0 ? (
            <div className="text-center py-12">
              <FiSearch className="mx-auto text-6xl text-gray-300 mb-4" />
              <h3 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                No results found
              </h3>
              <p className="text-gray-600 mb-6">
                Try adjusting your search or filters
              </p>
            </div>
          ) : (
            <div className="space-y-6">
              <AnimatePresence mode="popLayout">
                {sortedResults.map((result) => (
                  <SearchResultCard
                    key={`${result.type}-${result.id}`}
                    result={result}
                    query={queryParam}
                  />
                ))}
              </AnimatePresence>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      )}

      {/* Empty State */}
      {!queryParam && (
        <div className="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6 sm:px-8 py-12">
          <div className="text-center py-12">
            <FiSearch className="mx-auto text-6xl text-gray-300 mb-4" />
            <h3 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
              Start Your Search
            </h3>
            <p className="text-gray-600 mb-8">
              Search across news articles, events, credit unions, and downloads
            </p>

            {/* Popular Searches */}
            <div className="max-w-2xl mx-auto">
              <p className="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-4">
                Popular Searches:
              </p>
              <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 justify-center">
                {[
                  "Digital Banking",
                  "Training Programs",
                  "Annual Summit",
                  "Registration Forms",
                  "Financial Inclusion",
                  "Credit Union Directory",
                ].map((term) => (
                  <Link
                    key={term}
                    href={`/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(term)}`}
                    className="px-4 py-2 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 rounded-full text-sm hover:bg-gray-200 transition-colors"
                  >
                    {term}
                  </Link>
                ))}
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

// Filter Button Component
function FilterButton({ active, onClick, children }) {
  return (
    <button
      onClick={onClick}
      className={`px-4 py-2 rounded-lg font-medium transition-colors ${
        active
          ? "bg-[#01366b] text-white"
          : "bg-white border border-gray-300 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50"
      }`}
    >
      {children}
    </button>
  );
}

// Search Result Card Component
function SearchResultCard({ result, query }) {
  const attrs = result.attributes;

  // Highlight search term in text
  const highlightText = (text, query) => {
    if (!text || !query) return text;
    const regex = new RegExp(`(${query})`, "gi");
    const parts = text.split(regex);
    return parts.map((part, i) =>
      regex.test(part) ? (
        <mark key={i} className="bg-yellow-200">
          {part}
        </mark>
      ) : (
        part
      )
    );
  };

  // Format date
  const formatDate = (dateString) => {
    if (!dateString) return null;
    const date = new Date(dateString);
    return date.toLocaleDateString("en-US", {
      year: "numeric",
      month: "short",
      day: "numeric",
    });
  };

  return (
    <motion.div
      layout
      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}
      className="bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg overflow-hidden hover:shadow-md transition-shadow"
    >
      <Link
        href={
          result.type === "news"
            ? `/news/${attrs.slug}`
            : result.type === "events"
            ? `/events/${attrs.slug}`
            : result.type === "creditUnions"
            ? `/find-credit-union#${attrs.slug}`
            : `/media/downloads#${attrs.slug}`
        }
        className="block p-6"
      >
        <div className="flex gap-6">
          {/* Image */}
          {(attrs.featuredImage?.data || attrs.logo?.data) && (
            <div className="w-32 h-32 relative flex-shrink-0 bg-gray-200 rounded-lg overflow-hidden">
              <Image
                src={getStrapiMedia(
                  attrs.featuredImage?.data?.attributes?.url ||
                    attrs.logo?.data?.attributes?.url
                )}
                alt={attrs.title || attrs.name}
                fill
                className="object-cover"
              />
            </div>
          )}

          {/* Content */}
          <div className="flex-1">
            {/* Type Badge */}
            <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-2">
              {result.type === "news" && (
                <span className="inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 px-3 py-1 bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 rounded-full text-xs font-medium">
                  <FiFileText />
                  News Article
                </span>
              )}
              {result.type === "events" && (
                <span className="inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 px-3 py-1 bg-purple-100 text-purple-700 rounded-full text-xs font-medium">
                  <FiCalendar />
                  Event
                </span>
              )}
              {result.type === "creditUnions" && (
                <span className="inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 px-3 py-1 bg-green-100 text-green-700 rounded-full text-xs font-medium">
                  <FiUsers />
                  Credit Union
                </span>
              )}
              {result.type === "downloads" && (
                <span className="inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 px-3 py-1 bg-orange-100 text-orange-700 rounded-full text-xs font-medium">
                  <FiDownload />
                  Download
                </span>
              )}

              {/* Category Badge */}
              {attrs.category?.data && (
                <span
                  className="px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium text-white"
                  style={{
                    backgroundColor: attrs.category.data.attributes.color || "#666",
                  }}
                >
                  {attrs.category.data.attributes.name}
                </span>
              )}
            </div>

            {/* Title */}
            <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2 hover:text-[#01366b] transition-colors">
              {highlightText(attrs.title || attrs.name, query)}
            </h3>

            {/* Description/Excerpt */}
            <p className="text-gray-700 mb-3 line-clamp-2">
              {highlightText(
                attrs.excerpt || attrs.description,
                query
              )}
            </p>

            {/* Meta Information */}
            <div className="flex flex-wrap items-center gap-4 text-sm text-gray-600">
              {/* Date */}
              {(attrs.publishedDate || attrs.startDate) && (
                <div className="flex items-center gap-1.5">
                  <FiCalendar className="text-[#01366b]" />
                  <span>
                    {formatDate(attrs.publishedDate || attrs.startDate)}
                  </span>
                </div>
              )}

              {/* Read Time */}
              {attrs.readTime && (
                <div className="flex items-center gap-1.5">
                  <FiClock className="text-[#01366b]" />
                  <span>{attrs.readTime} min read</span>
                </div>
              )}

              {/* Location */}
              {(attrs.city || attrs.venue?.city) && (
                <div className="flex items-center gap-1.5">
                  <FiMapPin className="text-[#01366b]" />
                  <span>{attrs.city || attrs.venue.city}</span>
                </div>
              )}

              {/* Price */}
              {attrs.price && (
                <div className="flex items-center gap-1.5">
                  <FiDollarSign className="text-[#01366b]" />
                  <span>
                    {attrs.currency || "GHS"} {attrs.price.toFixed(2)}
                  </span>
                </div>
              )}

              {/* Member Count */}
              {attrs.memberCount && (
                <div className="flex items-center gap-1.5">
                  <FiUsers className="text-[#01366b]" />
                  <span>{attrs.memberCount.toLocaleString()} members</span>
                </div>
              )}

              {/* Download Count */}
              {attrs.downloadCount && (
                <div className="flex items-center gap-1.5">
                  <FiDownload className="text-[#01366b]" />
                  <span>{attrs.downloadCount.toLocaleString()} downloads</span>
                </div>
              )}

              {/* File Info */}
              {attrs.fileType && (
                <span className="text-gray-500">
                  {attrs.fileType} • {attrs.fileSize}
                </span>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </Link>
    </motion.div>
  );
}
```

### API Summary

**Endpoints Used:**
1. `GET /api/news-articles?filters[$or][0][title][$containsi]={query}&filters[$or][1][content][$containsi]={query}` - Search news
2. `GET /api/events?filters[$or][0][title][$containsi]={query}&filters[$or][1][description][$containsi]={query}` - Search events
3. `GET /api/credit-unions?filters[$or][0][name][$containsi]={query}&filters[$or][1][description][$containsi]={query}` - Search credit unions
4. `GET /api/downloads?filters[$or][0][title][$containsi]={query}&filters[$or][1][description][$containsi]={query}` - Search downloads

**No New Strapi Content Types** (uses existing content types)

**Features:**
- **Global search** across 4 content types
- **Real-time search** with query parameter
- **Content type filtering:**
  - All results
  - News articles only
  - Events only
  - Credit unions only
  - Downloads only
- **Sorting options:**
  - Most Relevant (default)
  - Newest First
  - Oldest First
  - Alphabetical
- **Unified result cards** with type badges
